text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ct34ZZ9uhFU/WzzeFehCOBI/AAAAAAABcpE/UpLriP01vwkyj6IdQRkEq5w6J4WJQ6gIgCLcBGAs/s1600/from-selves-to-Ecells-the-new-biology-of-cells-illness-and-depression-6-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"479\" data-original-width=\"638\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ct34ZZ9uhFU/WzzeFehCOBI/AAAAAAABcpE/UpLriP01vwkyj6IdQRkEq5w6J4WJQ6gIgCLcBGAs/s640/from-selves-to-Ecells-the-new-biology-of-cells-illness-and-depression-6-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.ndtv.com/health/sonali-bendre-diagnosed-with-metastatic-cancer-all-you-need-to-know-1877792\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.ndtv.com/health/sonali-bendre-diagnosed-with-metastatic-cancer-all-you-need-to-know-1877792</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHAT I\nWRITE NOW WILL BE ADOPTED BY SOME SCIENTIST AND HE WILL CLAIM NOBEL PRIZE A\nDECADE FROM NOW..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALL\nARE WONDERING WHY THERE IS A SUDDEN SPURT IN METASTATIC CANCER..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IF YOU\nARE NOT A HALF WIT, THE ANSWER IS SIMPLE\u2014&nbsp;\nSOME NEW ITEM WHICH HAS BEEN IMPOSED ON THE HUMAN POPULATION LIVING IN MODERN\nCITIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Epithelial-to-mesenchymal\ntransition (EMT) is the initial step enabling the metastasis of cancer cells,\nwhich &nbsp;leads to death..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EMT is\na process by which cells attain migratory and invasive properties, eventually\nleading to cancer metastasis.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> &nbsp;&nbsp;It is</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> activated by tumour microenvironment that enhance tumour\nprocession<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EMT\nrefers to a process where an established epithelium either &nbsp;\"delaminates\" allowing cells to\nleave the epithelium and become connective tissue (mesenchymal) in\norganisation.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This transition can be a permanent change, where the\nmesenchymal cells may reestablish a new epithelial organization..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Epithelial\ncells (organised cellular layer) which loose their organisation and\nmigrate/proliferate as a mesenchymal cells (disorganised cellular layers) are\nsaid to have undergone an Epithelial Mesenchymal Transition (EMT).</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mesenchymal\ncells, connective tissue-like, that have undergone this process may at a later\ntime and under specific signaling can undergo the opposite process, mesenchyme\nto epithelia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Inside\nthe nucleus of a cell, our genes are arranged along twisted, double-stranded\nmolecules of DNA called chromosomes. At the ends of the chromosomes are\nstretches of DNA called telomeres, which protect our genetic data, make it\npossible for cells to divide, and hold some secrets to how we age and get\ncancer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Telomeres\nhave been compared with the plastic tips on shoelaces, because they keep\nchromosome ends from fraying and sticking to each other, which would destroy or\nscramble an organism's genetic information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Yet,\neach time a cell divides, the telomeres get shorter. When they get too short,\nthe cell can no longer divide; it becomes inactive or \"senescent\" or\nit dies. This shortening process is associated with aging, cancer, and a higher\nrisk of death. So telomeres also have been compared with a bomb fuse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Telomeres\nallow cells to divide without losing genes. Cell division is necessary for\ngrowing new skin, blood, bone, and other cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Because\nbroken DNA is dangerous, a cell has the ability to sense and repair chromosome\ndamage. Without telomeres, the ends of chromosomes would look like broken DNA,\nand the cell would try to fix something that wasn't broken. That also would\nmake them stop dividing and eventually die.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Before\na cell can divide, it makes copies of its chromosomes so that both new cells\nwill have identical genetic material. To be copied, a chromosome's two DNA\nstrands must unwind and separate. An enzyme (DNA polymerase) then reads the\nexisting strands to build two new strands. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\nbegins the process with the help of short pieces of RNA. When each new matching\nstrand is complete, it is a bit shorter than the original strand because of the\nroom needed at the end for this small piece of RNA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is\nlike someone who paints himself into a corner and cannot paint the corner.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An\nenzyme named telomerase adds bases to the ends of telomeres. In young cells,\ntelomerase keeps telomeres from wearing down too much. But as cells divide\nrepeatedly, there is not enough telomerase, so the telomeres grow shorter and\nthe cells age.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Telomerase\nremains active in sperm and eggs, which are passed from one generation to the\nnext. If reproductive cells did not have telomerase to maintain the length of\ntheir telomeres, any organism with such cells would soon go extinct.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As a\ncell begins to become cancerous, it divides more often, and its telomeres\nbecome very short.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many cancers have shortened telomeres,\nincluding pancreatic, bone, prostate, bladder, lung, kidney, and head and neck.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Measuring\ntelomerase is a way to detect cancer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SO\nWHEN THE POST BELOW IS SENT TO THE HEALTH MINISTRY\u2014WHAT DO THEY DO?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/ban-titanium-dioxide-e171-nano-particle.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/ban-titanium-dioxide-e171-nano-particle.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOME\nDHAKKAN WHO DOES NOT&nbsp; KNOW IF HE IS\nCOMING OR GOING ( WITHOUT PEERING INTO HIS TIFFIN BOX ) WILL GOOGLE , A KEY\nWORD ,&nbsp; SCAN THE POSTS OF THE FIRST PAGE\u2014AND\nDECLARE , THERE IS NO SUCH THING CALLED CANCER DUE TO NANO PARTICLES..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A 68-year-old\nhas twice the chance of dying within a year compared with a 61-year-old.&nbsp; \u2013 short telomere party get Alzheimer disease,\nhardening of the arteries, high blood pressure, type 2 diabetes, cancers of\nprostrate &nbsp;etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IF YOU\nCAN PREVENT YOUR TELOMERS FROM SHORTENING YOU CAN CHALLENGE ALL TO A 25 KG DUMB\nBELL CONTEST AND WIN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HUMAN\nDNA DEGRADED FROM 12 STRAND NIL JUNK ( MAHARISHIS ) TO 2 STRAND 97% JUNK--&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KING LEMON\nSIZED PINEAL GLAND OF MAHARISHIS BECAME CALCIFIED DRIED UP RAISIN TYPES \u2013 THERE\nIS A REASON.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ANCIENT\nMAHARISHIS HAD A 300 YEAR LIFE SPAN \u2013 WHY ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVIL\nPHARMA HAS USED DEEP STATE AND CONDEMNED CANNABIS ( TELOMERE MAINTAINING ) ,\nWHICH IS NOT ADDICTIVE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/10/say-no-to-plastics-human-suffering-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/10/say-no-to-plastics-human-suffering-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; BASICALLY FONDLING THE BREASTS..WITH PINK NIPPLES STANDING OUT LIKE BULLETS ..&nbsp; &nbsp;ANOTHER SHOWED CHILD BIRTH WITH EXCESSIVE FOCUS ON TWAT BEFORE DELIVERY--SHAVING PUBIC HAIR INCLUDED FOR GOOD MEASURE&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE OTHER STALL HAD TWO NAKED DEAD BODIES EMBALMED IN STINKING FORMALDEHYDE -- ONE MAN AND ONE WOMAN WITH AGED SKIN DARK BROWN .. THE MAN HAD A VERY LARGE PRICK AND THE WOMEN A LARGE TWAT AND BIG BREASTS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS SOON AS THE MALE MEDICAL STUDENT SEES A YOUNG GOOD LOOKING GIRL, HE WOULD HOLD THE MANs PRICK USING FORCEPS -SLIDE THE FORESKIN OVER THE GLANS AND LAUNCH INTO AN EXPLANATION OF HOW PURUSHABEEJAM ( SEMEN ) CAME OUT FROM THE PEE HOLE ORIFICE BLAH BHAH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SAME WHEN YOUNG MEN WENT TO THE DEAD FEMALE CADAVER, THE FEMALE MEDICAL STUDENT WOULD POKE HER FORCEPS INTO THE TWAT AND LAUNCH INTO AN EXPLANATION OF HOW THE SEMEN ENTERED THIS WAY AND HOW THE BABY IS BORN IN THE WOMB.. BLAH BLAH..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY KEPT ATTRACTIVE STUDENTS FOR THIS MORBID COMMENTARY ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">NEEDLESS TO SAY THE CYNOSURE OF ALL EYES WERE THE LARGE PRICK AND THE HAIRY TWAT.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YES -- THIS IS THE ROT IN KERALA FOR YOU..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MEN WERE GETTING COLLECTIVE HARD ONs AND GIRLS WERE CREAMING FROM THEIR TWATS BY WATCHING THIS MORBID GRUESOME SCENE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY PARENTS NEVER BOUGHT A STALL TICKET SAYING IT IS NOT WORTH IT --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO I WENT WITH MY SCHOOL FRIEND.. The main sign of shigella infection is ACUTE diarrhea, which often is bloody..</span><br />\nDURING RAINY SEASON FLOOD ALL WELLS , LAKES AND RIVERS GET CONTAMINATED\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KERALA IS NOT A SUITABLE PLACE FOR BURIAL OF DEAD BODIES DUE TO HEAVY RAINFALL AND LEACHING THAT FOLLOWS... GRAVEYARDS AND CEMETERIES MUST BE CHOSEN BY GROUND WATER EXPERTS ..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nNO RELIGIOUS CONSIDERATION IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN HEALTH OF FUTURE HUMAN GENERATIONS..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Microorganisms associated with decomposition of interred bodies ( and feces in intestines ) cause bacterial dysentery (Shigella dysenteriae)..</span></div>\n<br />\nThese leachates from cemeteries contain microorganisms that pollute substrates, surface water and groundwater. The microorganisms chiefly include bacteria, viruses, intestinal fungi and protozoa\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe corpses of healthy humans and animals release bacteria, for example, those which form the group classified as total coliform bacteria: Escherichia coli, Enterobacter, Klebsiella, Citrobacter, Streptococcus faecalis, Clostridium perfringens, Clostridium welchii and Salmonella typhi, and human-hosted viruses, e.g., enterovirus . In most cases, the contamination of the environment comes from pathogenic intestinal bacteria..<br />\n<br />\nSome microorganisms are long-living and, in appropriate environmental conditions, can survive in soil profile or in groundwater for some time, some microorganisms can survive even up to 5 years and, in this time, they can migrate and reach the groundwater..<br />\n<br />\nDecomposition of interred bodies causes an increase in microbial activity in the surrounding substrate, associated with the release of persistent organic compounds..<br />\n<br />\nThese compounds can cause highly dangerous infectious disease such as liver inflammation (hepatitis C virus) and typhoid fever (S. typhi) . Microorganisms associated with decomposition of interred bodies can also cause other diseases such as tetanus (Clostridium tetani), gaseous gangrene (C. perfringens), toxic contamination of food (E. coli), tuberculosis (Mycobacterium tuberculosis), paratyphoid fever (Salmonella paratyphi), bacterial dysentery (Shigella dysenteriae) and cholera (V. cholerae)..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">PRIONS IN WATER CAUSES DEMENTIA AND LOSS OF BRAIN POWER.</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BURIAL CAUSES SOULS TO GET TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER ON EARTH-- MISERABLE --FOR ENDLESS SUFFERING ..IN ANOTHER TEN YEARS 98% OF CHRISTIANS WILL BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<br /><br />MUSLIMS ARE STUCK DUE TO APOSTASY LAWS\u2026.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHINA HAS DIPPED INTO THIS BLOGSITE AND HAS RECENTLY BANNED ALL BURIAL FOR ATHEIST COMMIES / MUSLIMS/ CHRISTIANS ...BECAUSE OF PRIONS IN GROUNDWATER..&nbsp; &nbsp; CREMATION CAUSES ZERO POLLUTION\u2026</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\nPRIONS FROM DEAD BURIED BODIES INVADE WATER AQUIFERS AND CAUSE PRION DISEASES LIKE SPONGIFORM ENCEPHALOPATHIES. (TSEs)\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE TO LEARN FROM TRUE HISTORY -- NOT FAKE HISTORY WRITTEN BY ROTHSCHILDs COMMIE HISTORIANS\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nKuru is not caused by a bacteria, virus, or fungus. Infectious, abnormal proteins known as prions cause kuru. \u2026. Prions are not living organisms and do not reproduce. \u2026They are inanimate, misshapen proteins that multiply in the brain and form clumps, hindering normal brain processes\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCreutzfeldt-Jakob, Gerstmann-Str\u00e4ussler-Scheinker disease, and fatal familial insomnia are other degenerative diseases caused by prions. These spongiform diseases, as well as kuru, create sponge-like holes in your brain \u2026 Prions that cause kuru can\u2019t be easily destroyed\u2026 Brains contaminated with prions remain infectious even when preserved in formaldehyde for years\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6649907494320464324\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DEEP STATE operative and\nMagsaysay award winner Ex-Chief of Naval Staff &nbsp;Admiral L Ramdas\u2019s daughter Kavita Ramdas is\nsenior advisor to the Ford Foundation's president, Darren Walker. Kavita baby\nmarried a Pakistani named Zulfiqar Ahmad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Both of Kavita's parents, Retd. Admiral L\nRamdas and Lalita Ramdas, and her sister Sagari Ramdas have been closely\nassociated with the Aam Aadmi Party through its core committee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When India put Ford\nFoundation on its watch list ( for funding desh drohis like Teesta Setalvad ) the\nUS DEEP STATE warned India. Gujarat\u2019s MoS for Home Rajnikant Patel had said\nthat Ford Foundation had donated more than 500,000 USD to Setalvad\u2019s NGOs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steven Solnick,of Ford\nFoundation India admitted &nbsp;said the\nFoundation\u2019s last installment to Kabir (an NGO run by Arvind Kejriwal and\nManish Sisodia) was in 2010. &nbsp;\u201cOur first\ngrant to the NGO was of $1,72,000 in 2005 ; the second was in 2008 of $1,97,000\u201d..\n&nbsp;This is what they are willing to admit\nand funds are routed via shell companies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arvind Kejriwal got the\ndesh drohi Magsaysay award ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In reply to an RTI\nquery that questioned the funding and expenditure of Kabir, the organisation\nhas disclosed that they have received funds from the Ford Foundation (Rs\n86,61,742), PRIA (Rs 2,37,035), Manjunath Shanmugam Trust (Rs 3,70,000), Dutch\nEmbassy (Rs 19,61,968), Association for India\u2019s Development (Rs 15,00,000),\nIndia\u2019s friends Association (Rs 7,86,500), United Nationals Development\nProgramme (Rs12,52,742) while Rs 11,35,857 were collected from individual\ndonations between 2007 to 2010.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Interestingly, a major\npart of the funding to an organisation that is prominent in the \u201cWar against\ncorruption\u201d has come from abroad and mainly from the United States. Apar from\nthe UNDP, Ford Foundation and the India Friends Association are US-based\norganisations, while PRIA and Association for India\u2019s Development are\nheadquartered in Asia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://citizensrightsgroup.com/kejriwal-ford-foundation-cia-2/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://citizensrightsgroup.com/kejriwal-ford-foundation-cia-2/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8566824468513158709\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_210M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. ( MOTHERLAND )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">ROTHSCHILD INTRODUCED DEMOCRACY TO THE WHOLE PLANET AFTER WW2 . ALL DEMOCRACIES INCLUDING INDIA HAD RULERS SWEARING OATHS TO \u201cPROTECT THE CONSITUTION\u201d. WHILE IN HIS OWN LAND PRESIDENT/ PM/ JUDGES ETC PLEDGED TO \u201c PROTECT THE WATAN\u201d \u2014THE PROMOSED LANDOF ISRAEL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">LOYALTY TO THE LITTLE RED BOOK OF MAO IS WHAT CAUSED INDIAN COMMIES TO BE ON THE SIDE OF CHINA DURING THE WAR IN 1962..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">NEHRU PUT THOUSANDS OF INDIAN COMMIE TRAITORS IN JAIL JUST BEFORE THE WAR BROKE OUT WITH CHINA. WHILE IN JAIL KERALA COMMIE VS ACHUTANANDAN WAS BITTEN BY CONSCIENCE WHEN HE SAW INDIAN SOLDIERS BEING SLAUGHTERED AT THE BORDER IN THE COLD , WITHOUT BULLETS FOR THEIR GUNS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">VS ACHUTANANDAN WANTED TO DONATE HIS BLOOD FOR OUR JAWANS AS A MARK OF SOLIDARITY.. ALL HIS DEAR COMRADES ( LIKE JYOTI BAU/ AK GOPALAN TYPES ) POUNCED ON HIM AND GAVE HIM A GOOD PASTING \u2013 HE NEARLY DIED OF INTERNAL INJURIES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">LOYALTY TO A BOOK NAMED KORAN , CAUSES THE OIL IN ALL MIDDLE EAST KINGDOWS TO BE STOLEN BY THE WHITE JEW AT THROW AWAY PRICES. ALL THESE OIL RICH KINGDOWMS HAVE MUSLIM POPULATION WITH A JEW KING INSTALLED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD \u2014ALL OF THEM..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She and her husband had\n&nbsp;petitioned the Supreme Court to stop\ndeath penalty of 1993 Bombay blast convict Yakub Memon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://indianexpress.com/article/india/fcra-govt-eases-penalties-for-violating-law-ngos-can-now-pay-fines-5207373/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://indianexpress.com/article/india/fcra-govt-eases-penalties-for-violating-law-ngos-can-now-pay-fines-5207373/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE WARN THE MODI GOVT\u2014DESH\nDROHI FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs SHOULD NOT BE LEFT OFF WITH A MERE FINE.. &nbsp;INCARCERATION FOR SEDITION / TREASON IS A MUST..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LUTYENS DEEP STATE\nOPERATIVES COULD NOT BE EVICTED FROM THEIR BUNGLOWS IN THE PAST AS THEY HAD THE\nJUDGES IN THEIR POCKETS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW THINGS ARE NOT\nEASY..&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;THESE JUDGES HAVE BEEN PROFILED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HAVE JUST COME OUT OF 800 YEARS OF SLAVERY...</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PMO</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PM MODI</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
