, &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CMs OF ALL STATES</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AJIT DOVAL</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DEFENCE MINISTRY</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NIRMALA SITARAMAN</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SPEAKER LOK SABHA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SPEAKER RAJYA SABHA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PRESIDENT OF INDIA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VP OF INDIA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Lutyens Bungalow\nZone (LBZ)\u2014a 100-year-old neighbourhood in New Delhi\u2014is THE &nbsp;most elite residential location in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Against all\nexpectations, Modi inspired the BJP to a majority on its own\u2014the first time a\nsingle party had done so since 1984. All of a sudden, a rank outsider, and that\ntoo one much-reviled in the benami media, took charge of Lutyens\u2019 Delhi. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cosy Lutyens power\nset-up in Delhi got a real shock. All of a sudden, a laid-back prime minister\u2019s\noffice (PMO) was replaced by one which was hyper-active and kicked off work at\n9am ..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modi kick started a &nbsp;rules-based regime and shunned privileged\naccess\u2014all the ingredients of a previously thriving regime of Lutyens crony\ncapitalism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Given his utter disregard for Lutyens\u2019 Delhi, the traditional\nroutes of privileged access to the PMO and other corridors of power have\nrapidly dried up. With Modi ending the jamborees for journalists during the\nprime minister\u2019s trips abroad, the last enabling environment for engagement\ndried up<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Union Urban Development\nMinister M Venkaiah Naidu had told parliament that his department had evicted\nover 1200 officials and politicians in 2014 and 2015 but still had another\n1,200 illegal occupants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Lutyens lobby is so\ncocky that even retired bureaucrats were illegally occupying government\naccommodation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sons of former Prime\nMinisters Chandra Shekhar and Charan Singh. Neeraj Shekhar and Ajit Singh had\nto be locked out of their houses, their belongings emptied out on the lawns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former minister and Jat\nleader Ajit Singh had insisted that his Lutyen's zone bungalow be turned into a\nmemorial for his father, former Prime Minister Chaudhury Charan Singh. He\nfinally vacated in September 2014, after trying to pull strings for three\nmonths. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BJP leader and former\nUnion finance minister Yashwant Sinha had to vacate his house after the\ngovernment showed him the rule book. All these evicted CUNTS are pissed off\nwith Modi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The eviction of former\nJammu and Kashmir chief minister Omar Abdullah\u2019s estranged wife Payal from a\nplush VIP bungalow in the nation\u2019s capital underscores the government\u2019s push to\nrid its limited living spaces of squatters.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like many politicians, bureaucrats\nand their families overstaying in Lutyens Bungalow Zone, Payal Abdullah too was\nreluctant to vacate the house given to the chief minister, though he no longer\nholds the post. But a court order forced her out..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\nearlier law any former minister could stay at his residence for a month after\nhe quit office. Then if the minister didn\u2019t relocate after that, the Union\nUrban Development ministry took a further two months to initialize the eviction\nprocess.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Violating persons&nbsp; took full\nadvantage of this period and moved to various district or high courts to obtain\na stay order against the eviction proceedings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lok Sabha speaker\nMADAME BAITH JAAYEYE, SHAANT HO JAYEYE, has to answer questions about how she\nhad a bungalow converted into a memorial for her father Jagjivan Ram .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meira Kumar got a\nbungalow on 6, Krishna Menon Marg converted into Babu Jagjivan Ram National\nFoundation. She also got it allotted for 25 years till 2038. At one point in\ntime, she had two bungalows in her possession - one on 6, Krishna Menon Marg\nand the other on 20, Akbar Road. She had been allotted the latter bungalow by\nvirtue of being the speaker.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later, the same\nbungalow was allotted to the Babu Jagjivan Ram National Foundation in the last\ndays of the UPA-I government bypassing all norms set in the year 2000\nnotification of the Union Cabinet&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The allotment had ironically also happened\njust a month after a two-judge bench of the Supreme Court held that no memorial\ncould be housed in government houses earmarked for residential accommodation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the UPA government under Manmohan Singh found a way to bypass the apex\ncourt order by leasing 6, Krishna Menon Marg to the BJRNF in August 2013 for 25\nyears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 64% of\nCongress party leaders were STAR KIDS \u2013the&nbsp;\nsons and daughters of earlier stalwarts. Be it bureaucracy, judiciary,\nmedia, academia, business and commerce, public sector industries, lobbying\nsector, banking and finance, advertising or publishing, the coterie was tightly\nmaintained and only selective entry was allowed to a chosen few outside this\nhallowed Lutyens coven.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the\nNehru-Gandhi dynasty had ruled India for 50 years of its 67-year-old Independence,\nthere was no question of this status quo being challenged, at least not in its\ninner echelons of well-groomed power emanating from a pseudo-socialist\naristocracy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing&nbsp; beats the delusions of grandeur , the slimy\nantics of the glib talkers of the St Stephen\u2019s Club, such as Shashi Tharoor,\nand Mani Shankar Aiyar.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both are\ndiplomats turned politicians glib in English&nbsp; ( both are PEA BRAINED says Vadakayil ) -- whose globe-trotting had endeared them to the\ninner chambers of Lutyens\u2019 Delhi as well as the international circuits of\npolitical \u201csoft power,\u201d where smooth talking ambassadors discuss national fates\nover Scotch whiskeys and French wines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sudden diktat by the\nMinistry of Human Resource Development announced that Sanskrit would replace\nGerman as the third language in more than 500 &nbsp;Kendriya Vidyalaya schools, to promote greater\nunderstanding of Indian culture.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immediately there was a hue and cry fron desh\ndrohi left-leaning liberal intelligentsia .. BEEG mistake, for we got to know\nwho the foreign funded traitors are. These desh drohis even got Angela Mekel to\narm twist Modi.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cIf you want to perpetually rule over India,\nestrange the Indians from their culture and civilization\u201d\u2014 Lord Macaulay<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY SHOULD WE HAVE TO\nLEARN THE STUPID LANGUAGE OF GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD INSTEAD OF OUR ANCIENT\nSANSKRIT --WHICH IS THE MOTHER OF ALL LANGUAGES ON THE PLANET ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.livemint.com/Politics/zAO13ZOZnyksdzYVZQ4f4H/Merkel-raises-German-teaching-issue.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.livemint.com/Politics/zAO13ZOZnyksdzYVZQ4f4H/Merkel-raises-German-teaching-issue.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WILL ANGELA BABY ALLOW\nANY FOREIGN LANGUAGE TO REPLACE GERMAN IN GERMANY ?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Why is nobody\nasking why Lutyens DEEP STATE operative Kabil Sibal , the slave of the Italian\nwaitress , surreptitiously swapped Sanskrit out and swapped German in to the\ncurriculum in 2011?&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lutyens lobbyist Nira Radia\nrepresented both Mukesh Ambani and Ratan Tata, and effort was to keep the DMKs\nDayanidhi Maran out of the telecom portfolio and to ensure that it went to A Raja\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ratan Tata &nbsp;moved the Supreme Court protesting against the\ninvasion of his privacy resulting from the leaks of his telephone\nconversations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BELOW: CROOKS LOVE PRIVACY !</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dyYPgGLte4w/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/dyYPgGLte4w?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Radia tapes show\ncorporate lobbying.&nbsp; The lobbyist is\nnothing without corporate backing and media support. &nbsp;Corporates are able to influence cabinet\nformation for profits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN THE US TV SERIAL \u201cHOUSE\nOF CARDS\u201d A CORPORATE LOBBYIST &nbsp;WAS A BLACK MAN WITH A HUGE DONG, WHO\nFUCKED HIS WAY EVERYWHERE INSIDE THE WHITE HOUSE ..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tKK1Eo1Nn50/Wzm5Xo2e1tI/AAAAAAABcl4/gy_UDrwmv8E6CWnUTrSV4Sf6Za3c5rddQCLcBGAs/s1600/iSSmage.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"469\" data-original-width=\"366\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tKK1Eo1Nn50/Wzm5Xo2e1tI/AAAAAAABcl4/gy_UDrwmv8E6CWnUTrSV4Sf6Za3c5rddQCLcBGAs/s640/iSSmage.jpg\" width=\"498\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Radia tapes,\nsenior columnist Vir Sanghvi is heard asking Radia \u201cWhat kind of story do you\nwant,\u201d regarding the Ambani gas battle. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He advertises his own\ncolumn Counterpoint as \u201cmost-most read\u201d and therefore the ideal place to put\nacross Mukesh Ambani\u2019s point of view. He is then heard taking detailed\ninstructions from Radia on how the story should be structured, with her\ncorrecting him on various nuances of phrase and presentation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a follow up call, he\ntells her the article has been written, and \u201cI\u2019ve dressed it up as a piece\nabout how public will not stand for resources being cornered, how we\u2019re\ncreating a new list of oligarchs\u2026 It\u2019s dressed up as a plea to Manmohan Singh,\nso it won\u2019t look like an inter-Ambani battle except to people in the know.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.outlookindia.com/website/story/the-vir-sanghvi-niira-radia-tapes/268066\">https://www.outlookindia.com/website/story/the-vir-sanghvi-niira-radia-tapes/268066</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/kleptocracy-in-india-lobbying-pimping.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/kleptocracy-in-india-lobbying-pimping.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Barkha Dutt is heard\nagreeing to act as a courier between the Kanimozhi-Raja faction of DMK, lobbied\nfor by Radia, and the Congress. &nbsp;Radia is\nheard telling someone that \u201cBarkha has got the Congress to issue a statement.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rajdeep Sardesai\nconducted a debate on his channel CNN-IBN on whether or not corporate lobbying\nshould be legitimized.&nbsp; &nbsp;Among the several \u2018tweets\u2019 that he claimed had\nbeen sent by viewers expressing their opinions on the debate, it was later\nrevealed that several of the tweets were fake \u2013 and no prizes for guessing that\nall the &nbsp;fake tweets were &nbsp;in favour of corporate lobbying!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Benami media are deeply\nin the pockets of corporations \u2013 and therefore obligingly \u2018dress up\u2019 corporate\ninterest in the garb of \u2018national interest,\u2019 fake public opinion and even\nobligingly carry messages from corporate lobbies to ruling parties in order to\nhelp install the Minister desired by the corporate lobby.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Union Minister for\nCorporate Affairs Salman Khurshid mooted the idea of legitimized corporate\nlobbying.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corporate lobbying is\nnothing but crony capitalism personified. The &nbsp;leaked tapes reveal the many lines of\ninfluence from Radia to virtually every institution of the state and public\nlife \u2013 from ministers, parties, to judges and mediapersons. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But this is only a tip\nof the iceberg. A huge number of corporate lobbying agencies wield this kind of\nenormous clout, shaping public policy and public opinion alike. Be it\ninfrastructure, energy, telecom, mining or military deals, agribusiness, seeds,\ncivil aviation, retail trade, education etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MNCs and Indian\ncorporations have powerful lobbies active that influence science policy, court\nverdicts, laws passed in Parliament, debates in Parliament, media coverage,\neven, as the taped conversations reveal, orchestrated \u201caction\u201d by pliant NGOs\non certain occasions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corporate lobbyists influence\nforeign policy, industrial policy, agricultural policy, education \u2013 every\naspect of life and society \u2013 to open it up for MNCs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot be na\u00efve\nenough to believe (as Tata or Salman Khurshid would have us do) that lobbyists\nare simply doing a legitimate \u2018PR\u2019 job, but that is not true<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Theirs is a job that relies\non cultivating a vast network of people who will do their bidding \u2013 and\ncorruption is an inevitable and essential part of such cultivation. The Bofors\nscandal had highlighted the role of middlemen in military contracts; now\nmiddlemen are being legitimized and rehabilitated as \u2018lobbyists\u2019 on a scale\nthen unimaginable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cash for questions\nscandal in Parliament is another manifestation of the way such lobbying\nvitiates democracy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is also the\nphenomenon of corporate lawyers doubling as political leaders and state\nfunctionaries \u2013 Chid baby and Abhi sex maangtha Singhvi \u2013 taking the corporate\nstranglehold on democracy to a higher plane altogether!</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stung by the Radia\ntapes implicating his own lobbyist Niira Radia in the country\u2019s worst ever\ncorruption scandal, Ratan Tata had chosen to act the injured martyr .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HDFC CEO Deepak Parekh\nsaid that \u201cthe India story is at risk, the PM must act\u201d: i.e, MNCs would take\nfright if the spectre of phone taps (and presumably stern action for violation\nof laws of land) awaited them in India.&nbsp;\n\u201cWe had really taken off and we were the darling of the Western world,\nof the multinationals, everyone wants to invest in India and suddenly there\u2019s a\nsnap... it has really taken the wind off our ambitions and I am very\ndisappointed.\u201d &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Radia tapes were a\nparticularly powerful and graphic demonstration of crony capitalism at work.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That\ncorporations influence government policy, ensure appointment of pliant\nMinisters, pay off judges and control how respected mediapersons represent the\nnews can no longer be dismissed as some wild&nbsp;\nconspiracy theory&nbsp; ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the wake\nof Radia gate tapes &nbsp;corporate forces rallied\nwith the hep of benami media to muddy the waters and obfuscate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The corporate barons\nand their media whores &nbsp;erecting a\nsmokescreen to make it appear as though it is the corporate sector that is the\nreal victim of crony capitalism, and what is at stake is the dream of\nliberalized India!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the \u2018license quota\nraj,\u2019 the nature of corruption was such that in the main, the beneficiaries of\ncorruption were Ministers and bureaucrats who took bribes; corporate houses\nwhich gave the bribes argued that they would be denied licenses and other\nlegitimate dues if they refused to pay bribes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, in the liberalized\neconomy, the nature of corruption is different. Liberalized state policy\ndemands that corporate interests be appeased and wooed \u2013 by making (and often\nbreaking) laws to \u2018free\u2019 land, minerals, water, and other resources from the\ncontrol of people or the state, and hand them over at throwaway prices to be\nexploited by corporates; in addition to massive tax breaks, write-offs of loans\nand other revenues due from corporates, and other massive sops. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the corporations,\ntherefore, what is at stake is mind-bogglingly lucrative resources at cheap\ncosts, and massive giveaways and waivers. These gifts, giveaways and waivers\nplay a secret but most significant role in the spectacular rise in wealth of\nIndian CEOs who have made it to the world\u2019s list of billionaires.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even a half wit knows\ntoday for whom Niira Radia was working for when she fixed Raja\u2019s appointment as\ntelecom minister.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The beneficiaries of\nthe scam include companies like Swan (a front for Reliance) and Unitech (a real\nestate company with no previous interests in telecom) which, in spite of\nfailing to fulfil DoT guidelines for issue of licenses, bagged the Spectrum\nallotment (out of turn) for a mere Rs. 1651 crore, and then within a matter of\nsix months made a killing by selling off shares to foreign companies at the\nprevailing market rate, making at least 700% return on their \u2018investment\u2019!&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other beneficiaries\ninclude Anil Ambani\u2019s Reliance Communications and Tata\u2019s Tata Teleservices\nwhich, in 2008, secured GSM and CDMA licences at prices fixed in 2001. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tata Group, like\nUnitech and Swan, also sold 25% of Tata Teleservices shares to NTT Docomo at\nmarket price for about Rs. 13,000 crore.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clearly, Tata too was\namong the beneficiaries of Raja\u2019s favours in the telecom scam, along with\nAmbani and others. But while Tata is by no means the sole beneficiary of the\nmulti-crore scam, it is clear that Radia was working for none but Tata in\nsecuring Raja\u2019s appointment as Minister. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Radia was a lobbyist\nfor Mukesh Ambani also, and pulled similar strings for him in the gas episode,\nbut when it came to telecom, it seems she was representing Tata alone. I</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">n one\nof the tapes, an unidentified person asks Ms Radia, why \u201cyou people [i.e. the\nMukesh Ambani group represented by Radia] are supporting [Raja] like anything ...\nwhen the younger brother [Anil Ambani] is the biggest beneficiary of the so\ncalled spectrum allocation?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Radia replied, \u201cIssue\nbahut complex hai\u2026Mere client Tatas bhi beneficiary rahein hain (The issue is\nvery complex\u2026 my client, the Tatas, have also been a beneficiary).\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crimes like corruption\nand corporate loot cannot be protected by the \u2018right to privacy.\u2019 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The public have every\nright to know what illegal deals are being made by corporate lobbyists like\nRadia, and for whom.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If Tata claims to be\nhonest and righteous, why did he buy underpriced licenses and sell them later\nat a profit? Why does he not today propose that all the companies that\nbenefited from under-priced spectrum and GSM/CDMA licenses pay the difference\nbetween market rate and their own purchase rate, setting an example himself?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of course, Anil Ambani\nis no less a beneficiary of the telecom scam, not only by securing under-prices\nlicense, but securing spectrum through the front company Swan and selling it at\na profit. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Radia empire did not\nextend only to telecom, however. The tapes reveal her intervention in the\nAnil-Mukesh Ambani battle over gas, and her nexus with a whole web of\nministers, MPs and mediapersons to ensure that a massive tax concession&nbsp; in natural gas be granted retrospectively to\nMukesh Ambani, securing him a profit of Rs. 81, 000 crore---</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u2013 but also \u2018killing\u2019\nany stories in the media about this super profit, and instead promoting stories\nthat project Mukesh Ambani\u2019s interest to be coterminous with \u201cnational\ninterest\u201d and protection (rather than profit) from a \u201cnational resource.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To ensure Mukesh\u2019s edge\nin this battle for super profits, not only ruling party leaders obliged (in the\ntapes, Mukesh is quoted by a fixer to say, \u2018Ab Congress to apni dukan hai\u2019) but\neven the main opposition party itself obliged, selecting a lead speaker in\nParliament who would deliver a line scripted by the Mukesh lobby!&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Walk the Talk\ninterview by Shekhar Gupta, aired on NDTV, Ratan Tata, in his eloquent warning\nagainst turning into a \u2018banana republic,\u2019 said, \u201cif we under the guise of\nfreedom of speech, or of any number of other so-called rights of democracy,\nabuse the luxury of democracy,\u201d India would turn into a country where people\n\u201cgo to jail without adequate evidence, or their bodies are found in the trunks\nof cars\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is interesting that\nTata refers to the \u201cfreedom of speech,\u201d democratic rights and democracy itself\nas a \u201cluxury\u201d! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The peasants of Singur\nand tribals of Kalinganagar could give Tata a lesson or two about the kind of\nworld where activists and political dissidents challenging powerful corporate\ninterests like land grab \u201cgo to jail without evidence,\u201d are found dead in\nfields, or are simply shot dead by police in cold blood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protest against\ncorporate land grab to protect livelihood and survival is a \u201cluxury of\ndemocracy\u201d that peasants and tribals do not deserve \u2013 while super-rich\ncorporates like Tata enjoy the \u2018democratic right to privacy\u2019 and can go to\ncourt to get evidence suppressed in the name of \u2018protecting privacy.\u2019</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tata would probably\nlike the US model of democracy where super-rich and powerful corporations enjoy\nthe same \u2018rights\u2019 as persons \u2013 and use that \u2018right\u2019 to subvert the rights of\nordinary citizens and buy up elections.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rjEY2sZ7r00/Wzn5-3q7ozI/AAAAAAABcnA/M6g5WkJU_C8IDgUDNBMP-0fP2JhQZwvUQCLcBGAs/s1600/PaUCL.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"340\" data-original-width=\"570\" height=\"380\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rjEY2sZ7r00/Wzn5-3q7ozI/AAAAAAABcnA/M6g5WkJU_C8IDgUDNBMP-0fP2JhQZwvUQCLcBGAs/s640/PaUCL.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4788113659276706240\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_35M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1530516666129#c4788113659276706240\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 2, 2018 at 1:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_35MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">WE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO BAN THE DESH DROHI ORG NAMED PUCL WHICH HAS DEEP STATE LINKS.</span><br />\n<br />\nNAXALITE THINKER Binayak Sen, is the National Vice-President of the Union and General Secretary of its Chhattisgarh unit.<br />\n<br />\nBinayak Sen was arrested in May 2007 by security agencies for his links with Maoists.<br />\n<br />\n##################<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJanuary 23, 2014 at 9:43 PM<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS THIS NEW DARLING KAVITA SRIVASTAVA OF FOREIGN FUNDED INDIAN MEDIA ?<br />\n<br />\nHuman rights activist and foreign funded People's Union for Civil Liberties (PUCL) general secretary Kavita Srivastava, Kavita Srivastava's is a naxal sponsor and supporter.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nShe wants human rights for anti-nationals and terrorists\u2014and is one of the moth eaten faces on prime time TV.<br />\n<br />\nMost PUCL office-bearers are involved in activities helping terrorist and separatist forces in the name of 'human rights . She has been advocating abolition of death penalty for terrorists.<br />\n<br />\nPUCL have advocated 'clemency' for terrorists like Afzal Guru. The organisation supported Rajiv Gandhi's assassins and sandalwood brigand Veerappan's aides.<br />\n<br />\nPUCL lies again and again, \u201cAs a matter of policy, the PUCL does not accept money from any funding agency, Indian or foreign. All the expenses are met by the members, the office-bearers, and the activists. The govt security agencies have ALREADY traced her /PUCLs source of foreign funds.<br />\n<br />\nKavita Srivastava, PUCL is No 1 in the list of people asking for resignation of AAP Law minister who raided a Nigerian/ Ugandan sex and drugs den.<br />\n<br />\nKavita Srivastava is a vehement supporter of Gay rights and gay marriages.<br />\n<br />\nShe was a anti-Kudankulam nuclear plant protestor and has been campaigning for nuclear disarmament of India..<br />\n<br />\nShe has campaigned against the Indian army using land mines on the terrorist infiltration prone Indo-Pakistan border.<br />\n<br />\nThe People's Union of Civil Liberties (PUCL), launched www.pheku.in, a website that serves to \u201cexpose\u201d Gujarat Chief Minister Narendra Modi and \u201crestore democracy.\u201d\u2014supported by Mahesh Bhatt ( a rabid Muslim with a Hindu name ), Harsh mander, Mallika Sarabhai etc.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThe unique combination of Modi's authoritarianism, his deeply communal record, and his ability to lie smoothly is the fertile ground on which pheku.in will flourish,\u201d said PUCL national secretary Kavita Srivastava.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n#####################################<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nYOGI ADITYANATH<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BELOW: KAVITA SRIVASTAVA&nbsp;</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UxtRmtJkGy8/Wzn7ADc0jzI/AAAAAAABcnM/zTZQXlqIe1glUIqzbdLbkp9_87aG29_mACLcBGAs/s1600/haaqdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"360\" data-original-width=\"480\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UxtRmtJkGy8/Wzn7ADc0jzI/AAAAAAABcnM/zTZQXlqIe1glUIqzbdLbkp9_87aG29_mACLcBGAs/s640/haaqdefault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BELOW: DR BINAYAK SEN, NATIONAL VP OF PUCL</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VC9RQbnWPo4/Wzn7iwvPJrI/AAAAAAABcnU/vQHR_ZAxQqgN0JmrbAfUcSE7xLPu4eimgCLcBGAs/s1600/banayaksenkoodankulam.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"518\" data-original-width=\"740\" height=\"448\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VC9RQbnWPo4/Wzn7iwvPJrI/AAAAAAABcnU/vQHR_ZAxQqgN0JmrbAfUcSE7xLPu4eimgCLcBGAs/s640/banayaksenkoodankulam.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE DEEP STATE SPONSORS\nPUCL AND NAXAL THINKER BINAYAK SEN ..&nbsp; CHECK OUT HIS CLOUT..&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">JEW NOAM CHOMSKYs KOSHER HEART MELTED&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.thehindu.com/opinion/op-ed/Nobel-laureates-rally-behind-Binayak-Sen/article15165670.ece\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.thehindu.com/opinion/op-ed/Nobel-laureates-rally-behind-Binayak-Sen/article15165670.ece</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/Chomsky-Romila-Thapar-80-others-condemn-conviction-of-Sen/article15611966.ece\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/Chomsky-Romila-Thapar-80-others-condemn-conviction-of-Sen/article15611966.ece</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">URBAN NAXALS WERE AT TUTICORIN FOR THE VIOLENT STERLITE PROTESTS .</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.nationalheraldindia.com/india/full-text-of-pucl-statement-on-sterlite-vedanta-firing-condemning-jallianwala-bagh-like-killings-in-thoothukudi-by-tamil-nadu-police-on-may-22-\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.nationalheraldindia.com/india/full-text-of-pucl-statement-on-sterlite-vedanta-firing-condemning-jallianwala-bagh-like-killings-in-thoothukudi-by-tamil-nadu-police-on-may-22-</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>WE ASK MODI, AJIT DOVAL AND RAJNATH SINGH\u2014&nbsp; PROFILE EVERY MEMBER OF PUCL.. &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>DO NARCO TEST AND FIND OUT THE <span style=\"color: blue;\">DEEP STATE JUDGES </span>/ <span style=\"color: red;\">JNU-JU- TISS </span>THINKERS&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE MUST SNUFF OUT URBAN NAXALISM &nbsp;BEFORE IT CAN TAKE ROOT..</b> <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://www.pucl.org/bulletins/2017/PUCLdec2017.pdf\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://www.pucl.org/bulletins/2017/PUCLdec2017.pdf</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is hardly a part\nof government that hasn't been invaded by lobbyists. &nbsp;Former Lutyens babus who have taken bribes from\nlobbyists have taken up jobs or becoming partners in entities whose clients\nbenefited from decisions they took while handling key government policy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nbecome lobbyists themselves .. Many times the security don\u2019t even know that\nthese babus have retired and have become middlemen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lobbying is done by\nmany types of people, foreign funded NGOs, associations and organized groups,\nincluding individuals in the private sector, corporations, fellow legislators\nor government officials, or advocacy groups (interest groups).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lobby groups may\nconcentrate their efforts on the legislatures, where laws are created, but may\nalso use the judicial branch to advance their causes. They may use a legal\ndevice known as amicus curiae, literally \"friend of the court,\"\nbriefs to try to influence court cases.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Briefs are written documents filed with\na court, typically by parties to a lawsuit. Amici curiae briefs are briefs\nfiled by people or groups who are not parties to a suit. These briefs are\nentered into the court records, and give additional background on the matter\nbeing decided upon. Advocacy groups use these briefs both to share their\nexpertise and to promote their positions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lobbying industry\nis affected by the revolving door concept, a movement of personnel between\nroles as legislators and regulators and the industries affected by the\nlegislation and regulation, as the main asset for a lobbyist is contacts with\nand influence on government officials.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This industrial climate is attractive\nfor ex-government officials. It can also mean substantial monetary rewards for\nthe lobbying firms and government projects and contracts in the hundreds of\nmillions for those they represent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India, where there is no law regulating\nthe process, lobbying had traditionally been a tool for industry bodies (like\nFICCI) and other pressure groups to engage with the government ahead of the\nnational budget.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One reason being that lobbying activities were repeatedly\nidentified in the context of corruption cases. For example, in 2010 , leaked\naudio transcripts of Nira Radia.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not only private companies but even Indian\ngovernment has been paying a fee every year since 2005 to a US firm to lobby;\nfor ex. to the Indo-US civilian nuclear deal. In India, there are no laws that\ndefined the scope of lobbying, who could undertake it, or the extent of\ndisclosure necessary.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Companies are not mandated to disclose their activities\nand lobbyists are neither authorized nor encouraged to reveal the names of\nclients or public officials they have contacted.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The distinction between l</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">obbying and bribery\nstill remains unclear. In 2012, Walmart revealed it had spent $25 million since\n2008 on lobbying to \"enhance market access for investment in India.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This disclosure, which came weeks after the Indian government made a\ncontroversial decision to permit FDI in the country's multi-brand retail\nsector.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lobbyists also work to change public opinion through advertising\ncampaigns or by influencing 'opinion leaders'. In India we see lobbyists coming\non TV as perception molders.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In USA there are more than 10,250 registered\nlobbyists at the state and federal levels. President Ulysses S. Grant coined\nthe term lobbyist in the early 1800s. Grant had a fondness for the Willard\nHotel lobby in Washington DC and people would approach him there to discuss\nindividual causes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lobbyist has a\nsuperior sense of smell, good at sniffing out opportunities to trap people. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are many East\nEuropean whores in Delhi who are used a honey traps . It is east to snare a\nugly potbellied&nbsp; babu whom a decent\nattractive woman will not spit on \u2014 nay\u2014fart on his fuckin' face .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/01/of-honey-traps-and-pots-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/01/of-honey-traps-and-pots-capt-ajit.html</a></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-retb5cz8aHI/Wzn4ip27zlI/AAAAAAABcm0/N1gIanC0O6kfIvyOxpB6kKiZxW9Jy1v_wCLcBGAs/s1600/doswnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"668\" data-original-width=\"500\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-retb5cz8aHI/Wzn4ip27zlI/AAAAAAABcm0/N1gIanC0O6kfIvyOxpB6kKiZxW9Jy1v_wCLcBGAs/s640/doswnload.png\" width=\"478\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gifts could range from\nsilver glasses to gold ornaments, from mobile phones to laptops, depending on\nthe contact's net worth in the lobbyist's eyes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lobbyist becomes\nexceedingly active in election season. During the last Lok Sabha elections, the\nmarket buzz was about two corporate giants who had allegedly pumped more than\nRs 725 crore into a political outfit.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One industrialist was believed to have\ncontributed Rs 100 crore to a party not in power.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the lobbyist is nothing if not impartial.\nHe spreads his favours. Contributions are not restricted to any one party. If a\nbusiness house is to maintain hassle-free operations, it has to fund both\nPandavas and Kauravas. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is one billionaire\nbrother duo who pretend to be enemies in public ..&nbsp; They make sure they have Pandavas and &nbsp;Kauravas protecting their family interests ..\nThey extract secrets on who is targeting their family from both sides. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAJJA HAI KISSI OH KUCH CH NAHIN PATHA !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is hardly a part\nof government that hasn't been invaded by lobbyists. &nbsp;Former Lutyens babus who have taken bribes from\nlobbyists have taken up jobs or becoming partners in entities whose clients\nbenefited from decisions they took while handling key government policy. They\nbecome lobbyists themselves .. Many times the security don\u2019t even know that\nthese babus have retired and have become middlemen.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5691650115597525143\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_58M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
