, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">LOK SABHA WAS USED BY BOTH BJP AND CONGRESS&nbsp; TO REGULARIZE INSTITUTIONAL FRAUD.. ALLOWING\nDESH DROHI FOREIGN FORCES TO FUND INDIAN POLITICAL PARTIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHY BLAME AAP AND COMMUNIST PARTY FOR TAKING\nDESH DROHI FOREIGN FUNDS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WILL ANY FOREIGN FORCE GIVE FUNDS TO ANY\nINDIAN POLITICAL PARTY( AS BAIT WORM ON FISHING HOOK ) WITHOUT HUNDRED FOLD\nFAYADA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Parliament had passed the Finance Bill\n2018 in March 2018 during the budget session. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">As per this Bill passed in a MOST SLIMY\nMANNER IN WHICH THE SPEAKER OF THE LOK SABHA IS COMPLICIT &nbsp;would be effective not from 2010 but from\nAugust 1976. This is the date when the FCRA commenced but was repealed by the\n2010 Act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Bill&nbsp;\namended the FCRA 2010 that allows political parties to accept foreign\nfunds. Earlier, it was prohibited under the Act. The Foreign Contribution\nRegulation Act, enacted originally in 1976, prohibits political parties from\naccepting contributions from foreign companies/sources.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">INDIRA GANDHI KNEW OF THE MASSIVE ZIONIST\nDEEP STATE FOREIGN FUNDS INJECTED INTO INDIA TO BRING HER GOVT DOWN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The bill amended the Finance Act of 2016\nwhich itself had amended Foreign Contribution (Regulation) Act (FCRA) 2010 to\nchange the definition of a foreign source of funding in a way that enabled the\nBJP and the Congress to get off the hook in a Delhi High Court judgment of\nMarch 2014.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The amendment made in FCRA 2010 \"vide\nthe Finance Act 2016\" was already under challenge before the supreme court\n&nbsp;and when matter is sub-judice, the\nParliament by the Finance Act, 2018 has made amendments in a MOST SLIMY MANNER with\nretrospective effect from 1976.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The FCRA was passed in 2010 but the Centre\nhas amended it with retrospective effect so that the Act will now be applicable\nfrom much before the original FCRA came into existence-this is FRAUD which is\npunishable<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is worth repeating the same story again ,\nto make it crystal clear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Foreign Contributions Regulation Act\n(FCRA) had prohibited Indian political parties from receiving funds from\nsponsors based abroad till the government dropped the restriction in 2016 using\nthe finance bill that year.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">This year in 2018, the BJP government made the\nchange retrospective \u2014 making legal any foreign funds that political parties\nillegally received before 2016.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">This 2018&nbsp;\namendment is a covert attempt to overturn the judgment passed by the\nDelhi High Court in March 2014 holding the two major political parties, BJP and\nINC, guilty of accepting foreign funding.&nbsp;\nThe Delhi High Court had ordered the Central Government and Election\nCommission of India to take action against BJP and Congress within six months.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Entry number 217 in Part XIX of the\namendments in the 2018 finance Bill (Amendment to the Finance Act, 2016), which\nreads : \u201cIn the Finance Act, 2016, in section 236, in the opening paragraph,\nfor the words, figures and letters \u2018the 26th September, 2010, the words, figures\nand letters \u2018the 5th August, 1976\u2019 shall be substituted<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prior to the latest change, foreign funds\nreceived by a political party before September 26, 2010, when the FCRA was\nenacted, were open to scrutiny. With the latest amendment, the Government has,\nin effect, ensured that funds received by political parties since 1976 cannot be\nscrutinised.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE AMENDMENT IN MARCH 2018 WAS BULLDOZED\nTHROUGH WITHOUT ANY DISCUSSION IN LOK SABHA\u2014FOR WHICH THE LOK SABHA SPEAKER\nMUST BE PUNISHED AND MADE TO RESIGN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Arun Jaitley moved the Finance Bill, which\nconsists of taxation proposals of the Budget, and the Appropriation Bill, which\ndetails the spending for each department, and had them passed through a voice\nvote in a House where the ruling alliance has absolute majority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The government used the \u201cguillotine\u201d process,\nby which all outstanding demands are put to vote at once whether or not they\nhave been discussed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">While the two Bills &nbsp;go to the Rajya Sabha, the Upper House does\nnot have powers to make changes to them, as they are Money Bills and will be\nconsidered approved if it does not return them within 14 days.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The President of India can assent or withhold\nhis assent to a Bill, or return a Bill for reconsideration, his powers do not\nextend to the Money Bill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">BUT HEY, THE PRESIDENT HAS BEEN GIVEN\nSUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS BY OUR CONSTITUTION , TO PREVENT SUBVERSION OF\nDEMOCRACY OR SCUTTLING OF PARLIAMENTARY PROCESSES \u2014 TO PREVENT MISUSE OF\nABSOLUTE MAJORITY BY A PARTY ( IN THE PAYROLL OF DESH DROHI FOREIGN FORCES.)..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">HIS RADAR MUST BE SWITCHED ON WHEN THE LOK SABHA SPEAKER APPLIES THE GUILLOTINE\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The guillotine, &nbsp;is an emergency measure to be used when time\nis short and key legislations need to be passed. Here this provision was used\nwith ULTERIOR MOTIVE..&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Budget session was to go on till April 6.\nWhat was the tearing fuckin\u2019 hurry to pass the Union Budget of the country\nwithin an hour, without any discussion?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">To protect Bharatmata the critical amendment\nto the Foreign Contribution Regulation Act (FCRA), which allows the BJP and the\nCongress to escape legal scrutiny for foreign contribution they have received\nsince 1976 should have been trashed out threadbare on the floor of Lok Sabha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The BJP government\u2019s reasoning for using the\nguillotine supposedly is that the Opposition has stalled the proceedings of the\nHouse with protests over various issues, and would delay the passing of the\nFinance Bill.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">If so why is the Congress in cahoots. Are we to say that Congress\nMPs suddenly became MANDHA BUDDHIS ??<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is not lost on any desh bhakt that BJP took\nits absolute majority as the licence to run its writ in the Parliament,\nsubverting the country\u2019s democracy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 2017 &nbsp;too, the Finance Bill had been streamrollered\nthrough the Parliament, and the BJP had faced accusations of \u201csmuggling in\u201d\nseveral key amendment without adequate discussion \u2013 Jaitley introduced 30 pages\nof amendments less than 48 hours before the legislation was taken up for\nscrutiny.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jaitley had, in fact, famously\nmade his distaste for the Rajya Sabha known by saying that \u201cthe Indian\ndemocracy cannot be a tyranny of the unelected\u201d, though he himself is an MP\nfrom the Upper House.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; (stop killing ZE\ndemocracy).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=378&amp;v=KCkYRBhjrI8\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=378&amp;v=KCkYRBhjrI8</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">1976 was the year white JEWS flooded money in\nIndia to bring down Indira Gandhi <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHY BRING DOWN INDIRA GANDHI ?&nbsp; SO THAT ROTHSCHILD CAN BRING BACK HIS BANKS\nINTO INDIA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SIKHS WERE MERE PAWNS IN MURDERING INDIRA\nGANDHI..HER FATE WAS SEALED THE MINUTE SHE THREW OUT ROTHSCHILD AND HIS PRIVATE\nBANKS.. THE BANKS WERE NATIONALIZED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The amendment added the applicability of the\nproviso added by the Finance Act, 2016 retrospectively from 1976, instead of\n2010. The Ministry of Finance notified the Finance Act, 2018 amending FCRA 2010\nwith effect from 1976.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">What makes the amendments all the more\ncontentious is the fact they were both passed as Money Bills, i.e. through the Finance\nBill of 2016 and the Finance Bill of 2018. This means that these amendments\nwere only passed in the Lok Sabha (dominated by the BJP), thereby bypassing the\nRajya Sabha altogether.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Narendra Modi government effectively made\ncorporate funding of political parties more opaque, contrary to its promise of\nbringing in more transparency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3536662133889708523\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_136M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1530684131038#c3536662133889708523\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 4, 2018 at 11:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_136MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/relief-for-aap-supreme-court-says-delhi-lieutenant-governor-cant-act-independently/articleshow/64850784.cms</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WHAT A DISGRACE. \u2026 THE SUPREME COURT HAS ERRED TODAY \u2026<br /><br />WE THE PEOPLE WARN THE SUPREME COURT.... YOU HAVE NO POWERS TO CURB THE CONSTITUTIONAL POWERS OF THE LT GOVERNOR OF DELHI...&nbsp; &nbsp;IF AT ALL THIS HAS TO BE DONE IT CAN BE DONE ONLY BY THE ELECTED REPRESENTATIVES OF THE PEOPLE..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARVIND KEJRIWAL THINKS THAT BEING CM OF DELHI IS LIKE BEING CM OF UP...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE CM OF DELHI IS A WEE POST ...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Lieutenant Governor of Delhi is the constitutional head of the National Capital Territory of Delhi.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Other governors of Indian state and union territories have lesser powers than the Lt Gov of Delhi, as it is the Capital of India having foreign embassies ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE CAPITAL OF INDIA NEED SPECIAL ATTENTION FOR SECURITY .. THIS HAS TO LIE WITH THE CENTRE ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Specifically for New Delhi, Lt Governor has additional powers (land,law and order,etc) considering the status of New Delhi. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A union territory(UT) by definition is centrally administered. Some UTs have legislative assembly and some do not. Delhi is a UT with a legislative assembly\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All decisions made by the legislative assemble require Lt Governor\u2019s approval-- this MUST remain..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">We know how kachra fuckin' waal got Khalistani suport / drug mafia for his 4 lok sabha seats in Punjab\u2026 ask Capt Amarinder Singh, he knows..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">Where there is a difference of opinion between assembly and the Lt Governor, the matter is referred to the president\u2026 </span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>not the CJI </b></span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">--read this line twice...</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Lt Gov of Delhi has vast SUBJECTIVE POWERS and DISCRETIONARY POWERS..</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The assembly can make laws on other issues apart from land,law and order,etc but they need Lt Gov approval. ..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Lt Governor is the judicial representative of the union territory. That means, if you file a law suit against Delhi, the defendant for the UT is Lt Governor..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LG of Delhi is also guided by the Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi Act, 1991, and the Transaction of Business of the Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi Rules, 1993\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">At the same time, Section 18 of the Act, which deals with \u201cExtent of legislative power\u201d of the Assembly, says that MLAs \u201cmay make laws for the whole or any part of the Union Territory with respect to any of the matters enumerated in the State List or the Concurrent List\u201d..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And Section 44 of the Act, which deals with the Council of Ministers and its working, says the Council of Ministers headed by a Chief Minister will \u201caid and advise the Administrator in the exercise of his functions in relation to matters with respect to which the Legislative Assembly of the Union Territory has power to make laws\u201d. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But there is a catch.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_136MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">The same clause also allows the LG to \u201cact in his DISCRETION\u201d in the matter of lawmaking, even though the Council of Ministers has the task of aiding and advising him\u2026</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AGAIN-- LT GOVERNOR HAS VAST POWERS OF SUBJECTIVE DISCRETION.. HE HAS MORE MOWERS THAN GOVERNORS OF STATES.. THIS SHALL REMAIN SO..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">The Delhi lieutenant governor does </b><b style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">NOT </span></b><b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">have to act on the aid and advice of the council of ministers of the state government.. Read this line twice .WHY IS OUR CJI SO IGNORANT ?</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Under Article 163, the governor has to act on the aid and advice of the council of minister except in the case where he has to exercise his subjective DISCRETION\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Land, police and public orders fall in the domain of the Centre and the Delhi Assembly cannot make laws with regard to these subject. We have hundreds of foreign embassies and these must be protected by CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE --not state controlled PANDU HAWALDARS , RAGADKE KHAINI MOONH MEIN DAALKE \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The officers posted in Delhi are from all-India cadres of the IAS, IPS and IRS and they listen to the directions of the LG alone..</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_136BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mariam baby\u2019s sister JEWESS Juliana was a doctor in the royal harem of Akbar. .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARMENIAN JEW ABDUL HAI WAS MADE THE CHIEF JUSTICE OF AKBARs EMPIRE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW Domingo Pires was a Portuguese interpreter of Akbar\u2019s court, and he was sent to Goa in September 1579 to present royal invitations to Jesuits JEWS to come to Akbar\u2019s court for religious discussions. .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By an imperial decree, Armenian merchants ( CRYPTO JEWS ) were exempted from paying taxes on the merchandise imported and exported by them, and they were also allowed to move around in the areas of the Mughal empire where entry of foreigners was otherwise prohibited..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Emperor Akbar (1556\u20131605), the Mughal emperor, invited Armenians to settle in Agra in the 16th century and by the middle of the 19th century, Agra had a sizeable Armenian population..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Upon the founding of the Armenian nation in 1991, many Armenian-Indians chose to return to their ancestral homeland. Now there are hardly 100 Armenians in India, mostly in Kolkata, where the Armenian College still functions..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Akbar\u2019s successors Jahangir (1605-1627 CE) and Shah Jahan (1628-1657 CE) continued to encourage more and more Armenians into their kingdoms....</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HARDLY ANYBODY KNOWS THAT MOGHUL EMERORS AFTER HUMAYUN ( BABURs SON ) WERE ALL JEWS..&nbsp; &nbsp;HUMAYUNs WIFE WAS A JEWESS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Humayun\u2019s wife and Akbar\u2019s mother was Hamida Banu Begum..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Here is an extract from Israeli tourism conversation booklet..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Empress Hamida Banu Begum, mother of the Emperor! Welcome, my dear. ( \u05d6\u05d0\u05ea \u05d0\u05de\u05d5 \u05e9\u05dc \u05de\u05dc\u05da \u05d4\u05d5\u05d3\u05d5 \u05d4\u05de\u05dc\u05db\u05d4 \u05d7\u05de\u05d9\u05d3\u05d4 \u05d1\u05d0\u05e0\u05d5 \u05d1\u05e8\u05d5\u05db\u05d4 \u05d4\u05d1\u05d0\u05d4 ) ...</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Brother of Armenian JEW Petrus Arratoon , JEW Gorgkin Khan was commander in Chief of the army of Mir Qasim\u2026</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Adam Smith used this PEARL HARBOUR or LOUSITANIA type cause to start the Battle of Plassey in 1757, for East India Company to take over India. The battle itself is a white lie. .</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The battle never took place. Siraj Ud Daula was killed before even a single shot was fired by his brother-in-law and army Commander Mir Jaffar, who was bribed by Rothschild employee Robert Clive..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mir Jaffar Ali Khan Bahadur ( died February 1765) was the first Najafi Nawab of Bengal with support from JEW Rothschild..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARMENIAN JEWS WERE ALL AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD, JEW SASSOON AND JEW APCAR ARRATOON IN THE OPIUM DRUG BUSINESS. THESE ARMENIAN JEWS PRETENDED TO BE CHRISTIANS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Armenians settled in Chinsurah, near Calcutta, West Bengal, and in 1697 built a Church there. This is the second oldest Church in Bengal .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW Mirza Zul Quarnain, was an adopted son of Akbar and his Armenian JEWESS wife. He was well versed in Malayalam and Portuguese..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Emperor Jahangir conferred on him the title of Amir. Mirza baby was a conduit for Jesuit JEWS in Goa. Mirza was also a poet, singer and playwright, and he composed verses in Urdu and Persian\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The oldest marker of Armenian presence in Kolkata is the tomb of an Armenian JEWESS Rezabeebeh Sookia..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Calcutta's famous landmarks, including Stephen Court on Park Street and Grand Hotel (today Oberoi Grand) are Opium money funded\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/drug-runners-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 1847, shortly after the Opium War, P&amp;O , Jardine and Apcar &amp;co ships were underwritten by Rothschild\u2019s Insurance company AIG ( I will come to this later )..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The trading company of Apcar &amp; Co. was founded in 1819 by Armenian JEW Arratoon Apcar.. He handled the Opium ( exports to China ) of JEW Rothschild and JEW Sassoon\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; Until P&amp;O began shipping opium from Calcutta in 1851, the trade was divided between Jardine Skinner and the Apcar Line..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Aratoon Apcar died at Calcutta in May 1863 at the age of 85..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Thomas of Cana was an Armenian JEW .. Pope Paul III spAke \u201cthere were no valid documents to demonstrate the existence of Christ.\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOW KNANAYA KERALA CHRISTIANS LISTEN UP\u2014AND LISTEN GOOD\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOU HAVE BEEN MISLED BY WIKIPEDIA AND JEW ROTHSCHILD TO THINK THAT YOU ARE CHRISTIANS / JEWS\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JUST LIKE THE NASRANIS YOU TOO CAME RUNNING TO KERALA BECAUSE YOUR ANCESTORS WERE BEING BURNt ALIVE ( AFTER CHRISTIANITY RELIGION WAS BORN IN 325 AD )\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOUR ANCESTORS CAME RUNNING TO MIZIRIS BY SHIP , ALONG WITH THOMAS OF CANA IN 345 AD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THOSE DAYS ESSENES OF CANAAN WERE BEING BURNT ALIVE FOR WORSHIPING KALI ( ASHERAH/ ASHTORETH / ASTHARTE )- ASHTA MEANS EIGHT ARMED KALI , THE GODDESS OF WAR\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AZTECS OF MEXICO WORSHIPED THE SAME GODDESS. IN KERALA SHE IS KNOWS AS BHAGAWATI \u2013OF THE KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHRISTINITY CAME TO CANAAN AREA IN PALESTINE VERY LATE\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You shall tear down their altars and smash their sacred pillars and burn their Ashterim with fire, and you shall cut down the engraved images of their gods and obliterate their name from that place. (Deuteronomy 12:3).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Israelites also worshiped Asherah from as early as the time immediately following the death of Joshua (Judges 2:13)\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Like how they got rid of Apollonius, the Christians and the Jews combined forces ( later joined by Muslims ) and destroyed every MULTI ARMED GOD IDOL in that entire area\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The term Knanaya derives from the name of Thomas of Cana ( Knai Thoma). He was NOT a Christian bishop-- he a Jew Armenian merchant. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">American International Group, Inc., also known as AIG, is an American multinational finance and insurance corporation with operations in more than 80 countries and jurisdictions. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AIG was in the Opium drug Marine insurance business ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AIG's corporate headquarters are in New York City and the company also has offices around the world. AIG serves 87% of the Fortune Global 500 and 83% of the Forbes 2000 On December 31, 2016 AIG had $76.3 billion in shareholder equity\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AIG reported the largest loss in corporate history, a record $61.7 billion in Q4 2008</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AIG was a central player in the financial crisis of 2008. It was bailed out by the federal government for $182 billion\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On September 16, 2008, the Federal Reserve provided an $85 billion two-year loan to AIG to prevent its bankruptcy.. After reporting this loss and taking the bailout, AIG paid $165 million in bonuses to its executives\u2026</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">AIG was founded 19 December 1919 by Jew Rothschild as American Asiatic Underwriters (AAU), in Shanghai, China for Marine insurance of his Opium ships , was housed in North China Daily News Building\u2026</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The North China Daily News owned by Jew Rothschild was the first English-language newspaper to be published in Shanghai, in 1850..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AIG\u2019s offshore center in India was set up in 2013 to support their global business by providing financial services, analytical and data solution capabilities. AIG in India has more than 1400 employees across Bangalore and Gurgaon\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tata AIG General Insurance Company Limited is an Indian general insurance company and a joint venture between the Tata Group and American International Group (AIG)\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SAALA KIDHAR SEH KIDHAR PAHUNCH GAYA APUN !...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_81b+seedpW7D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_81b+seedpW7D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4049747278593599133\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_209M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. YOU SEE KERALA MEN WANTED TO SEE THE BABY ..BRAAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYY...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE WOMAN WAS A MODEL..THE BABY WAS NOT HERS. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY WIFE SAID \" THIS IS A SIN\"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-india-43238253</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I WAS A SMALL BOY , MY PARENTS USED TO TAKE ME AND MY TWO ELDER SISTERS TO THE CALICUT EXHIBITION EVERY YEAR ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT WAS A LARGE GROUND WITH MANY STALLS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE WERE TWO STALLS WHICH HAD LONG QUEUES..BOTH RUN BY CALICUT MEDICAL COLLEGE FINAL YEAR STUDENTS WEARING WHITE COATS AND STETHOSCOPES.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE SHOWED A MOVIE ( 5 MINUTES LONG ) OF A WHITE WOMAN HAVING HER BREASTS EXAMINED FOR TUMORS.. BASICALLY FONDLING THE BREASTS..WITH PINK NIPPLES STANING OUT LIKE BULLETS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE OTHER STALL HAD TWO NAKED DEAD BODIES EMBALMED IN STINKING FORMALDEHYDE -- ONE MAN AND ONE WOMAN WITH AGED SKIN DARK BROWN .. THE MAN HAD A VERY LARGE PRICK AND THE WOMEN A LARGE TWAT AND BIG BREASTS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS SOON AS THE MALE MEDICAL STUDENT SEES A YOUNG GOOD LOOKING GIRL, HE WOULD HOLD THE MANs PRICK USING FORCEPS -SLIDE THE FORESKIN OVER THE GLANS AND LAUNCH INTO AN EXPLANATION OF HOW PURUSHABEEJAM ( SEMEN ) CAME OUT FROM THE PEE HOLE ORIFICE BLAH BHAH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SAME WHEN YOUNG MEN WENT TO THE DEAD FEMALE CADAVER, THE FEMALE MEDICAL STUDENT WOULD POKE HER FORCEPS INTO THE TWAT AND LAUNCH INTO AN EXPLANATION OF HOW THE SEMEN ENTERED THIS WAY AND HOW THE BABY IS BORN IN THE WOMB.. BLAH BLAH..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY KEPT ATTRACTIVE STUDENTS FOR THIS MORBID COMMENTARY ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">NEEDLESS TO SAY THE CYNOSURE OF ALL EYES WERE THE LARGE PRICK AND THE HAIRY TWAT.</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YES -- THIS IS THE ROT IN KERALA FOR YOU..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MEN WERE GETTING COLLECTIVE HARD ONs AND GIRLS WERE CREAMING FROM THEIR TWATS BY WATCHING THIS MORBID GRUESOME SCENE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY PARENTS NEVER BOUGHT A STALL TICKET SAYING IT IS NOT WORTH IT --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO I WENT WITH MY SCHOOL FRIEND.. ONLY ONCE \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOW DID KERALA AND BENGAL BECOME COMMUNIST HUBS ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_137BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_188M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530415378869#c4175653428974212085\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 1, 2018 at 8:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID YOU PUT A VIDEO OF YOURSELF DOING BICEPS CURLS WITH 25 KG DUMB BELLS?<br />\n<br />\nIS IT TO BOAST ABOUT YOUR BRUTE STRENGTH?<br />\n<br />\nOH BLIMEY-- NOW I HAVE TO LET GO ANOTHER OF MY LEADERSHIP SECRETS !<br />\n<br />\nIT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO PROVE YOU ARE BETTER THAN YOUR TEAM IN THE BRAINS DEPT .. PEOPLE JUST DONT ACCEPT IT..<br />\n<br />\nBUT IT IS VERY EASY TO PROVE THAT YOUR ARE FASTER THAN SOME ONE IN A SPRINT OR STRONGER IN A GYM...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">MAN IS STILL AN ANIMAL --ALBEIT A SOCIAL ONE</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU PROVE YOU ARE STRONGER THAN SOMEONE --HE HAS NO PROBLEMS IN ACCEPTING YOU ARE BETTER THAN HIM IN THE BRAINS DEPT..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE:<br />\n<br />\nA BRIT USED TO COME IN OUR GYM.. A VERY STRONG FELLOW-- TALLER THAN ME, HIS BICEPS WERE TWICE THE SIZE OF MINE , HE WAS ONE YEAR YOUNGER.<br />\n<br />\nONCE OR TWICE I HAD A CONVERSATION WITH HIM, HE GAVE ME THE FEELING THAT HE THINKS HE IS BETTER THAN ME IN THE BRAINS DEPT..<br />\n<br />\nI DO EXPERIMENTS ..<br />\n<br />\nI NOTICE THAT HE DID CURLS ON THE 25 KG DUMB BELLS - AND BEFORE DOING THAT HE TOOK OUT TWO HANDKERCHIEFS TO WRAP IT AROUND THE \" UNUSED HENCE SHARP \" KNURLED STEEL HANDLE..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID NOT HAVE HIS OWN GYM GLOVES WHICH COVERED THE FINGERS TOO ( BRUISING DIE TO SKIN GETTING SCRAPED OFF ) ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/dumb-bells-challenge-real-thing-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIT JUST PROVED HE WAS SERIOUS-- HE WOULD KEEP THE DUMB BELLS DOWN ONLY IF HIS BICEPS OR BACK HURT--NOT BECAUSE HIS PALM SKIN WAS HURTING ( THE WAY OTHER PRETENDED ).<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I DID THE 25 KG DUMB BELLS CURLS , I BROUGHT MY OWN HANDKERCHIEFS TO WRAP AROUND THE HANDLE.<br />\n<br />\nSO ONE DAY WHEN HE FINISHED ON THE 25 KG DUMBELLS --I ASKED HIM \"CAN I TAKE IT \" AND STARTED WRAPPING MY CLOTH PIECES .. HE WAS NOW WATCHING ME VIA THE MIRROR.<br />\n<br />\nI DID TWICE OF WHAT HE DID ON HALF THE TIME..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I LOOKED AT HIS FACE , IT WAS RED-- HE WAS EMBARRASSED ..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN MY YOUNGER SON DID THE MACHINES HE USUALLY DOES-- PUTTING ALL PINS AT HIGHEST NOTCH.. MY SON IS 1/3 OF HIS AGE AND HE WEIGHS 20 KGS MORE THAN HIM..<br />\n<br />\nHE AVOIDED THOSE MACHINES LIKE THE PLAGUE.. I HAD CRAMPED HIS COCKY STYLE<br />\n<br />\nI KNEW HE WAS FROM THE VILLAGE WHERE STONEHENGE IS BUILT. HE HAD TOLD ME THAT ALIENS BUILT THE STONEHENGE AS IT IS SUPERHUMAN..<br />\n<br />\nNOW THAT I HAD CRAMPED HIS STYLE-- I ASKED HIM, IF HE DID ICE SLEDGING AS A CHILD..<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID-- YES..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I TOLD HIM-- IF YOU GIVE ME THREE STRONG MEN , I DONT NEED ALIENS -I WILL BUILD THE SAME STRUCTURE.<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM--<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW THE STONE QUARRY FROM WHERE THE STONES WERE SOURCED.. IN WINTER I WOULD SLIDE IT DOWNHILL ON THE ICE AND FIT IT IN PLACE ..USING LONG LEVERS..<br />\n<br />\nHE KEPT QUIET<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I ASKED HIM-- DO YOU KNOW HOW MANY PORTALS ARE THERE..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID NOT KNOW.<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM-- 27 NAKSHATRAS ( PORTALS ) WITH 4 PADAS MADE THE NUMBER 108, AND THIS IS THE DIGITAL NUMBER OF OM, OUR HINDU KING MANTRA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DRUID SAGES WHO BUILT THE STONEHENGE WERE HINDUS..<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS QUIET FOR SOME TIME AND THEN HE SAID \" TODAY I HAVE LEARNT SOMETHING \"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mystery-of-stonehenge-solved-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS A CHANGE MANAGER AT SEA.. YOU CANNOT CHANGE ALL BY THE SAME WAY..BY SHOVING THINGS DOWN THE THROAT. YOU HAVE TO MAKE THEM BITE.<br />\n<br />\nALL MY DETRACTORS HAVE FALLEN BY THE WAY SIDE TODAY.. PEOPLE DONT ARGUE ANYMORE--WHEN I SAY THIS IS THE WAY THE COOKIE CRUMBLED..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY NO MUSLIM ARGUES WHEN I SAY THAT QUTAB MINAR IS A HINDU STRUCTURE<br />\n<br />\nQUTAB MINAR IS MEANT TO BE SEEN FROM TOP FROM A HOVERING HELICOPTER..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOP BRAHMA PLATFORM WAS UNSTABLE-- MEANT TO SHOW THE PRECESSION OF THE EARTH.. WHETHER WE ARE AT TAURUS OR ARIES OR PISCES OR AQUARIUS ( 24000 YEARS ).<br />\n<br />\nAT THE BASE WAS PORTALS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/miss-neat-little-goody-pants-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1530150187061#c3896117663028755091\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 28, 2018 at 7:13 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_197MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nCAPTAIN, WHY HAVE YOU REACTED SO STRONGLY IN THE TANVI SETH PASSPORT CASE ?\u2014<br />\n<br />\nIN AS MUCH AS YOU DECLARED \u201cSUSHMA SWARAJ, YOU ARE NOW HISTORY IN BJP ! \u201c<br />\n<br />\nIS IT OUT OF SYMPATHY TO THE PASSPORT OFFICER MISHRA WHO WAS PUNISHED UNFAIRLY ?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN-<br />\n<br />\nA HINDU WOMAN CONVERTS TO ISLAM\u2014 AND SHE GETS MARRIED TO A MUSLIM..<br />\n<br />\nSHE LIVES AS A MUSLIM FOR 11 YEARS \u2013 WITH ALL HER DOCUMENTS LIKE MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE, VOTER ID, AADHAR CARD, MISC SOCIAL DOCUMENTS IN HER MUSLIM NAME.<br />\n<br />\nNOW HEY-- SUDDENLY SHE WANTS A PASSPORT WITH HER ORIGINAL HINDU NAME ?<br />\n<br />\nEVERY INDIAN DESH BHAKT MUST ASK--- WHY ?<br />\n<br />\nAND SUDDENLY WITH THE HELP OF CLOSET COMMIE , ARNAB GOSWAMI ( WHO PRETENDS TO BE A GREAT MODI BHAKT NOWADAYS ) AND TIMES NOW TV CHANNEL OF MIDGET VINEET JAIN ( WHO PRETENDS TO BE A GREAT DESH BHAKT NOWADAYS ) , SHE GETS A PASSPORT IN A JIFFY.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">MISS NEAT LITTLE GOODY PANTS , HAS OVERDONE HER ACT OF PLAYING MOSES TO MUSLIMS.</span></div>\n<br />\nTANVI SETH NOW GETS A PASSPORT ..LIKE INSTANT GRITS ( IN MOVIE MY COUSIN VINNY )<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE SECURITY PROCEDURES FOR NATIONAL INTEREST ..<br />\n<br />\nNORTH KERALA ( MALAPPURAM DISTRICT ) IS TEEMING WITH BANGLADESIS AND ROHINGYAS WITH AADHAR CARDS AND PASSPORTS HAVING HINDU NAMES..<br />\n<br />\nMALAPPURAM IN KERALA WILL BE THE NEST KASHMIR\u2014ALREADY THEY WANT KERALA TO BE DIVIDED INTO NORTH AND SOUTH KERALA WITH SHARIA LAW IN NORTH KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nMINISTER OF EXTERNAL AFFAIRS HAS NO ABSOLUTE OWERS OVER A INDIAN PASSPORT .. THERE IS POLICE VERIFICATION AND THIS FALLS UNDER THE MINISTER OF HOME AFFAIRS RAJNATH SINGH.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE UNDERSTANDS WORLD INTRIGUE.<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">FOR THE PAST 400 YEARS \u2013 EVERY REVOLUTION, VIOLENT CHANGE OF REGIME , GENOCIDE, ETHNIC CLEANSING , MAJOR RELIGIOUS EVENT ETC HAS THE HIDDEN HAND OF JEWS BEHIND IT.</span></div>\n<br />\n## WHENEVER A CHRISTIAN IS ASHAMED OF BEING A CHRISTIAN-- SMALL POX BLANKET EXTERMINATION IN GOA / NORTH AND SOUTH AMERICA/ AUSTRALIA \u2013 INQUISITIONS --ETC<br />\n<br />\n## WHENEVER A MUSLIM IS ASHAMED OF BEING A MUSLIM\u2014 TAKE ANY EVENT \u2013 THE HIDDEN HAND OF THE JEW IS BEHIND IT.<br />\n<br />\n## WHENEVER A HINDU IS ASHAMED OF BEING A HINDU\u2014TAKE ANY EVENT\u2014THE HIDDEN HAND OF THE JEW IS BEHIND IT.<br />\n<br />\nGAAND MAARA TULSI NEH, PAKDE GAYE KABIR ???? ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ORIGINAL KOSHER DEEP STATE IS INVOLVED !!<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TELLS MODI\u2014 SLOW DOWN\u2014 JUST STOP THIS NEW THINGY OF HUGGING WHITE JEWS..<br />\n<br />\nI AM PENNING THE DEEP STATE SERIES FOR MODI AND TRUMP..<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS THE CEREBAL WHEREWITHAL ON THIS PLANET..BOTH ARE READING IT..<br />\n<br />\nGOA INQUISITION WAS DONE BY A JEW ( JESUIT CHRISTIAN ) NAMED FRANCIS XAVIER. .
