, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE THE PEOPLE ASK\nMODI...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SUMMON YOU STUPID\nI&amp;B MINISTER COL RATHORE AND WARN HIM --HE MUST DO HIS JOB OR FACE THE\nCONSEQUENCES...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE BENAMI MEDIA WRITES\nLIES ABOUT INDIA --AS REQUIRED BY THE FOREIGN MASTERS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHOLE IDEA IS TO\nPULL DOWN INDIA AND CREATE THE PERCEPTION THAT INDIA IS A SAVAGE NATION, UNFIT\nTO BE IN UNSC OR DO BUSINESS WITH...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DESH BHAKTS OF INDIA\nWHO PROTEST AGAINST THESE FOUL LIES BY FOREIGN PAYROLL TRAITORS&nbsp; ARE CALLED HINDUTVA TROLLS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHOSE JOB IS IT TO\nPROTECT BHARATMATA FROM FOULD SLANDER ?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS THE JOB OF THE\nI&amp;B MINISTRY AND COL RATHORE , THE MINISTER.. WHAT WE SEE IS COL RATHORE IS\nTHE DARLING OF BENAMI MEDIA...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA IS NOW BRANDED AS\nA RAPIST NATION, WHERE WOMEN ARE LIVING IN&nbsp;\nFEAR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT HAS COL RATHORE --\n( HE IS UNFIT TO BE A COLONEL--HE HAS NO HONOUR ) DONE ABOUT IT ?..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FAKE NEWS by main\nstream benami media is a classic hatchet job, with low risks\u2014especially if you\nhave the I&amp;B minister in your pocket.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the news business is\nnot an exact science, you can always allege something loudly, make your target\n(the Modi government) look guilty, and then retract silently if you are outed\nas a liar.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, the\ninternational media (or more accurately, the India-hating media of the English\nspeaking countries) picks up these scraps of foul misinformation and soon you\nhave usual villains such as The Economist, Washington Post and New York Times\nproclaiming that India is descending into fascism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian secular\nmedia, which contributed the original lie, now quotes the western media to\nbuttress their claims that India is indeed intolerant. That India\u2019s name is\nsullied and Indian men are now labelled rapists and killers are of no concern\nto the Indian media or to their DARLING Col Rathore..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OTHER THAN SHOOTING\nSTRAIGHT , WHAT IS THE QUALIFICATION OF THIS FELLOW RATHORE?.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of these\njournalists are the living dead because nobody clicks on their stories.&nbsp; These \u201csecular\u201d journalists have such abysmal\nreadership.&nbsp; Their only readers are the\nNGOs and foreign journalists.&nbsp; Even their\nfamilies would not read their articles if they paid them. They are that bad \u2013\nbesides being fake.&nbsp; Our credibility is\nnear zero. But these secular journalists keep getting paid because they perform\na useful hatchet job for their owners who are paid by foreign desh drohis . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Plus, the odd NGO will\nquote their story and thereby boost their ego. It is the classic tyranny of low\nexpectations. Throw in a few free foreign trips per year which includes deviant\nsex jaunts and they are happy \u2013they will sell their own mothers to the kosher\nwhorehouse .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virtue words like\nanti-corruption, truth,&nbsp; freedom , peace,\nour way of life,&nbsp; etc are such easy\nplatforms to ask such YES/ NO questions and polarize perceptions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being na\u00efve , you will\nsend a missed call YES.&nbsp; Now your number\nis in the call list of potential revolutionaries in a computer which can send\nmass SMS messages.&nbsp; You are now invited\nto be part of the NDTV studio audience ( for show of hands ) or for being at candle\nlight vigils.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the age of\nmis-information.&nbsp;&nbsp; PR and propaganda is\ninterchangeable.&nbsp;&nbsp; When US put embedded\nCNN reporters in every army unit during the Iraq war , you must understand that\nthese are not truth reporters\u2014 rather they are PROFESSIONAL&nbsp; LIE MANUFACTURERS,&nbsp; who are trained by psychologists to reshape\nreality.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are trained to\nmanufacture content.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hollow placards\ndisplaying&nbsp; \"Support our\ntroops.&nbsp; Help save American\nlives\",&nbsp; before dropping a bomb on\nwomen and children in one corner of the globe, to fill the pockets of greedy\nAmerican corporates , must be&nbsp; treated\nfor what they is worth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">USA has overthrown more\nthan&nbsp; 53 legally elected democracies, in\nthe modern era .&nbsp; \u201cGlobalization\u201d is\nnothing but a empire building strategy in this age , when you cannot&nbsp; go around brazenly colonizing countries.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check out our foreign\nfunded TV channels, at prime time. This is sheer tamasha and it happens every\nday . The anchor will ask you a question. If he/she&nbsp; smells an answer which does NOT suit his\nforeign master, or his own \" delusional \" perception he will will\nkeep throwing you off track by interrupting loudly again and again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you pull yourself\ntogether and get back on track, he will again derail you, by cherry pickin' in\nbetween . Finally again when you get back on track with the truthful and\ncorrect answer, he will shoot off a sub question to some one else on the\ndiscussion panel and ignore you.&nbsp; You can\nnever get the truth across to the nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LUTYENS DESH DROHI MEDIA\nWERE TREATED LIKE THE CATs WHISKERS BY PREVIOUS PRIME MINISTERS \u2013AND THIS\nINCLUDED VAJYAYEE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Senior editors based in\nDelhi were used to grandiosely by-lining their stories: \u201cFrom the Prime\nMinister\u2019s Aircraft\u201d. Or even \u201cSomewhere in the Skies Over Washington DC\u201d or\nlike Barkha Dutt \u201c From the south lawns of White House ( <span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\">or was it fuckin\u2019\nNorth ?</span>) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BELOW: BARKHA DUTT IS ON THE NORTH LAWNS OF WHITE HOUSE --</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">OOOHHH WE ARE HAJAAAAAR IMPRESSED.</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CTVA_nY4alE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/CTVA_nY4alE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It didn\u2019t matter that\nthe copy itself was an anticlimax. Poorly worded, equally bad analysis and most\nlikely recycled from a report written at a similar junket two years ago<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being denied VIP\ntreatment is something the Lutyens\u2019 media cannot swallow. They may come from\nIMPOVERISHED CHAWLS , but as journalists, they are used to be being treated as\nguests at the reasonably high table, wining and dining in the company of\ncelebrities, industrialists and politicians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modi has taken away\nthis perk. This is the chief reason why this supari or vendetta journalism has\nreplaced normal reporting.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the little known\nfacts about the media is the enormous number of junkets that journalists are\nused to. Most were 300 USD a day allowance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The reason why the\nmedia is going after Modi is that many members of the media moonlight as\nfixers, and once again the Prime Minister has taken away that handy second\nshopping income. Among the first things he did after moving into the Prime\nMinister\u2019s Office was to ban his cabinet ministers from meeting people they\nshould not<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE THE PEOPLE WATCH\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK PM MODI..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FIX HD HIDDEN VIDEO\nCAMS WITH FACE RECOGNITION TECHNOLOGY AT EVERY CENTRAL AND STATE MINISTRY.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CREATE THREE LAYERS OF\nSECURITY WITH ENTRY REGISTERS ( SIGNED ) FOR EACH LAYER...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE SAW HOW ARNAB\nGOSWAMI WOULD SHOW CLASSIFIED DOCUMENTS ON TV WHEN HE WORKED FOR TIMESNOW TV--\nWITH ASHOKA CHAKRA SEAL .. HOW DID HE GET IT ?..</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL BABUS MUST BE\nALLOWED ONLY ONE MOBILE PHONE --WHOSE SIMS THEY MUST DECLARE ... IF THEY CHANGE\nTHE SIMS WITHOUT DECLARATION, PUNISHMENT MUST BE LOSS OF JOB AND AN INQUIRY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PREFERABLE ONLY GOVT\nMANUFACTURED MOBILE PHONES ( WITHOUT VIDEO/ CAMERA PHOTO / VOICE RECORDING\nFEATURE ) MUST BE ALLOWED INSIDE THE MINISTRIES...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY PHOTOSTAT MACHINE\nSHOULD HAVE A HD HIDDEN CAMERA COVERING FROM TWO ANGLES..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN THESE DEEP STATE\nLUTYENS BABUS HAVE PARTIES NOTE DOWN THE CAR NUMBERS OF THE GUESTS ..INCUDING &nbsp;OLA / UBER TAXI NUMBERS AND TIME OF\nDISEMBARKATION AT SITE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN A RETIRED JEW\nGENERAL WAS GOVERNOR OF GOA-- ALL WHITE JEWS ( CHABAD HOUSE PARTY ) COULD ENTER\nAT WILL WITHOUT ENTERING THEIR NAMES IN THE VISITORS REGISTER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS TIME TO UNRAVEL\nTHE RICH MONEY BAG BENAMI FRONTS OF MINISTERS AND BABUS ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DO IT NOW..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Radia tapes scandal\nof 2010 showed the country how leading journalists such as Barkha Dutt (NDTV),\nVir Sanghvi (Hindustan Times) and Mani Shankar Aiyyar (India Today) were acting\nas fixers for the rich and powerful.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For instance Barkha Dutt and Sanghvi\ncanvassed for DMK party politician A. Raja to be appointed telecom minister.\nAccording to a government auditor, Raja caused a $40 billion scam because of\nhis illegal spectrum sale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assuming an extremely\nconservative kickback of 1 per cent, can you imagine the payoff for the media\nfixer?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lutyens\u2019 Delhi is a\nsnakepit.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is injecting poison into the country\u2019s body politic. Its shrill\ndenouncement of Modi is not just jarring, but also diverting attention from\nvital governance. Its actions send the government into defensive or\nfirefighting mode. No government deserves to be treated in such manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AND WE HAVE COL RATHORE\n, THE MAN WHO IS SUPPOSED TO PREVENT THIS \u2013 BEING THE DARLING OF THE LUTYENS\nMEDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modi must use\nMachiavellian tactics to neutralise his enemies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He should stop being\ngoody two shoes because the Award Wapsi gang and supari journalists are not\nimpressed by his kindness. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MODIs MINISTER FOR\nEXTERNAL AFFAIRS IS &nbsp;\u201cSECULAR \u201c MISS NEAT\nLITTLE GOODY PANTS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their agenda is to make\nhim fail. Or at least make him look like a failure. If they throw dirt at him\nunchecked, the danger is some of it could stick. If the Lutyens nexus tries to\nstop him, he must stop them. He cannot do this when the minister himself is the\ndarling of the desh drohi benami media.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Delhi had sunk\ninto a deep morass of sleazy deal-making during the UPA era became clear the\nmoment the RadiaGate scandal broke in 2010, spilling the beans on how media,\npoliticos, bureaucrats, corporates, and others were part of a mutually\nbeneficial cabal. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But how deep the rot\nwent is becoming clear only now. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This same nexus (what\nwe refer to as Lutyens\u2019 Delhi) is feeling the pinch since the present\nGovernment has largely shut off access to Government corridors for these power\nbrokers and is allowing the law to take its own course with regards to their\nmisdeeds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOUR YEARS HAVE PASSED\nAND ONY LALU PRASAD YADAV IS IN JAIL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; McGuirl<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">FBI WAS ROTHSCHILDs\nPRIVATE DEEP STATE &nbsp;AGENCY ESTABLISHED IN 1908 TO PREPARE FOR WW1 AND CARVING OUT OF THE STATE OF ISRAEL..</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Federal Bureau of\nInvestigation (FBI), formerly the Bureau of Investigation (BOI), is the\ndomestic intelligence and security service of the United States, and its\nprincipal federal law enforcement agency. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Operating under the\njurisdiction of the US Department of Justice, the FBI is also a member of the\nU.S. Intelligence Community and reports to both the Attorney General and the Director\nof National Intelligence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A leading U.S. counter-terrorism,\ncounterintelligence, and criminal investigative organization, the FBI has\njurisdiction over violations of more than 200 categories of federal crimes. FBI\nis primarily a domestic agency, maintaining 56 field offices in major cities\nthroughout the United States, and more than 400 resident agencies in lesser\ncities and areas across the nation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At an FBI field office,\na senior-level FBI officer concurrently serves as the representative of the\nDirector of National Intelligence. Despite its domestic focus, the FBI also\nmaintains a significant international footprint, operating 60 Legal Attache\n(LEGAT) offices and 15 sub-offices in US embassies and consulates across the\nglobe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FBI was established\nin 1908 as the Bureau of Investigation, the BOI or BI for short. Its name was\nchanged to the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) in 1935. The FBI\nheadquarters is the J. Edgar Hoover Building, located in Washington, D.C.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOBODY DARES TO RENAME\nTHE FBI BUILDING\u2014 DEEP STATE OPERATIVES EVEN TODAY PROTECTS IT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ljGIqiwdMJc/WzVRzvqRKFI/AAAAAAABcj8/kAxeim_cxwgVc9xpuPyZy0_BX8wqqyamwCLcBGAs/s1600/Ddhoover-gay-1-12-10.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"410\" data-original-width=\"640\" height=\"410\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ljGIqiwdMJc/WzVRzvqRKFI/AAAAAAABcj8/kAxeim_cxwgVc9xpuPyZy0_BX8wqqyamwCLcBGAs/s640/Ddhoover-gay-1-12-10.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE FIRST FBI DIRECTOR\nEDGAR HOOVER WAS ANAL SEX RECEIVING JEW .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Hoover an agent of Jew\nRothschild had profiled all US Presidents he worked with. Hoover let all his\npresidents know that he had dirt on them\u2014and of course these President all knew\nthat he was Jew Rothschild\u2019s DEEP STATE man</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As President Lyndon B.\nJohnson said, \u201cI would rather have him (Hoover) inside the tent pissing out\nthan outside the tent pissing in.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOOVER KNEW OF THE\nPEARL HARBOUR FALSE FLAG ATTACK FOUR MONTHS&nbsp;\nIN ADVANCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a widely televised\ninterview Dusko Popov ( James Bond 007 is modeled after him ) would declare to\na shocked world that as early as Aug 12th 1941, he had given the details of the\nPearl Harbor attack to FBI. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This my dear readers ,\nis 4 fuckin' months before the Pearl Harbor attack<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hoover ran the FBI for\nforty-eight years and Rotshchild ensured that he was safe from dismissal using\nDEEP STATE judges . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DURING WW1 AND WW2\n--ROTHSCHILD DROPPED LEAFLETS ALL OVER EUROPE QUOTING NOSTRADAMUS\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The book of predictions\nis Les Propheties, a collection of 942 poetic quatrains allegedly predicting\nfuture events. The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of\nprint since his death. ..WHY ?..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His astrologies were\ndisastrously wrong, containing flagrant astronomical errors\u2014we in Kerala know\nastronomy..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He did not use a bowl\nof water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a\nregular mirror. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED\nHIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he predicted his own\ndeath in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version\nof that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nostradamus was reputed\nto be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE\nBULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY\nHE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The RIDICULOUS tale\nabout Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step\non his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French\nRevolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the\nexact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have two editions of\nhis book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to\ntruths ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Various versions were\npublished during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over 200 different\ntranslations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so\nthe folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Nobody has ever used Nostradamus'\nwritings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nostradamus' writings\nare exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations,\n\"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and\nthe breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a\nvast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of\neverything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some books and websites\neven go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern\nEnglish translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within\nFrench translations\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cheetham's books were\nfull of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains,\nwith word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called\nthem \"amazingly accurate predictions\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Occasionally she went\nout on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went\nwith none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her\nbooks with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again.\nFirst she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to\nthe Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 4:36 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_55MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHY IS THERE SUCH AN EXPLOSION OF CANCER IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS SHOCKING TO KNOW THAT SO MANY OF MY FRIENDS HAVE SUCCUMBED TO CANCER.<br />\n<br />\nYET- IN INDIA OUR HEALTH DEPT JUST PARROTS WHAT THE WHITE JEWS WANT THEM TO...<br />\n<br />\nTHE EXPLOSION OF CANCER IS DUE TO A VIRUS NAMED SV 40..<br />\n<br />\nSV40 is an abbreviation for or simian virus 40, a polyomavirus that is found in monkeys ..<br />\n<br />\nLike other polyomaviruses, SV40 is a DNA virus that has the potential to cause tumors<br />\n<br />\nA 1989 Japanese scientists warned the journal AIDS noting that most live oral polio vaccines worldwide are still made in kidney-cell cultures from African green monkeys.<br />\n<br />\nThey wrote that monkeys naturally infected with SIV should not be used to make vaccines.<br />\n<br />\nIn Japan, they declared , only kidneys from monkeys free of SIV are used in polio vaccine production.<br />\n<br />\nSV40 was in the polio vaccine for several years before it was even discovered!<br />\n<br />\nResearchers identified scores of simian viruses (SVs) in the kidneys of monkeys, commonly used to culture polio vaccine.<br />\n<br />\nAfter SV40 was discovered, vaccine makers switched from Indian rhesus monkeys to African green monkeys.<br />\n<br />\nWhen scientists learned that SV40 -- found in much polio vaccine could cause tumors in young hamsters, they quickly banned from further use any vaccine carrying SV40.<br />\n<br />\nHuman immunodeficiency virus (HIV) that causes AIDS is a variant of a virus found in monkeys and chimpanzees. It was made to jump the species barrier to humans.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO POINT IN TELLING JP NADDA OUR HEALTH MINISTER..<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW WHY MODI CHOSE THIS FELLOW AS INDIAN HEALTH MINISTER..<br />\n<br />\nHILLY BILLY YANKS MUST KNOW THAT THEY WERE DUMBED DOWN BY THE DEEP STATE DELIBERATELY ADDING FLOURIDE IN THE MUNICIPAL DRINKING WATER.. JEWS NEVER DRANK THAT WATER.<br />\n<br />\nWhite phosphoric acid is used in Coke, and does NOT corrode ship's stainless steel tanks. But if it has little bit of Flouride contaminant , it is used for fertilisers and it corrodes the ships stainless steel tank. Boiling water removes Chlorine, but concentrates Flouride. It can be removed only by reverse osmosis and NOT by ordinary filters.<br />\n<br />\nFlouride is a free radical scavenger and a antioxidant like melatonin . Being in the chemical field i can say for sure , it is a VERY DANGEROUS FOR YOUR PINEAL GLAND<br />\n<br />\nLIKE WHEN PASSENGER SHIP LUSITANIA ( TO BE SUNK MY JEW CHURCHILL ) SET OUT FOR FOR SEA --ALL JEW PASSENGERS CANCELLED THEIR TICKETS 24 HOURS IN ADVANCE ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHEN WORLD TRADE CENTRE TWIN TOWERS CAME DOWN ,&nbsp; THAT DAY NOT A SINGLE JEW ATTENDED OFFICE IN THE BUILDINGS</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-59rVtKCxoX4/WzVqsx8WyoI/AAAAAAABckQ/P2P7WyBj8XQ-HpCkoI2Niy2BYwbA1hoRgCLcBGAs/s1600/LRusitania_.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"409\" data-original-width=\"615\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-59rVtKCxoX4/WzVqsx8WyoI/AAAAAAABckQ/P2P7WyBj8XQ-HpCkoI2Niy2BYwbA1hoRgCLcBGAs/s640/LRusitania_.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Lusitania was sunk on 7\nMay 1915 by a German U-boat (18 km off the southern coast of Ireland. The ship\u2019s\nspeed was 46 km/ hr ( 25 knots ).<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Lusitania had been\nfitted with 6-inch gun mounts in 1913 ( and was kept camouflaged ).<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MILLINIUMS AGO WE USED RHUMB LINES AND GREAT CIRCLES TO SAIL FROM POINT A TO B. WE MEASURED \"CIRCULAR DISTANCE\" WITH THE WHEEL.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PYTHAGORAS STUDIES AT KODUNGALLUR UNIVSITY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.cut-the-knot.org/pythagoras/DistanceFormula.shtml</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Mahalanobis distance measures distance relative to the centroid .. this was part of Vedic math-- a more reliable one .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The centroid is a point in multivariate space where all means from all variables intersect. The larger the Mahalanobis distance, the further away from the centroid the data point is.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A major issue with the Mahalanobis distance is that the inverse of the correlation matrix is needed for the calculations. This can\u2019t be calculated if the variables are highly correlated..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MODERN ECONOMICS IS SHIT BECAUSE IT TRIES TO INTEGRATE THE OBJECTIVE MAHALANOBIS SHIT.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INEQUALITY IN INDIA ( MUST BE SUBJECTIVE USING CONSCIOUS BRAIN ) STUDIES IS DOUBLE SHIT BECAUSE IT TRIES TO INTEGRATE MAHALANOBIS DOUBLE SHIT.. OBJECTIVE OBFUSCATION USING MINDLESS MATH.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR READERS LAY OFF- THIS COMMENT IS FOR THINKERS OF OUR INDIAN THINK TANKS ( WHO HAVE TRIPLE SHIT FOR BRAINS )...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SIR BRAJENDRA NATH SEAL APPLIED HEGELIAN DIALECTICS TO LITERARY CRITICISM .. THIS IS QUADRUPLE KOSHER SHIT. TO FORCE A GIANT PACHYDERM INTO A ROOM WITH A WEE DOOR.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Indian Statistical Institute grew out of the Statistical Laboratory set up by Prasanta Chandra Mahalanobis in Presidency College, Kolkata.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Today the ISI ( Indian Statistical institute ) employs a staff of more than 1,000 people..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">I HAVE GOT TWO PRICKS AND ONE BALL.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YEAH \u2013 BAAAYE GAAD.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255695582#c848436323467207348\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://twitter.com/mkatju/status/1012424805239349249</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS MORON IS BACK ON SOCIAL MEDIA AFTER A HIATUS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">5 HUMPED COWS IN ONE ACRE OF LAND CAUSED INDIAs TOP SOIL TO BECOME SIX FEET DEEP AND HOLY --PRODUCING FOOD WITH GOLDEN MEAN ( 1.618 ) INHERENT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WITH GREEN REVLUTION OF DESH DROHI MS SWAMINATHAN AND RAMPANT USES OF ARTIFICIAL FERTLISERS --NOW OUR TOP SOIL IS JUST A FEW INCHES THICK--IT IS THIRST FOR WATER AND PRODUCED FOOD WHICH CAUSES DISEASES.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">90% OF HUMAN DISEASES ORIGINATE IN THE HUMAN GUT AS PER 6200 YEAR OLD AYURVEDA TEXT CHARAKA SAMHITA..</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Think of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026\u2026</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus\u2026\u2026.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Humus is the most important thing in soil: more important that dew worms, and organic matter..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">COMPOST IS NOT HUMUS\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When organic matter starts to decompose these molecules are broken down into smaller and smaller molecules by the micro-organisms in the soil (mostly bacteria and fungi)\u2026\u2026..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">During the humification process, microbes secrete sticky gum-like mucilages; these contribute to the crumb structure (tilth) of the soil by holding particles together, and allowing greater aeration of the soil\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Toxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Today humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Snakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026 Priceless snake grove soil was the BANK FOR AYURVEDIC HERBS ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Humic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">At some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026It consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026 Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Humus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Better soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026 Humus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">While these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..Humus can hold the equivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the soil's capacity to withstand drought condition\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_68BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_66T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1413190284692248433\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255759317#c1413190284692248433\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe biochemical structure of humus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil conditions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHUMUS IS DECIMATED BY CHEMICAL FERTILISERS. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE FARMER SUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI IS TOO BUSY ANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS. .<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL NADU MUST UNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nRECENTLY OUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ( WHICH PRODUCES BIOCHAR ) BECAUSE OF DELHI SMOG\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF THIS IS THE CASE SHIFT THE CAPITAL OF INDIA TO A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPERATURE INVERSION\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ..<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere...<br />\n<br />\nOnly a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..<br />\n<br />\nWith its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding.... Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERATELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\n<br />\nALL ABOVE HAS BEEN SENT TO MODI AND HIS MINISTERS MORE THAN 30 TIMES..<br />\n<br />\nWHO CARES ?..<br />\n<br />\nMODI GIVES US MORE AND MORE JAANKARI ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEKDAR ..<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY MODI WAS RECITING SOME KABIRDAS SHLOKA ( <span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>HOY KOY SHIT</b></span> ) ..<br />\n<br />\nKABIRDAS NEVER EXISTED..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil ..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 1) INDIANS MUST\nADOPT \u201cCONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTISM\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 2) INDIA IS THE\nUNHAPPIEST NATION ON THE PLANET<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 3) TILAK WAS A GREAT\nPATRIOT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 4) NEHRU WROTE WORLD\nHISTORY WHILE IN JAIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 5) INDIAN\nCIVILIZATION IS JUST 5000 YEARS OLD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAD ENOUGH \u2013 PAAPI\nPETH BHAR GAYA \u2013 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">DEEPLY UPSET , I\nSWITCHED OFF THE FUCKIN\u2019 TV \u2013 DESPITE MY WIFE CRYING FOUL.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHE WANTED TO KNOW WHY\n?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHAT I TOLD\nHER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 1) IT WAS JEW\nROTHSCHILD WHO CREATED THIS SLIMY NONSENSE OF \u201cPATRIOTISM TO A BOOK\u201d , RATHER\nTHAN PATRIOTISM TO THE WATAN.. ( MOTHERLAND ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILD INTRODUCED\nDEMOCRACY TO THE WHOLE PLANET AFTER WW2 . ALL DEMOCRACIES INCLUDING INDIA HAD\nRULERS SWEARING OATHS TO \u201cPROTECT THE CONSITUTION\u201d. WHILE IN HIS OWN LAND\nPRESIDENT/ PM/ JUDGES ETC PLEDGED TO \u201c PROTECT THE WATAN\u201d \u2014THE PROMOSED LANDOF\nISRAEL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LOYALTY TO THE LITTLE\nRED BOOK OF MAO IS WHAT CAUSED INDIAN COMMIES TO BE ON THE SIDE OF CHINA DURING\nTHE WAR IN 1962.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEHRU PUT THOUSANDS OF\nINDIAN COMMIE TRAITORS IN JAIL JUST BEFORE THE WAR BROKE OUT WITH CHINA. WHILE\nIN JAIL KERALA COMMIE VS ACHUTANANDAN WAS BITTEN BY CONSCIENCE WHEN HE SAW\nINDIAN SOLDIERS BEING SLAUGHTERED AT THE BORDER IN THE COLD , WITHOUT BULLETS\nFOR THEIR GUNS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">VS ACHUTANANDAN WANTED\nTO DONATE HIS BLOOD FOR OUR JAWANS AS A MARK OF SOLIDARITY.. ALL HIS DEAR\nCOMRADES ( LIKE JYOTI BAU/ AK GOPALAN TYPES ) POUNCED ON HIM AND GAVE HIM A\nGOOD PASTING \u2013 HE NEARLY DIED OF INTERNAL INJURIES . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LOYALTY TO A BOOK NAMED\nKORAN , CAUSES THE OIL IN ALL MIDDLE EAST KINGDOWS TO BE STOLEN BY THE WHITE\nJEW AT THROW AWAY PRICES. ALL THESE OIL RICH KINGDOWMS HAVE MUSLIM POPULATION\nWITH A JEW KING INSTALLED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD \u2014ALL OF THEM.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN TWENTY ANOTHER YEARS\n, WHEN OIL RUNS OUT-- IT IS BACK ON CAMEL , LIVING IN TENTS AND WASHING ASSHOLE\nAFTER A SHIT WITH SAND.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT THAT TIME THEIR JEW KINGS WILL TELL THEM \u201cDEMOCRACY\nVERY VERY GOOD !\u201d --&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; BEFORE THEY RUN\nAWAY TO THE WEST WITH THEIR HARES AND RELATIVES , WHERE THEY HAVE SALTED AWAY\nTRILLIONS OF USD OF THEIR PRIVATE CASH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE INDIANS SHALL BE\nPATRIOTIC TO BHARATMATA .. BALLS TO THE PATHETIC BONG.. CHAAL THODA MACHER JHOL\nPEE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 2) INDIA HAS THE\nLEAST UNHAPINESS ON THIS PLANET BY PERCENTAGE \u2013REPEAT\u2014BY PERCENTAGE.. INDIA HAS\n1300 MILLION PEOPLE. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUR HAPPINESS AND\nMINDSET IS WAY DIFFERENT FROM THE WEST.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN A BRITISH WIFE\nTELLS HER HUSBAND IN FRONT OF HER KIDS \u201d BUSTER , YOU COULD NOT GET YOUR PRICK\nUP LAST NIGHT DESPITE AN HOUR OF ORAL SUCTION.. I AM GOING DOGGING .. AND THEN\nSHE COMES BACK AFTER THREE HOURS WITH HER PUBIC HAIR MATTED WITH DRY WHITE\nSEMEN AND HER ASSHOLE SLACK AND GAPING OPEN. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WELL THIS MAY BE THE\nYARD STICK OF HAPPINESS / FREEDOM FOR A WHITE WOMAN. WE HAVE DIFFERENT\nSTANDARDS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp;THE NEXT NIGHT CHITPAVAN JEW NAY BRAHMIN TILAK\nWAS WHISKED OFF TO LONDON ON THE SAME SHIP AS MAX MUELLER TO EUROPE. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TILAK STAYED IN MAX\nMUELLERS HOME AND HE WROTE \u201c THE ARCTIC HOME OF THE VEDAS WHERE HE GAVE AWAY\nOUR PRICELESS VEDAS AND SANSKRIT TO THE WHITE, BLUE EYED BLONDE MAN. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUST BECAUSE VEDAS\nMENTION CIRCUMPOLAR BODIES IT DOES NOT MEAN THAT VEDAS WAS WRITTEN THERE . &nbsp;&nbsp;IF I WRITE A BOOK WHERE I MENTION THE SUN, IT\nDOES NOT MEAN THAT I WROTE THE BOOK ON THE SUN.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
