font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 4) NEHRU , A YOUNG\nLAWYER , KNEW SHIT ABOUT WORLD HISTORY.. NEHRU WROTE HIS BOOK ON HISTORY OUTSIDE\nOF JAIL , IN VERY COMFORTABLE PALACES ..HE WROTE WHAT JEW ROTHSCHILD WANTED HIM\nTO WRITE.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEHRU, HIS FATHER AND\nHIS GRANDFATHER WERE FREEMASONS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">GANDHI WOULD BE THROWN\nINTO JAIL WITH GREAT FANFARE WITH ALL ROTHSCHILD EMDIA COEVRING IT .. THE SAME\nNIGHT GANDHI WOULD BE WHISKED OFF TO THE NEAREST JEW AGA KHAN PALACE WHERE TWO\nNAKED UNDERAGE GIRLS WOULD BE WAITING WITH BLANKET , ENEMA KIT AND CHAMBER POT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS PRACTISE CAUGHT ON\nAFTER INDEPENDENCE. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SON OF AN ALMIGHTY\nCONGRESS DEEP STATE POLITICIAN WAS JAILED FOR MURDERING A MODEL. HE JUST SHOT\nHER IN A HIGH END BAR WITH DOZENS OF POWERFUL PEOPLE WATCHING FOR TAUNTING HIM-\nTHAT HE IS NOT GOOD ENOUGH WHERE IT COUNTS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HIS DEEP STATE\nPOLITICIAN FATHER WHO HAS JUDGES / POLICE IN HIS PAYROLL , BOUGHT A STAR HOTEL\nNEARBY THE JAIL.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS YOUNG BOY NEVER\nSENT MUCH TIME IN JAIL.. HE STAYED AT HIS FATHERs HOTEL BINDAAS \u2014GOT MARRIED\nAND HAD HIS WEDDING NIGHT TOO IN JAIL WITH DOZENS OF GUESTS .. INCLUDING\nMINISERS, MEDIA BARONS , POLICE AND JUDGES .. THIS IS INDIA FOR YOU. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW THE MURDERED GIRLs\nSISTER IS TRYING HARD TO GET HIM OUT OF JAIL , CLAIMING SHE HAS FORGIVEN HIM,\nYOU SEE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE KNOW WHAT HAPPENED\nWHEN MA BAKER \u2013 NAY --MANNARGUDI MUNIYAMMA WAS CAUGHT BY A WOMAN DIG FOR\nSPENDING NIGHTS OUT OF A HIGH SECURITY JAIL .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">## 5) INDIAN\nCIVILIZATION IS THE OLDEST ON THE PLANET\u2014BY SEVERAL MILLINIUMS .. OUR VEDAS\nWENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES\nAGO. ANY IDIOT KNOWS STELLAR OBSERVATIONS IN THE POST BELOW CANNOT LIE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAHABHARAT WAR ENDED\nWITH DURYODHANA AND BHIMA FIGHTING IN A STAGANT POOL OF DRIED UP SARASWATI\nRIVER , WITH KRISHNA AND BALARAMA WATCHING .. BALARAMA WAS HOLDING HIS GIANT\nPLOUGH, HE HAS JUST DIVERTED SARAWASTI BLOCKED BY A TECTONIC GLACIAL SHIFT,\nINTO GANGA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Aryabhata used infinitesimals to study the motion of the moon and to compute rates of change of Venus , Mars ., Jupiter and Saturn to compute astrology..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nRolle\u2019s theorm is lifted from Kerala Calculus - any real-valued differentiable function that attains equal values at two distinct points must have a stationary point somewhere between them\u2014that is, a point where the first derivative (the slope of the tangent line to the graph of the function) is zero\u2026<br />\n<br />\nRolle published his work without understanding differential Calculus\u2014all know this \u2013he knew only half baked polynomial functions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN ANCIENT DAYS WE NEVER AFFIXED THE NAME OF AN AUTHOR ON ANY WRITTEN BOOK ON MATH . ..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THAT IT WENT BY ORAL ROUTE. MATH WAS DONE ON SLATE WITH SLATE PENCIL AND THEN RUBBED OFF . ..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ALMOST LIKE\u2014THERE IS NO NEED TO RECORD AS SONG \u2013AS LONG AS YOU KNEW HOW TO SING AND TEACH YOUR DISCIPLE HOW TO SING..<br />\n<br />\nSRINIVASA RAMANUJAN WENT TO LONDON WITH A SLATE AND ALL WERE HAJAAAAAAR AMUSED..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/fractal-mind-of-srinivasa-ramanujan.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8566824468513158709\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_211M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_188M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530415378869#c4175653428974212085\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 1, 2018 at 8:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID YOU PUT A VIDEO OF YOURSELF DOING BICEPS CURLS WITH 25 KG DUMB BELLS?<br />\n<br />\nIS IT TO BOAST ABOUT YOUR BRUTE STRENGTH?<br />\n<br />\nOH BLIMEY-- NOW I HAVE TO LET GO ANOTHER OF MY LEADERSHIP SECRETS !<br />\n<br />\nIT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO PROVE YOU ARE BETTER THAN YOUR TEAM IN THE BRAINS DEPT .. PEOPLE JUST DONT ACCEPT IT..<br />\n<br />\nBUT IT IS VERY EASY TO PROVE THAT YOUR ARE FASTER THAN SOME ONE IN A SPRINT OR STRONGER IN A GYM...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MAN IS STILL AN ANIMAL --ALBEIT A SOCIAL ONE</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU PROVE YOU ARE STRONGER THAN SOMEONE --HE HAS NO PROBLEMS IN ACCEPTING YOU ARE BETTER THAN HIM IN THE BRAINS DEPT..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE:<br />\n<br />\nA BRIT USED TO COME IN OUR GYM.. A VERY STRONG FELLOW-- TALLER THAN ME, HIS BICEPS WERE TWICE THE SIZE OF MINE , HE WAS ONE YEAR YOUNGER.<br />\n<br />\nONCE OR TWICE I HAD A CONVERSATION WITH HIM, HE GAVE ME THE FEELING THAT HE THINKS HE IS BETTER THAN ME IN THE BRAINS DEPT..<br />\n<br />\nI DO EXPERIMENTS ..<br />\n<br />\nI NOTICE THAT HE DID CURLS ON THE 25 KG DUMB BELLS - AND BEFORE DOING THAT HE TOOK OUT TWO HANDKERCHIEFS TO WRAP IT AROUND THE \" UNUSED HENCE SHARP \" KNURLED STEEL HANDLE..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID NOT HAVE HIS OWN GYM GLOVES WHICH COVERED THE FINGERS TOO ( BRUISING DIE TO SKIN GETTING SCRAPED OFF ) ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/dumb-bells-challenge-real-thing-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIT JUST PROVED HE WAS SERIOUS-- HE WOULD KEEP THE DUMB BELLS DOWN ONLY IF HIS BICEPS OR BACK HURT--NOT BECAUSE HIS PALM SKIN WAS HURTING ( THE WAY OTHER PRETENDED ).<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I DID THE 25 KG DUMB BELLS CURLS , I BROUGHT MY OWN HANDKERCHIEFS TO WRAP AROUND THE HANDLE.<br />\n<br />\nSO ONE DAY WHEN HE FINISHED ON THE 25 KG DUMBELLS --I ASKED HIM \"CAN I TAKE IT \" AND STARTED WRAPPING MY CLOTH PIECES .. HE WAS NOW WATCHING ME VIA THE MIRROR.<br />\n<br />\nI DID TWICE OF WHAT HE DID ON HALF THE TIME..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I LOOKED AT HIS FACE , IT WAS RED-- HE WAS EMBARRASSED ..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN MY YOUNGER SON DID THE MACHINES HE USUALLY DOES-- PUTTING ALL PINS AT HIGHEST NOTCH.. MY SON IS 1/3 OF HIS AGE AND HE WEIGHS 20 KGS MORE THAN HIM..<br />\n<br />\nHE AVOIDED THOSE MACHINES LIKE THE PLAGUE.. I HAD CRAMPED HIS COCKY STYLE<br />\n<br />\nI KNEW HE WAS FROM THE VILLAGE WHERE STONEHENGE IS BUILT. HE HAD TOLD ME THAT ALIENS BUILT THE STONEHENGE AS IT IS SUPERHUMAN..<br />\n<br />\nNOW THAT I HAD CRAMPED HIS STYLE-- I ASKED HIM, IF HE DID ICE SLEDGING AS A CHILD..<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID-- YES..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I TOLD HIM-- IF YOU GIVE ME THREE STRONG MEN , I DONT NEED ALIENS -I WILL BUILD THE SAME STRUCTURE.<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM--<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW THE STONE QUARRY FROM WHERE THE STONES WERE SOURCED.. IN WINTER I WOULD SLIDE IT DOWNHILL ON THE ICE AND FIT IT IN PLACE ..USING LONG LEVERS..<br />\n<br />\nHE KEPT QUIET<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I ASKED HIM-- DO YOU KNOW HOW MANY PORTALS ARE THERE..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID NOT KNOW.<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM-- 27 NAKSHATRAS ( PORTALS ) WITH 4 PADAS MADE THE NUMBER 108, AND THIS IS THE DIGITAL NUMBER OF OM, OUR HINDU KING MANTRA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DRUID SAGES WHO BUILT THE STONEHENGE WERE HINDUS..<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS QUIET FOR SOME TIME AND THEN HE SAID \" TODAY I HAVE LEARNT SOMETHING \"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mystery-of-stonehenge-solved-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS A CHANGE MANAGER AT SEA.. YOU CANNOT CHANGE ALL BY THE SAME WAY..BY SHOVING THINGS DOWN THE THROAT. YOU HAVE TO MAKE THEM BITE.<br />\n<br />\nALL MY DETRACTORS HAVE FALLEN BY THE WAY SIDE TODAY.. PEOPLE DONT ARGUE ANYMORE--WHEN I SAY THIS IS THE WAY THE COOKIE CRUMBLED..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY NO MUSLIM ARGUES WHEN I SAY THAT QUTAB MINAR IS A HINDU STRUCTURE<br />\n<br />\nQUTAB MINAR IS MEANT TO BE SEEN FROM TOP FROM A HOVERING HELICOPTER..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOP BRAHMA PLATFORM WAS UNSTABLE-- MEANT TO SHOW THE PRECESSION OF THE EARTH.. WHETHER WE ARE AT TAURUS OR ARIES OR PISCES OR AQUARIUS ( 24000 YEARS ).<br />\n<br />\nAT THE BASE WAS PORTALS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 16, BELOW-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CdKP_QWCamQ/WzRBhFoX81I/AAAAAAABcis/Tx77fcnc9-Aq2scdDmc_dedbYU4Z7RgAQCLcBGAs/s1600/20180303_211945.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1600\" data-original-width=\"1232\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CdKP_QWCamQ/WzRBhFoX81I/AAAAAAABcis/Tx77fcnc9-Aq2scdDmc_dedbYU4Z7RgAQCLcBGAs/s640/20180303_211945.jpg\" width=\"491\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "221", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6098439563674726537/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "6020591361940658187", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2018-06-26T05:24:00+05:30", "updated": "2018-09-08T14:28:43+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTM2Mzk3MTIzNjkzCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/miss-neat-little-goody-pants-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6020591361940658187", "title": "MISS NEAT LITTLE GOODY PANTS -  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SoHtq1mmRLM/WzGBF1KV-SI/AAAAAAABcfA/5062t7qP8qEZxBbjEFFGjn7htZCu_uDlgCLcBGAs/s1600/Ddownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"163\" data-original-width=\"310\" height=\"336\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SoHtq1mmRLM/WzGBF1KV-SI/AAAAAAABcfA/5062t7qP8qEZxBbjEFFGjn7htZCu_uDlgCLcBGAs/s640/Ddownload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/passport-officer-row-sushma-swaraj-abused-by-trolls/articleshow/64740095.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/passport-officer-row-sushma-swaraj-abused-by-trolls/articleshow/64740095.cms</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>I LOST MY REM SLEEP YESTERDAY OVER MISS NEAT LITTLE GOODY PANTS -- OUR EXTERNAL AFFAIRS MINISTER<span style=\"color: red;\"> SUSHMA SWARAJ</span>..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9NeLr_aVGKg/WzGXdqWN0kI/AAAAAAABcgQ/07tlmjiausgUL0bZeZmBmr0Cn71pzH_xACLcBGAs/s1600/SushGma-tweet.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"700\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9NeLr_aVGKg/WzGXdqWN0kI/AAAAAAABcgQ/07tlmjiausgUL0bZeZmBmr0Cn71pzH_xACLcBGAs/s640/SushGma-tweet.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/old-sea-dog-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/old-sea-dog-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\nIN 1980 MY SENIOR , TOOK OVER FROM ME AS CHIEF OFFICER OF A VERY HECTIC PRODUCT TANKER ( PETROL / NAPHTHA / KEROSENE / HS DIESEL/ AVIATION TURBINE FUEL&nbsp; ) WHICH DISTRIBUTED OIL PARCELS AROUND THE INDIAN COAST..<br />\n<br />\nHE MADE A PARALLEL VOYAGE WITH ME -- ONE LOADING PORT AND THREE UNLOADING PORTS-- FIVE DAYS TOGETHER , AS INCOMING CHIEF OFFICER<br />\n<br />\nTHE SCI SHIP WAS A COMPLICATED RUSSIAN TANKER..<br />\n<br />\nONE THE SECOND DAY HE ( MY WELL WISHER AND FRIEND ) ASKED ME&nbsp; \"AJIT, WHY HAS NOT THE CREW <b><span style=\"color: red;\">THROWN YOU OVERBOARD</span></b> YET ?\"<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID -- I AM SO TOUGH WITH THE CREW -- HE HAS NOT SEEN ANYTHING LIKE THIS . AND ON TOP OF THAT MY OVERTIME HOURS ( EXTRA MONEY ) WAS A THIRD OF THE FLEET AVERAGE.<br />\n<br />\nI REPLIED&nbsp; &nbsp;\" I GUESS I AM PROFESSIONALLY COMPETENT AND<b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\"> FAIR</span></b> .&nbsp; I DO NOT CARE FOR POPULARITY MEDALS.&nbsp; &nbsp; I GAVE THEM GOOD QUALITY OF LIFE, DIGNITY AND A SAFE WORKING ENVIRONMENT&nbsp; \"<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YA74TYy0-FI/WzFx2IqFmII/AAAAAAABceo/upJYH_UQNt8Ju7MUEJK6jPR2rx9rpAeDwCLcBGAs/s1600/FaEirness.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"402\" data-original-width=\"582\" height=\"442\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YA74TYy0-FI/WzFx2IqFmII/AAAAAAABceo/upJYH_UQNt8Ju7MUEJK6jPR2rx9rpAeDwCLcBGAs/s640/FaEirness.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nMY FRIEND WAS ENGAGED TO BE MARRIED.&nbsp; &nbsp;HE SHOWED ME HIS TO-BE-WIFEs PHOTO.&nbsp; <br />\n<br />\nHE ASKED ME \" AJIT , YOU GOT THE FIRST PRIZE FOR PAINTING ON OUR TRAINING SHIP,&nbsp; CAN YOU DRAW HER ?\"<br />\n<br />\nON THE LAST DAY OVER A BEER , I GOT A CHART PAPER AND A CHARCOAL PENCIL AND DREW HIS FIANCEs PHOTO FROM MEMORY IN HIS PRESENCE .. IT TOOK ME LESS THAN ONE HOUR ..<br />\n<br />\nIT CAME REAL LIKE MAGIC- ONLY THE FACE.<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN I KISSED IT.<br />\n<br />\nOUR MAN POUNCED ON ME CRYING&nbsp; \" SHE IS MY WIFE \"--AND STARTED PUNCHING ME ..<br />\n<br />\nI REPLIED FENDING OFF HIS PUNCHES&nbsp; &nbsp;\" THIS IS MY CREATION\"..<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN WE LAUGHED LIKE MAD..<br />\n<br />\nHIS WIFE ATTENDED MY MARRIAGE AT KANNUR&nbsp; . SHE WAS STANDING AT THE MARRIAGE PANDAL ENTRANCE WITH A HUGE GIFT IN HER HANDS --BEAMING LIKE THE QUINTESSENTIAL CHESHIRE CAT.&nbsp; &nbsp;HER HUSBAND WAS AT SEA --SHE CAME ALONE ALL THE WAY FROM KOCHI<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HER&nbsp; &nbsp;\" WHEN THE PRESENT PACKAGE IS SO HUGE, I AM SURE THERE IS NOTHING VALUABLE INSIDE \"<br />\n<br />\nSHE ATTENDED MY ELDER SONs MARRIAGE AT CALICUT , 32 YEARS LATER , AS A WIDOW ..&nbsp; &nbsp;SHE WAS THERE FOR THREE DAYS , PART OF EVERY CEREMONY.<br />\n<br />\nIN FRONT OF HER GROWN UP SON I ASKED HER \" MY PORTRAIT IS STILL WITH YOU ?\"<br />\n<br />\nSHE SAID \"YES !\"<br />\n<br />\nAND SHE BLUSHED--<br />\n<br />\nSO I SAID \" YOU HEARD HOW HE POUNDED ME TOO, RIGHT ?<br />\n<br />\nSHE LAUGHED AND SAID \"YES!\"..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE MY FRIEND DIED -- I HAD TWO NIGHTS OF BEER IN HIS HOME AT KOCHI..<br />\n<br />\nHIS RIGHT HAND WAS PARALYSED .. HIS DAUGHTER ELOPED AND HE HAD A STROKE.<br />\n<br />\nI HAD CARRIED THIS GIRL AS A BABY IN MY HANDS..<br />\n<br />\nI WENT THE SECOND DAY BECAUSE HIS WIFE TOLD MY WIFE--&nbsp; THIS IS THE FIRST TIME I SAW HIM SMILING SINCE OUR DAUGHTER ELOPED, WITH A TAMILIAN GUY<br />\n<br />\nGIVING CREW DIGNITY AND FAIRNESS TO CREW AS A THREE STRIPER CHIEF OFFICER ?<br />\n<br />\nYES -- THE CAPTAIN WAS A INCOMPETENT HINDU INDIAN NAVY BENGALI COMMANDER ( HE WAS A GENTLEMAN ) WITH A CHRISTIAN MALAYALI WIFE..<br />\n<br />\nYEARS LATER I CAME TO KNOW (&nbsp; FROM A MALAYALI BOSUN&nbsp; ) THAT SHE WAS MISS DIZZY LIZZY..&nbsp; &nbsp;SHE WAS A<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> NUDE CABARET DANCER </span></b>IN ONE OF THE SHADY HOTELS , WHERE SHE COMMITTED MURDER AND RAN AWAY-- JUST DISAPPEARED ...<br />\n<br />\nSO HOW DID I LAND UP ON THIS HECTIC TANKER .. ALL AVOIDED THIS SHIP LIKE THE PLAGUE.<br />\n<br />\nI WENT TO SCI OFFICE TO JOIN BACK AFTER LEAVE ..<br />\n<br />\nA GREASY DIRTY PALM CLASPED MY WRIST --AND I SAW MY WIDE EYED SENIOR IN DIRTY CIVILIAN CLOTHES ..<br />\n<br />\nHE LOOKED <b><span style=\"color: red;\">BURNT OUT</span></b>. .<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/burned-out-versus-stressed-out-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/burned-out-versus-stressed-out-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\nHE CRIED \"YAAR AJIT--YOU MUST RELIEVE ME TODAY --&nbsp; ABHI .. I HAVE GONE CRAZY.&nbsp; IF I DONT GET RELIEVED I AM AFRAID I WILL DIE .\"<br />\n<br />\nHE DRAGGED ME TO THE PERSONNEL DEPT HEAD -- A RETIRED CAPTAIN.<br />\n<br />\nIT SO TRANSPIRED THAT I WAS A BUTCHER ISLAND WITH MY BAGGAGE WITHIN THREE HOURS..<br />\n<br />\nAS THE LAUNCH APPROACHED THE QUAY , I WAS MY SENIOR WITH HIS BAGGAGE BY HIS SIDE WAVING AT ME..<br />\n<br />\nI GOT OFF THE BOAT AND TOLD HIM&nbsp; \"&nbsp; I WILL NOT RELIEVE YOU ON THE JETTY.. YOU MUST COME WITH ME ON THIS SHIP \"<br />\n<br />\nI GUESS HE WAS READY , AS HE POINTED TO A CYCLE ..<br />\n<br />\nWE BRIBED THE BOAT MAN ... TO STAY PUT FOR 30 MINUTES.<br />\n<br />\nI CYCLED , WITH HIM SITTING BEHIND FROM THE BUTCHER ISLAND ( MUMBAI ) QUAY TO THE SHIP...<br />\n<br />\nALL THE WHILE HE WAS HANDING OVER , WITH ME STARTING WHICH WHAT ALL CARGOES ARE BEING LOADED AND IN WHICH TANKS ..<br />\n<br />\nHE TOLD ME THAT THE CAPTAIN BEING FROM THE INDIAN NAVY KNEW <b><span style=\"color: red;\">FUCK ALL.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSO WE CLIMBED UP THE GANGWAY AND LITERALLY RAN TO THE CHIEF OFFICERs CABIN.<br />\n<br />\nI ASKED FOR THE \"OIL RECORD BOOK\"..<br />\n<br />\nHE HAD NOT FILLED IT UP FOR HIS ENTIRE TENURE ..&nbsp; &nbsp;HE DID NOT EVEN KNOW THE AMOUNT OF SLOPS IN THE SLOP TANK..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MEANT THAT HE HIMSELF WAS INCOMPETENT--AND HE HAD SERVED MORE THAN 3 MONTHS..<br />\n<br />\nYOU GET BURNT OUT WHEN YOU ARE NOT COMPETENT , HAVE HIGH WORK LOAD AND CONSTANTLY LIVING IN FEAR ..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/odmcs-decanting-of-annex-1-slops-on.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/odmcs-decanting-of-annex-1-slops-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/annex-1-closed-cycle-wash-on-chemical.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/annex-1-closed-cycle-wash-on-chemical.html</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/06/marpol-rules-for-annex-2-chemical_6733.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/06/marpol-rules-for-annex-2-chemical_6733.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nANYWAYS-<br />\n<br />\nI MADE HIM SIGN AT RELEVANT AREAS -- AND THEN I TOOK HIM BY CYCLE BACK TO THE BOAT WAITING FOR HIM-- WITH PORT TRUST PASSENGERS ( SHIFT PARTY ) CURSING LOUDLY..<br />\n<br />\nI WENT CYCLING BACK TO THE SHIP , WALKING FAST<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS LUNCH TIME -- AND I WAS A BIT PISSED OFF AS I WAS PARTY TO UNPROFESSIONAL CONDUCT..<br />\n<br />\nI SHOULD NOT HAVE ALLOWED MY SENIOR TO GO AWAY WITHOUT A WALK AROUND OF THE SHIP. ON SUCH A TANKER IT TAKES MINIMUM FOUR HOURS..&nbsp; I DID NOT EVEN KNOW WHICH TANKS WERE BEING LOADED ( NOR DID HE )..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/chief-engineers-taking-over-on-chemical.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/chief-engineers-taking-over-on-chemical.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nI SAT AT THE CAPTAINS TABLE ON MY SEAT IN THE OFFICERS DINING LOUNGE--WITH AROUND EIGHT GOAN STEWARDS PEERING AT ME ..</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCAPTAIN WAS EATING ..&nbsp; &nbsp; HIS WIFE<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> MISS DIZZY LIZZY</span></b> WAS EATING AND SMOKING TOO..&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHER TITS WERE LIKE <b><span style=\"color: red;\">CHANNA PACKETS</span></b> AND SHE WAS WEARING A TIGHT BLOUSE.</div>\n<br />\nAFTER A BRIEF INTRODUCTION, CAPTAIN ASKED ME , IN A EXPANSIVE MOOD&nbsp; \" SON, HOW IS THE CARGO GOING ?\"<br />\n<br />\nI REPLIED BRUSQUELY \" <b><span style=\"color: red;\">THROUGH THE FUCKIN' PIPELINES </span></b>\"<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS WISE ENOUGH NOT TO ASK ME ANY MORE QUESTIONS.. YES , WHEN YOU RUN A WHOREHOUSE , THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS ..<br />\n<br />\nI DID NINE MONTHS AS CHIEF OFFICER ON THIS DIFFICULT SHIP.. I DID 37 FUCKIN' VOYAGES.. IT IS NOT EASY TO GET A RELIEVER IF YOU ARE CHIEF OFFICER , WHERE YOU GET VERY FEW HOURS OF SLEEP-AND THAT TOO IRREGULAR.<br />\n<br />\nON THE FIRST DAY ITSELF I FOUND OUT THAT ALL CARGO TANKS PV VENTS WERE FROZEN--SOME OPEN , SOME SHUT, SOME HALF OPEN.<br />\n<br />\nTHE DECK SEAL / PV BREAKER WAS EMPTY AND BLANKED.<br />\n<br />\nCRIMINAL TO SAY THE LEAST !!<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/naive-sailor-magnetised-pv-valves-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/naive-sailor-magnetised-pv-valves-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/pv-valves-breaker-and-deck-seal-on.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/pv-valves-breaker-and-deck-seal-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\nYES--THIS IS SCI FOR YOU..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS THE FIRST CHIEF OFFICER IN SCI FLEET TO GET A CRUDE OIL WASH CERTIFICATE .. THEY DONT GIVE IT.. WE HAVE DEDICATED COW MASTERS ..<br />\n<br />\nI TRACED PUMPROOM PIPELINES , AS SOON AS WE SAILED OUT OF MUMBAI.. I FOUND THE OFFICIAL PIPE LINE DIAGRAM WAS WRONG..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A HUGE DRAIN TANK UNDER THE BILGES IN THE PUMPROOM , WITH ABOUT 70 TONNES OF PETROL/ NAPTHA / KEROSENE MIX ..<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY KNEW BOUT IT.. IT WAS NO ACCOUNTED FOR IN THE OIL RECORD BOOK. IT WAS THE RUSSIAN WAY FOR DRAINING PIPELINES ..<br />\n<br />\nI HAD A DOCTORs STETHOSCOPE .. I USED IT TO FIND OUT LEAKY VALVES .. THE CREW HAD NEVER SEEN ANYTHING LIKE THIS BEFORE ..<br />\n<br />\nIOC / BPC / HPC KNEW AROUND THE COAST --THAT A NEW CHIEF OFFICER HAS COME AND HIS IS A TECHNICAL WIZARD...&nbsp; &nbsp;SHIPS PERFORMANCE IN PORT SKY ROCKETED .<br />\n<br />\nMY CREW COULD HAVE GIVEN ME A TOUGH TIME , LIKE WHAT THEY GAVE TO THE BENGALI INDIAN NAVY CAPTAIN AND MY SENIOR , A NORTH INDIAN GUY..&nbsp; THEY DID NOT.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY KNEW THAT THE NEW CHIEF OFFICER IS DOING GOOD.. THEY FELT PART OF THE TEAM..&nbsp; &nbsp;THEY FELT SAFE.&nbsp; &nbsp;THEY NEVER CRIED FOR EXTRA OVERTIME.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY KNEW I WAS A FAIR MAN-- A COMPETENT MAN -- A COMPASSIONATE MAN --EXTRA RARE IN SCI ...<br />\n<br />\nTHEY KNEW I WAS IN THE THICK OF ALL ACTION ON THE SHIPS.. WE HAD FUN AT WORK.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE WORKED HARD , WE PLAYED HARD.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nEQUIPMENT WHICH HAD NOT WORKED FOR AGES , CAME BACK TO LIFE..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS NOT MY JOB AS AN EXECUTIVE AN OFFICER -IT WAS THE JOB OF THE ENGINEERS .<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS IS NOT LOST ON THEM..<br />\n<br />\nTHEY KNEW CHIEF OFFICER DID NOT CARE FOR POPULARITY MEDALS ..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_rfDnBkrZJ8/WzGFtWzQvtI/AAAAAAABcfo/Of6n8_aND6Ekowa66zjVi0SsA9ZfZRFNQCLcBGAs/s1600/593438ERR-justice-as-fairness-provides-what-we-want-quote-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"800\" data-original-width=\"620\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_rfDnBkrZJ8/WzGFtWzQvtI/AAAAAAABcfo/Of6n8_aND6Ekowa66zjVi0SsA9ZfZRFNQCLcBGAs/s400/593438ERR-justice-as-fairness-provides-what-we-want-quote-1.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE RUSSIAN PRODUCT TANKER MENTIONED IN THE\nCOMMENT BELOW\u2014 WAS THIS SAME SHIP.</span></b><span style=\"color: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">December 25, 2014 at 10:48 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">hi bz,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">the hindu must stop being SELF LOATHING.\nafter that everything will fall into place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY HAS NARENDRA MODI\nBEEN UNABLE TO WARN ALL NOT TO MISUSE THE WORD SECULAR .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emperor Ashoka who\nintroduced secularism in India ( SIC ) never existed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS INSERTION OF THE\nWARPED WORD SECULAR INTO THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS BEEN THE GREATEST FRAUD\nPERPETRATED ON INDIA SINCE INDEPENDENCE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This EVIL intrusion of\nthe word SECULAR into the Constitution was made&nbsp;\nthrough the 42nd amendment in 1977 when&nbsp;\ndemocracy was dead,&nbsp; voice of&nbsp; the people was&nbsp; muzzled and&nbsp;\nALL fundamental rights had been suspended . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS WORD SECULAR\nAUTOMATICALLY BECOMES NULL AND VOID.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Forty-second\nAmendment of the Constitution of India, officially known as The Constitution\n(Forty-second Amendment) Act, 1976, was enacted during the Emergency by&nbsp; the&nbsp;\ngovernment headed by Indira Gandhi which kicked into effect on 3 January\n1977,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">42nd amendment&nbsp; is regarded as the most controversial\nconstitutional amendment in Indian history. It attempted to reduce the power of\nthe Supreme Court and High Courts to pronounce upon the constitutional validity\nof laws.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 42nd Amendment also\namended the Preamble and changed the description of India from \"sovereign\ndemocratic&nbsp; republic\" to a\n\u201csovereign socialist&nbsp; secular&nbsp; republic\u201d&nbsp;\nwhich was never the intention of the founding fathers when they drafted\nand passed the Constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ITALIAN WAITRESS\nWENT ONE STEP AHEAD WHEN SHE FORMED THE NAC ( NATIONAL ADVISORY COUNCIL ) / CVB(\nCOMMUNAL VOILENCEBILL ) &nbsp;WHERE SHE BECAME\nTHE SUPER PRIME MINISTER OF INDIA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is shocking that an unelected\nextra-constitutional body like the National Advisory Council (NAC), which is\nhome to Sonia Gandhi groupies, was allowed to draft a Bill that is so crucial\nto communal harmony. This is a Bill that requires a national consensus, and\ngetting a bunch of Congress-leaning activists to masquerade as the voice of\ncivil society is nonsense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bill is itself\ncommunal in nature. According to a key definition on the people who are\npresumably the focus of targeted violence, \u201cgroup\u201d means a religious or\nlinguistic minority, in any state in the Union of India, or Scheduled Castes\nand Scheduled Tribes (SC/ST)\u2026.\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you take away that fact that religious\nminorities and the SC/STs between them account for over 40% of the total\npopulation, the Bill cleverly posits that the other 60% (which may include\nupper castes Hindus, other backward castes and some miscellaneous groups) are\nthe only people capable of targeted violence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Are we saying 40% can never\ntarget 60%, given that these numbers are distributed all over the country?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala, where the\nnominal Hindu population is around 55%. text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fWr-PuyFHR8/WzGUnPfW92I/AAAAAAABcf8/1VF7QkWGBVcv9vjUx99o2EzE9q8e3nkcQCLcBGAs/s1600/dowDDnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a law has to\nprevail, then it should be universal in its approach and its enforcement should\nbe coupled with the system of checks and balances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; TREATMENT FOR MINORITIES ALONE , EVEN IN PLACES LIKE KASMIR WHERE THEY HINDUS HAVE BEEN ETHNICALLY CLEANSED.<br />\n<br />\nThis slimy word SECULAR inserted by DESH DROHIS did not exist in the losing the Hindu vote after the Emergency.<br />\n<br />\n7 DECADES AFTER INDEPENDENCE WE HAVE UNEQUAL CITIZENSHIP .<br />\n<br />\nTODAY SECULAR MEANS ALL RELIGIONS OTHER THAN HINDUISM-- HINDUS ARE She\u2019s very, very strong, will never be intimidated. She\u2019s already shown us the best way to handle this. Don\u2019t outrage, never let them believe they\u2019ve hurt you. That\u2019s their oxygen. PERMANENT ADDRESS IS COMPULSORY..<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT FORCE A STUDENT FROM KERALA TO PUT HIS HOSTEL ROOM ADDRESS IN SOME OTHER STATE IN THE PASSPORT..&nbsp; &nbsp;THERE ARE NO DECENT COLLEGES IN KERALA.. THE STUDENT WILL HAVE A HOME IN KERALA WHERE HE GOES BACK DURING VACATION.. THIS IS HIS <b><span style=\"color: red;\">PERMANENT ADDRESS</span></b>..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN MY ELDER SON APPLIED FOR HIS PASSPORT RENEWAL , HE CHANGED SIX HOSTELS IN SIX MONTHS \u2026 WATER PROBEM , RAGGING PROBLEM, NOISE PROBLEM ETC<br />\n<br />\nTHE STUPID CALICUT PASSPORT OFFICER WANTED THE LATEST COLLEGE HOSTEL ROOM ADDRESS ( WHICH WAS AN AC ROOM IN A NEARBY PRIVATE HOTEL ) FOR THE PASSPORT \u2026 IT WAS TOO HOT IN THE COLLEGE HOSTEL ROOM WITH A WORN OUT AC ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS DESPITE MY SON HAVING A PASSPORT SINCE HE WAS A ONE YEAR OLD BABY, AS HE SAILED WITH ME FOR 5 YEARS ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SO NOW ROHINGYAS AND BANGLADESIS PRETENDING TO BE ASSAMESE , WILL APPLY FOR PASSPORT IN KERALA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF\u2014<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nMEA<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nALL CENTRAL STATE/ MINISTERS AND MINISTRIES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nIGs OF ALL STATES<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nPASSPORT CENTRAL OFFICE<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/miss-neat-little-goody-pants-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1530058944690#c13949005123173667\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 27, 2018 at 5:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_88MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FOR IAS WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN SUBJECTIVE AND OBJECTIVE EVALUATION OF A CANDIDATE ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL --THE </span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">LINK BELOW IS AN OBJECTIVE TEST</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.. IT CAN BE EVALUATED BY A SIMPLE COMPUTER..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/marine-engineering-self-examiner-ships.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN YOU GO FOR A DRIVING TEST IN INDIA--YOU FIRST HAVE TO CLEAR THIS TYPE OF OBJECTIVE EXAM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">A HALF WIT CAN PASS AN OBJECTIVE EXAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEN WHAT IS A SUBJECTIVE EVALUATION?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT IS BUILDING AN IDEA FROM SCRATCH LIKE AN ESSAY .. THIS ESSAY CAN NEVER BE EVALUATED BY THE COMPUTER ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">A COMPUTER CAN NEVER LAUGH AT A SUBTLE JOKE OR TELL THE MORAL OF A STORY.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">FOR THIS YOU REQUIRE A CONSCIOUS HUMAN BRAIN.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SAY-&nbsp; &nbsp;SOMEONE ASKS ME-- WRITE AN ESSAY ABOUT AN EXPERIENCE AT SEA-- IT MUST BE TRUTHFUL , NOT A FANTASY OR FICTION -- IT MUST PACK PUNCH AND SUBTLE WIT.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/true-sea-story-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHEN I DID JOB INTERVIEWS IT WAS ALWAYS SUBJECTIVE..</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I SWUNG TO THE EXTREME..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WOULD GIVE A CHIEF ENGINEER A TECHNICAL ESSAY TO READ AT THE HOTEL.. THEN HE HAS TO COME BACK THE NEXT DAY AND ASK ME QUESTIONS .. I DONT ASK HIM QUESTIONS..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\nHIS QUESTIONS TO ME DECIDE WHAT HE IS WORTH.. A DUFFER OR INEXPERIENCED FELLOW WILL ASK STUPID QUESTIONS..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE:</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-lub-oil-analysis-babitt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/08/instructions-for-overflow-prevention-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN A CANDIDATE HAS TO ASK THE EXAMINER QUESTIONS -- THE EXAMINER MUST BE AN EXPERIENCED EXPERT -- OR IT WILL BACK FIRE BADLY .. DONT EVEN DARE TO TRY THIS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHERE CONSCIOUS HUMAN PASSION IS INVOLVED \u2013THE EVALUATION BECOME SUBJECTIVE.&nbsp; &nbsp; KOTA CRAM AND VOMIT PARTY , ROBOTS AND SUPER COMPUTERS WILL FAIL IN SUBJECTIVE EVALUATIONS AS INNER CONSCIOUS THOUGHTS ARE CALLED FOR..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR JUSTICE SYSTEM IS FOR IDIOTS AND CUNTS.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255695582#c848436323467207348\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://twitter.com/mkatju/status/1012424805239349249<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MORON IS BACK ON SOCIAL MEDIA AFTER A HIATUS..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">5 HUMPED COWS IN ONE ACRE OF LAND CAUSED INDIAs TOP SOIL TO BECOME SIX FEET DEEP AND HOLY --PRODUCING FOOD WITH GOLDEN MEAN ( 1.618 ) INHERENT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWITH GREEN REVLUTION OF DESH DROHI MS SWAMINATHAN AND RAMPANT USES OF ARTIFICIAL FERTLISERS --NOW OUR TOP SOIL IS JUST A FEW INCHES THICK--IT IS THIRST FOR WATER AND PRODUCED FOOD WHICH CAUSES DISEASES.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">90% OF HUMAN DISEASES ORIGINATE IN THE HUMAN GUT AS PER 6200 YEAR OLD AYURVEDA TEXT CHARAKA SAMHITA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThink of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026\u2026</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus\u2026\u2026.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nHumus is the most important thing in soil: more important that dew worms, and organic matter..<br />\n<br />\nCOMPOST IS NOT HUMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhen organic matter starts to decompose these molecules are broken down into smaller and smaller molecules by the micro-organisms in the soil (mostly bacteria and fungi)\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nDuring the humification process, microbes secrete sticky gum-like mucilages; these contribute to the crumb structure (tilth) of the soil by holding particles together, and allowing greater aeration of the soil\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToday humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Snakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026 Priceless snake grove soil was the BANK FOR AYURVEDIC HERBS ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIn humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..<br />\n<br />\nAt some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026It consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026 Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years.<br />\n<br />\nHumus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nBetter soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026 Humus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWhile these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..Humus can hold the equivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the soil's capacity to withstand drought condition\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_68BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_66T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1413190284692248433\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255759317#c1413190284692248433\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe biochemical structure of humus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil conditions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHUMUS IS DECIMATED BY CHEMICAL FERTILISERS. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE FARMER SUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI IS TOO BUSY ANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS. .<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL NADU MUST UNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nRECENTLY OUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ( WHICH PRODUCES BIOCHAR ) BECAUSE OF DELHI SMOG\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF THIS IS THE CASE SHIFT THE CAPITAL OF INDIA TO A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPERATURE INVERSION\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ..<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere...<br />\n<br />\nOnly a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..<br />\n<br />\nWith its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding.... Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERATELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\n<br />\nALL ABOVE HAS BEEN SENT TO MODI AND HIS MINISTERS MORE THAN 30 TIMES..<br />\n<br />\nWHO CARES ?..<br />\n<br />\nMODI GIVES US MORE AND MORE JAANKARI ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEKDAR ..<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY MODI WAS RECITING SOME KABIRDAS SHLOKA (&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>HOY KOY SHIT</b></span>&nbsp;) ..<br />\n<br />\nKABIRDAS NEVER EXISTED..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil ..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; ALL DEMOCRACIES INCLUDING INDIA HAD RULERS SWEARING OATHS TO \u201cPROTECT THE CONSITUTION\u201d. WHILE IN HIS OWN LAND PRESIDENT/ PM/ JUDGES ETC PLEDGED TO \u201c PROTECT THE WATAN\u201d \u2014THE PROMOSED LANDOF ISRAEL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">LOYALTY TO THE LITTLE RED BOOK OF MAO IS WHAT CAUSED INDIAN COMMIES TO BE ON THE SIDE OF CHINA DURING THE WAR IN 1962..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">NEHRU PUT THOUSANDS OF INDIAN COMMIE TRAITORS IN JAIL JUST BEFORE THE WAR BROKE OUT WITH CHINA. WHILE IN JAIL KERALA COMMIE VS ACHUTANANDAN WAS BITTEN BY CONSCIENCE WHEN HE SAW INDIAN SOLDIERS BEING SLAUGHTERED AT THE BORDER IN THE COLD , WITHOUT BULLETS FOR THEIR GUNS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">VS ACHUTANANDAN WANTED TO DONATE HIS BLOOD FOR OUR JAWANS AS A MARK OF SOLIDARITY.. ALL HIS DEAR COMRADES ( LIKE JYOTI BAU/ AK GOPALAN TYPES ) POUNCED ON HIM AND GAVE HIM A GOOD PASTING \u2013 HE NEARLY DIED OF INTERNAL INJURIES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">LOYALTY TO A BOOK NAMED KORAN , CAUSES THE OIL IN ALL MIDDLE EAST KINGDOWS TO BE STOLEN BY THE WHITE JEW AT THROW AWAY PRICES. ALL THESE OIL RICH KINGDOWMS HAVE MUSLIM POPULATION WITH A JEW KING INSTALLED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD \u2014ALL OF THEM..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN TWENTY ANOTHER YEARS , WHEN OIL RUNS OUT-- IT IS BACK ON CAMEL , LIVING IN TENTS AND WASHING ASSHOLE AFTER A SHIT WITH SAND.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; BEFORE THEY RUN AWAY TO THE WEST WITH THEIR HARES AND RELATIVES , WHERE THEY HAVE SALTED AWAY TRILLIONS OF USD OF THEIR PRIVATE CASH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; BALLS TO THE PATHETIC BONG.. CHAAL THODA MACHER JHOL PEE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">## 2) INDIA HAS THE LEAST UNHAPINESS ON THIS PLANET BY PERCENTAGE \u2013REPEAT\u2014BY PERCENTAGE.. HE JUST SHOT HER IN A HIGH END BAR WITH DOZENS OF POWERFUL PEOPLE WATCHING FOR TAUNTING HIM- THAT HE IS NOT GOOD ENOUGH WHERE IT COUNTS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">HIS DEEP STATE POLITICIAN FATHER WHO HAS JUDGES / POLICE IN HIS PAYROLL , BOUGHT A STAR HOTEL NEARBY THE JAIL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THIS YOUNG BOY NEVER SENT MUCH TIME IN JAIL.. HE STAYED AT HIS FATHERs HOTEL BINDAAS \u2014GOT MARRIED AND HAD HIS WEDDING NIGHT TOO IN JAIL WITH DOZENS OF GUESTS .. INCLUDING MINISERS, MEDIA BARONS , POLICE AND JUDGES .. THE INSPECTION TAKES BETWEEN TEN TO TWELVE HOURS..<br />\n<br />\nHE WILL GO THOUGH A CHECK LIST OF MORE THAN A THOUSAND ITEMS..IT WILL ALL BE OBJECTIVE -- BLACK OR WHITE...<br />\n<br />\nTHEN THERE IS A FINAL QUESTION --THE ANSWER IF CLASSIFIED-- SHARED ONLY BETWEEN THE VETTING INSPECTOR AND HIS COMPANY..<br />\n<br />\nLAST SUBJECTIVE QUESTION -- \" WILL YOU MAKE A VOYAGE ON THIS SHIP, WITH THE CURRENT CAPTAIN AND CREW WITHOUT RESERVATION ?\"..<br />\n<br />\nABOVE IS NOT AN OBJECTIVE QUESTION.. BIGG BOSS HAS BEEN INTRODUCED IN INDIA TO MAKE INDIAN SOCIETY ACCEPT WEIRDOS / PUNKS / HOMOSEXUALS / CROSS DRESSERS / MISFITS -- AS IF THEY ARE NORMAL PEOPLE .<br />\n<br />\nTODAY INDIA IS FULL OF TRAITORS BECAUSE THEY ARE NOT AFRAID-- THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY SUPPORTS THEM...BHARATMATA WILL BLEED IF FOREIGN FUNDED TRAITORS ARE NOT REMOVED AND PUNISHED FROM COLLEGIUM JUDIAIRY, NHRC, NCM AND NCW\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nNEPALESE BABURAM BHATTARAI AND LIBYAN ALI ZEIDAN WHO BECAME PRIME MINISTERS OF THEIR NATIONS ARE JNU COMMIES \u2013 \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026.TRAINED BY ZIONIST JEWS , TO PLOT BLOODY KILLINGS OF GADDAFI / ROYAL NEPAL FAMILY ..<br />\n<br />\nONE OF THE REASONS FOR NAXALISM , IS BECAUSE OF THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY . . .. POOR UNDERTRIALS WHO ARE BREAD WINNERS ARE KEPT IN JAIL FOR DECADES WITHOUT A TRIAL . .. .<br />\n<br />\nPOOR PEOPLE DO NOT HAVE THE WHEREWITHAL TO PROVIDE BAIL MONEY OR PERSONAL SURETY . . .WITH ANOTHER MAN COMING AND SHOWING ALL THOSE DOCUMENTS WHICH ARE REQUIRED FOR THE GUARANTEE . ... WHY IS THE INDIAN GOVT INSISTING ON BAIL MONEY FROM VERY POOR PEOPLE ?<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA FIRST WANT THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TO SEE THEMSELVES IN THE MIRROR .............<br />\n<br />\nOWAISI WANT COLLEGIUM JUDGES TO DEAL WITH THREATS TO BHARATMATAs INTERNAL AND EXTERNAL SECURITY... WE KNOW WHY ... FARMER SUICIDES ARE BEING HYPDED UP BY DESH DROHI BENAMI MEDIA.. OUR BENAMI INDIAN MAIN STREAM MEDIA HAS LOST ALL CREDIBILITY..CALLING NAXAL FARMERS AS ANNA DHATAS.. GOD IS ANNA DHATA..\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nANY POLITICIAN , JUDGE OR NHRC MEMBER WHO SUPPORTS COP KILLERS FOR SELFISH GAINS , SHOULD BE TAUGHT A SEVERE LESSON\u2026... OUR COPS ARE POORLY PAID\u2026.. THERE IS NO SUPPORT OR AWARDS OR MARTYRDOM FOR THEM\u2026\u2026THEY ALSO GOT WIVES AND CHILDREN\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCM OF MP GAVE TWO LAKH CASH REWARDS TO THE POLICEMEN WHO SHOT DOWN THE EIGHT SIMI COP KILLERS WHO ESCAPED FROM BHOPAL PRISON..... NDTV SAYS \" CM HAS BROKEN THE RULE OF SUPREME COURT THAT NO SUCH CASH AWARDS CAN BE GIVEN \" \u2026..<br />\n<br />\nOH YEAH ?..<br />\n<br />\nSINCE WHEN HAS COLLEGIUM SUPREME COURT STARTED MAKING RULES AND FAALTHU LAWS ? \u2026THEY DONT HAVE SUCH RIGHTS UNDER THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION ! \u2026AND PAST RULING ?... BURN THEM !...<br />\n<br />\nEVERY CASE NEEDS A FRESH PAIR OF EYES....... WE WANT THE LAW MINISTER AND ATTORNEY GENERAL TO KNOW THE SCOPE AND POWER OF THEIR JOBS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW THE NEXUS BETWEEN COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY / NHRC/ NCW/ NCM / HUMAN RIGHTs ORGs WITH NAXALS .....<br />\n<br />\nJUDICIARY HAS NO POWERS OF FINANCIAL AFFAIRS --ESPECIALLY FINANCIAL REFORMS TO PREVENT BHARATMATA FROM BEING BLED BY DESH DROHIS AND TERRORISTS.......<br />\n<br />\nTILL TODAY WE THE PEOPLE HAVE NEVER SEEN COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY /NHRC / NCM SHOW ANY CONCERN FOR JAWANS SLAIN BY NAXALS / ISLAMIC TERRORISTS \u2026.. BUT THESE DROHIS CRY COPIUS TEARS WHEN A NAXAL OR A DESH DROHI KILLER SOHRABUDDIN IS SLAIN BY A JAWAN/ POLICE , EVEN CALLING FOR EXTRA JUDICIAL KILLING INQUIRY \u2026 ..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS HIGH TIME THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE PUNISHES THESE COLLEGIUM JUDGES (USING MILITARY COURTS) , WHO GO AGAINST THE WATAN , UNDER FOREIGN SPONSORSHIP ..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO CREATED THE LEGEND THAT LADY JUSTICE IS BLIND....... THIS IS WHY NAXALS LOOK INTO THE CAMERA AND SAY--WE TRUST OUR SUPREME COURT... -- FOR FAKE WITNESSES CAN BE PRODUCED OUT OF THIN AIR BY FOREIGN MONEY ( LIKE TEESTA SETALVAD )\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nTHE PREPONDERENCE OF LAWS IN THE CONSTITUTION MUST BE CLEARLY LAID OUT IN A CRYSTAL \"BODMAS \" STYLE..... 1 + 5 x 6 - 3 + (4 - 2)... ... what part should you calculate first?..... Calculate them in the wrong order, and you will get a wrong answer !... This is where BODMAS kicks in !......<br />\n<br />\nOUR UNSUCCESSFUL LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES DONT HAVE THE BRAINS TO PRIORITIZE........ B- Brackets first.... O- Orders (ie Powers and Square Roots, etc.)..... DM- Division and Multiplication (left-to-right)..... AS- Addition and Subtraction (left-to-right)... ..<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution was made in 1950, and 68 years had passed since it was promulgated, but Article 44 had been totally ignored by vested politicians\u2014eager to appease Muslims for vote bank politics.......<br />\n<br />\nWe urge Modi to rewrite the Indian Constitution afresh in tune with the changing needs, while preserving the unity, integrity and sovereignty of the watan..... India needs a new engine because the old one is broken and can never deliver the power needed for the NEW journey.....<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS ON COURSE TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS...... AND THE WHOLE AUDIENCE CLAPPED\u2026 HE WILL NEVER PISS ON A JESUS ON CROSS IDOL..<br />\n<br />\nCOMMIES ( LIKE IN JNU ) HAVE INVADED COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY, NHRC, MCM, MCW, HUMAN RIGHTs ORGS ......
