max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1655772659830462541\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_175M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1529713383034#c1655772659830462541\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 23, 2018 at 5:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDONALD TRUMP<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nAND LISTEN GOOD</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">TO WEAKEN THE DEEP STATE --RE-INTRODUCE THE GLASS -STEAGALL ACT WHICH WAS REPEALED BY DEEP STATE PRESIDENT BILL CLINTON IN 1999.</span></div>\n<br />\nEighty-five years ago this weekend, on 16 June 1933, Franklin Delano Roosevelt signed the Banking Act of 1933, better known today as the Glass-Steagall Act.<br />\n<br />\nThe Glass-Steagall Act required a separation between depository banking and investment banking (and later, insurance companies).<br />\n<br />\nGlass-Steagall\u2019s key principle was to keep risky assets away from insured deposits<br />\n<br />\nThen the DEEP STATE at Wall Street saw opportunities to make lots of money by betting on stocks, bonds and derivatives (bets on bets) \u2014 and in 1999 persuaded Bill Clinton and a Republican Congress to repeal it.<br />\n<br />\nWhy didn't America simply reinstate Glass-Steagall after the last financial crisis? Because too much money was at stake. Wall Street was intent on keeping the door open to making bets with commercial deposits.<br />\n<br />\nWhy should banks ever be permitted to use people's bank deposits -- insured by the federal government -- to place risky bets on the banks' own behalf?<br />\n<br />\nA Glass-Steagall reintroduction would prevent banks and financial brokerages from covering bad debt investments with the collateral from their financial resources, thus endangering their depositer\u2019s investments.<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, the Ponzi Scheme known as Credit Swap Derivatives would not be able to leverage the credit rating of a bank, or the underwriting from a brokerage.<br />\n<br />\nThe credit default swap market is a $60 trillion-plus paper Ponzi-scheme. The Wall Street syndicate claiming to \"back\" this insurance have nothing more than a few billions of dollars of liquidity apiece.<br />\n<br />\nHere is how this particular Wall Street scam operates. First of all, the banksters pile on massive shorting with respect to the credit default swaps of a particular European debt-market. This drives the prices of credit default swaps sky-high.<br />\n<br />\nMeanwhile, the banksters' accomplices in the mainstream media then perform their best impersonation of Chicken Little: \"the sky is falling on Greece's economy.\" At this point the third partner of this illegitimate tag-team chimes in: the ratings agencies.<br />\n<br />\nBased on nothing more than changes in credit default swap prices and media rhetoric, the ratings agencies downgrade the debt of these Euro markets -- immediately driving interest rates higher.<br />\n<br />\nThis significantly raises the interest payments on these debtor economies, instantly making those economies less solvent. This is then followed by another shorting operation in the credit default swap market, more media rhetoric, and more bogus \"downgrades.\". And thus the perfect vicious-circle of crime is established.<br />\n<br />\nThrough the fraudulent manipulation of Europe's debt markets, Wall Street's economic terrorists have been able to drive Greek interest rates as much as 50 times higher than U.S. interest rates, despite the fact that the U.S. economy is more fundamentally insolvent than that of Greece.<br />\n<br />\nThe Glass\u2013Steagall legislation describes four provisions of the U.S.A Banking Act of 1933 separating commercial and investment banking n 1933, in the wake of the 1929 stock market crash and during a nationwide commercial bank failure and the Great Depression<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/great-american-depression-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nThe Glass-Steagall Act (GSA) separated investment and commercial banking activities. At the time, \"improper banking activity,\" or what was considered overzealous commercial bank involvement in stock market investment, was deemed the main culprit of the financial crash. According to that reasoning, commercial banks took on too much risk with depositors' money.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_174T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_174TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBNSLD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_174TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_174TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBNSLD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_174TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_174TN\"></span></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_174TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBNSLD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2811206989467428599\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1529713444092#c2811206989467428599\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 23, 2018 at 5:54 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nCommercial banks were accused of being too speculative in the pre-Depression era, not only because they were investing their assets but also because they were buying new issues for resale to the public.<br />\n<br />\nThus, banks became greedy, taking on huge risks in the hope of even bigger rewards. Banking itself became sloppy and objectives became blurred. Unsound loans were issued to companies in which the bank had invested, and clients would be encouraged to invest in those same stocks.<br />\n<br />\nGlass-Steagall's key principle was to keep risky assets away from insured deposits<br />\n<br />\nIn 2015, the interest on the Credit Swap Derivatives was $505 trillion dollars based on an estimated debt of $1.5 quadrillion dollars.<br />\n<br />\nA credit default swap is a particular type of swap designed to transfer the credit exposure of fixed income products between two or more parties. In a credit default swap, the buyer of the swap makes payments to the swap\u2019s seller up until the maturity date of a contract.<br />\n<br />\nIn return, the seller agrees that, in the event that the debt issuer defaults or experiences another credit event, the seller will pay the buyer the security\u2019s premium as well as all interest payments that would have been paid between that time and the security\u2019s maturity date.<br />\n<br />\nA credit default swap is the most common form of credit derivative and may involve municipal bonds, emerging market bonds, mortgage-backed securities or corporate bonds.<br />\n<br />\nA credit default swap is also often referred to as a credit derivative contract.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>Debt repudiation</b></span>&nbsp;is the only way that the American economy will survive ( 21.3 TRILLION USD EBT ) . This is the equivalent of Lincoln\u2019s Greenbacks plan following the Civil War. It is also the equivalent of JFK\u2019s silver certificate \u201cC-Notes\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nAnd what happened to both Presidents?<br />\n<br />\nThey were summarily executed by being shot in the head by the kosher DEEP STATE.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; In contrast with passwords and pins, a biometric identifier cannot be\nlost, forgotten or shared.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Millions of businesses\nacross Europe were unable to accept credit card payments when a hardware\nfailure caused major service disruption at card payment giant Visa.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Outlets\nwhich accept VISA payments had literally no in-built redundancy and had to\nrefuse payments..</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE THE PEOPLE ASK MODI--WHY ARE OUR THINK TANKS MANNED BY USELESS PEOPLE WHO HAVE SHIT FOR BRAINS?..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_12BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4799749144108825339\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_14M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529802051731#c4799749144108825339\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 6:30 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_14MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YESTERDAY MIDNIGHT ME AND MY WIFE WERE WATCHING THE GERMANY / SWEDEN WORLD CUP SOCCER MATCH TOGETHER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SWEDEN SCORED FIRST IN THE 32ND MINUTE --AND THE ENTIRE GERMANS IN THE STADIUM WERE SORT OF GLOOM GLOOM LIKE JUGHEADs DOG HOTDOG...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT THAT TIME IF MADE A STATEMENT TO WY WIFE \" GERMANS WILL FIGHT TILL THE LAST SECOND \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AND SURE ENOUGH IN THE 95TH MINUTE JUST 12 SECONDS BEFORE TIME, GERMANY SCORED THE WINNING GOAL..AND WON 2-1..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO I ASKED MY WIFE \" FROM THE TIME SWEDEN HIT THE FIRST GOAL TO THE END OF THE MATCH HOW MANY TIMES DID I SAY THAT GERMANS WILL FIGHT TILL THE LAST SECOND \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE SAID - I KEPT A COUNT--YOU TOLD IT NINE TIMES.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BRAZIL IS STILL TRYING TO FIGURE OUT WHO THEIR TEAM LOST TO GERMANY 7-1 IN THE LAST WORLD CUP 4 YEARS AGO, SENDING THE WHOLE NATION TO GLOOM.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN PSYCHOLOGY THIS IS KNOWN AS \"TANKING \" OR \"CHOKING \"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PEOPLE WHO SAILED WITH ME WILL VOUCH \"CAPTAIN NEVER TANKS \"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY WILL VOUCH HOW CAPTAIN LOVED TO HIT SIX SIXES INTO A HOSTILE CROWD --BLOODYING THE NOSES OF HIS WORST DETRACTORS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY WILL VOUCH HOW CAPTAIN DELIBERATELY HUNG THE \"SWORD OF DAMOCLES \" OVER HIS HEAD TO PERFORM BETTER.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/blue-ocean-leadership-capt-ajit.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">WHEN I EVALUATE A SENIOR OFFICER FOR PROMOTION --&nbsp; &nbsp;I AM SUBJECTIVE.. I ONLY SEE HIS POTENTIAL..NEVER HIS PAST OR CURRENT PERFORMANCE... IF HE IS THE \"TANKING TYPE\" HE WONT GET PROMOTED..</b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I have seen Tennis players when they are losing the first set usually tank the game so that they can move to the second set without losing more energy.. And then they find that are losing the second set too.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">TANKING COMES OUT OF FRUSTRATION WITH YOURSELF FOR LAGGING AND YOU DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Some tennis players will internally beat themselves up after an error and experience a flood of negative emotion, self-doubt and anxiety.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Anxiety increases muscle tension and interferes with your focus on the court.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You lose the fluidity of your game and become rigid and mechanical. You may try to force shots and over-think your play which results in tanking ( CHOKING ) the match.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHOKING refers to an inability to perform up to what you show in practice daily.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF A ARMY GENERAL CHOKES--IT IS TOTAL DISASTER FOR HIS MEN..&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL LED THE INDIAN ARMY DURING THE KARGIL WAR, THERE WOULD NOT HAVE BEEN A SINGLE DEATH..</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GETTING YOUR MEN KILLED WHILE YOU SHOUT \"<b><span style=\"color: red;\">YEH DIL MAANGE MORE </span></b>WHILE TRYING TO CAPTURE SOME BULLSHIT ROCKY HILLOCK IS WHAT? --WHAT IS THE IMMINENT NEED TO CAPTURE THAT HILLOCK 2749 --IF YOU DONT YOU WILL MISS THE BUS ?\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Anxiety and fear of failure are the main cause of CHOKING.. In tennis , if you begin to over-think or recognize that you are dwelling on a previous error, refocus quickly on the current point.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Fight for every point... Spectators do NOT like players who tank matches..choking is triggered by a specific mental mistake: thinking too much.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The sequence of events typically goes like this: when people get nervous about performing, they become self-conscious. They start to fixate on themselves, trying to make sure that they don't make any mistakes.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_14BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_14b+seedCuXBD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_13T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_13TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_14b+seedCuXBD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_13B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><br /><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7967715917224553251\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_13M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529802110681#c7967715917224553251\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 6:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_13MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This can be lethal for a performer. The bowler concentrates too much on his action and loses control of the ball. The footballer misses the penalty by a mile.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In each instance, the natural fluidity of performance is lost; the grace of talent disappears.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOU ARE NOT IN THE FLOW</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/in-flow-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOU HAVE DRIFTED AWAY FROM THE ZONE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/in-zone-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Performers begin second guessing skills that they have honed through years of practice. The worst part about choking is that it tends to spiral. The failures build upon each other, so a stressful situation is made more stressful.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Effort, or the perception of effort, is subjective and situational. Fear destroys confidence.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">OUR INDIAN ARMED FORCES ARE LED BY CHOKER GENERALS --&nbsp; ONLY BECAUSE THEY HAVE BEEN EVALUATED OBJECTIVELY&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">A CHAMPION OR A HERO NEVER CHOKES OR TANKS.. ONLY HE CAN INSPIRE OTHERS..ONLY HE CAN BE A MENTOR..</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NIRMALA SITARAMAN</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DEFENCE MINISTRY</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAJNATH SINGH</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOME MINISTRY</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For the past over 25 years, an amazingly dedicated man named Carl Malamud has taken it upon himself to singlehandedly publish for free on his website Public.Resouce.org every local, State and US Federal government law ever enacted\u2014a stupendous feat...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529848590537#c884639508971628010\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 7:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA major portion of DHARMA is carried out in the Grihasta stage -- where you are creative and do your DUTY for good of society and nation ( age 25 to age 50 ). This is the period when a man demonstrates SELF RESTRAINT .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen the scriptural studies appropriate to the student have been completed, and he has received blessings of his Guru, let him enter into the order of the Grihastha (householder). Let him pursue and obtain, by ethical ways, home, wife, children and wealth, discharge to the best of his ability the duties of his life's stage.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014\u2009Vishnu Purana, 3.IX.1 - 3.IX.31 5000 BC</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT IS THE LYING WHITE INVADER WHO MADE PRESERVATION OF SEMEN , AND BEING UNMARRIED AS A GREAT QUALIFICATION IN HINDUISM \u2013 SANATANA DHARMA BANS IT . .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN GRIHASTA STAGE THE MAN IS NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE SEX WITH ANY WOMAN WHO COMES HIS WAY , LIKE HOW THE NAMBOODIRIS DID IN KERALA ( SAMBANDHAM ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE CAN HAVE SEX ONLY WITH HIS WIFE AND CONTINUING HIS LINEAGE IS PART OF HIS DHARMA .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe 7000 year old Vedas lay down that dharma performed by a man alone without his wife is no dharma and will yield no fruit whatsoever. Such is the paramount nature of Grihasta ashrama.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Vedas hold marriage to be one of the important sacraments sanctifying the body. That is why; marriage is given great importance by the Hindus.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is said, \u201cThat man who does not win a wife is really half, and he is not the full man as long as he does not beget an offspring.\u201d A wife is also hailed as\u201d the very source of the Purusharthas, not Only of Dharma, Artha and Kama but even of Moksha.\u2019</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindu god had his wife almost as a part of him, not as a shadow.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nShiva is powerless without Shakti.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarriage in Sanatana Dharma is NOT for sexual pleasure.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindus man is compulsorily expected to undergo the \u201cvivaha samskara\u201d and run a family (kutumba). Never mind what FREEMASON and Jew Rothschild\u2019s UNMARRIED Vivekananda said .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Vedas ordain that dharma must be practiced by man together with his wife.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma, marriage is a religious duty, and not a civil contract. It is regarded as one of the most sacred of the sacraments symbolizing the holy and indissoluble union of a couple who thereafter are mutually dependent and indispensable in the performance of religious duties.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nProgeny instrumental to cementing a relationship and for bliss.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>Manu Smriti clearly states that \u201che is a perfect man, who consists of his wife, himself and his offspring.\u201d</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVedas have enjoined that dharma must be observed by man together with his wife. No yagna performed or pilgrimages undertaken will have any effect, if the wife is not a partner in those holy duties during the grihasta and vanaprasta ashramas. During Sanyasa the man can go for pilgrimage on his own.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe early shastras permit unmarried girls to take the whole responsibility upon themselves of choosing their life-mates and enter into wedlock with them. They need to wait for three years only after puberty for some responsible elder to arrange for their marriage, but no more.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma marriages are made in heaven , NOT by LIVING IN TOGETHER ( like in the west ) and examining if the wife can indeed give him a good blow job whenever he wants it\u2014</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n--or vice versa--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nif the husband can use his tongue power on her fungi affected , smelling like putrid fish part whenever she wishes .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy own marriage was arranged.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy elder son\u2019s marriage was arranged</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN OUR FAMILY THERE HAS NEVER EVER BEEN CAESARIAN BIRTHS \u2013THOUGH INDIA WAS THE FIRST TO DO THIS SURGICAL PROCEDURE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT WAS ROTHSCHILD MEDIA AND HISTORIANS WHO GAVE UNWARRANTED PROPAGANDA FOR UNMARRIED HINDU GURUS ( I AM SURE YOU KNOW WHO THEY ARE ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA LOT OF THESE UNMARRIED FAKE GURUS WERE CRYPTO JEW HOMOSEXUALS - -- OR JUST FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS OF THE WHITE INVADER - THEY ARE HEROES IN YOUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is the white invader who wrote lies that Hindus ill treat women and suppress them. The west has tried hard to inject their useless culture in India by canned laughter TV soaps where the children insult their parents. It did NOT work \u2013it is a genome thing.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWife is called as DHARMA patni i.e. a life partner who accompanies you on the path of dharma. No yajna (vedic ritual) can be carried out without the presence of wife.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAn Indian wife can never be KAMA patni like in the west.\u2014where as soon as lust subsides , both husband and wife are screwing behind each others back.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTODAY , DUE TO THE POISON INJECTED BY THE WHITE INVADER USING HIS FAKE MUTTS \u2013 HOMOSEXUALS WEAR SAFFRON ROBES AND CALL THEMSELVES \u201cSEERS \u201c.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nyou see SWAMI AGNIVESH is a SEER as per our commie media..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSANATANA DHARMA HAS MADE IT VERY CLEAR, THAT UNMARRIED MEN CANNOT DO A YAJNA ( HOMAM ) AND THIS NAILS THE LIE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGRIHASTA is the greatest of all other \u0101shramas because the other 3 ashramas depend on gr\u0325ihastas for food. Gr\u0325ihasta is the pillar on which Hindu society is shored up.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery man should seek to wed a virtuous and wise wife, because she is the support of the CHATUR ASHRAMA mode of life.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma a wife is expected to keep her husband on the righteous path as part of her DHARMA.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is the white invader who injected poison that we Hindus suppress our women. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THESE\nSTUPID COMMIE STUDENTS AND PROFESSORS THOUGHT THAT BR AMBEDKAR COINED THIS CRY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AFTER\nALL THIS CRY IS ON THE PREAMBLE OF THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION \u2013IN REALITY INSERTED\nBY COMMIE PROF JOHN DEWEY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOTE:&nbsp; INDIAN CONSTITUTION MUST BE A SUBJECT IN THE\nNCERT SCHOOL SYLLABUS..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://extwprlegs1.fao.org/docs/pdf/ind132810.pdf\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://extwprlegs1.fao.org/docs/pdf/ind132810.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LIBERTY\nEQUALTY AND FRATERNITY&nbsp; (&nbsp; Libert\u00e9, \u00e9galit\u00e9, fraternit\u00e9 )&nbsp; WAS A MOTTO COINED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR HIS\nFRENCH FREEMASON LODGES. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZiJZVK_xZ3Y/WzB1WKzTh4I/AAAAAAABcd8/MJJRqQDZDio5-XUUgEQuYw7vEUMst2Z2ACLcBGAs/s1600/Faum2011-500.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"500\" data-original-width=\"500\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZiJZVK_xZ3Y/WzB1WKzTh4I/AAAAAAABcd8/MJJRqQDZDio5-XUUgEQuYw7vEUMst2Z2ACLcBGAs/s640/Faum2011-500.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LATER\nTHIS CRY WAS USED &nbsp;TO CARRY OUT THE FRENCH\nREVOLUTION USING HIS FREEMASONS AND BEHEAD &nbsp;THE FRENCH KING LOUIS XVI AND THE QUEEN&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KiX3ZVD1h-Q/WzB17mQKBQI/AAAAAAABceE/dvALPKqvXfg3hQuzRU5YH6uHs2YsUK1VACLcBGAs/s1600/Ex%25C3%25A9cution_de_Marie_Antoi555nette_le_16_octobre_1793.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"861\" data-original-width=\"1200\" height=\"458\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KiX3ZVD1h-Q/WzB17mQKBQI/AAAAAAABceE/dvALPKqvXfg3hQuzRU5YH6uHs2YsUK1VACLcBGAs/s640/Ex%25C3%25A9cution_de_Marie_Antoi555nette_le_16_octobre_1793.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\nis&nbsp; the motto of the Grand Orient de\nFrance and the Grande Loge de France. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nGrand Orient de France (GODF) is the largest of several Masonic organizations\nin France and the oldest in Continental Europe.&nbsp;&nbsp; It was formed out of the older Grand Lodge\nof France in 1773,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nGrande Loge de France (GLDF) is the third largest Masonic obedience in France.\nIt positions itself as occupying a unique position in the landscape of French\nFreemasonry, recognising and having relations with the obediences of\nContinental Freemasonry while still considering itself to be separate from\nthem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW\nROTHSCHILD DID BOTH THE FRENCH REVOLUTION AND THE ENGLISH REVOLUTION 140 YEARS\nBEFORE WHEN KING CHARLES 1 WAS BEHEADED . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; In late 1921, Lenin's\nhealth deteriorated and Lenin favoured Trotsky against Stalin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In January 1923, Lenin amended his Testament\nto suggest that Stalin should be removed as the party's general secretary..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The relationship between Stalin and Lenin had\nbroken down completely by this time, as was demonstrated during an event where\nStalin crudely insulted Lenin's wife, Nadezhda Krupskaya. In March 1923, days\nbefore his third stroke, Lenin asked Trotsky to denounce Stalin and his so-called\n\"Great-Russian nationalistic campaign\" at the XIIth Party Congress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW Stalin ( Rothschild blood and groomed in\nBaku ) wielded more power with Rothschild \u2014Stalin did not like Trotsky.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In October 1927, Trotsky was expelled from\nthe Central Committee\u2014see Rothschild blood is thicker than water<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In February 1929, Trotsky was deported from\nthe Soviet Union to Turkey. On 20 August 1940, in his study, Trotsky was\nattacked by Ram\u00f3n Mercader an assassin sent by Stalin ( ice axe as a\nweapon)\u2014Trotsky with an injured head ,fought back, broke the assassins arm and\nhis guards killed the assassin. Trotsky died the next day, knowing who sent the\nassassin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Trotsky's last words were \"I will not\nsurvive this attack. Stalin has finally accomplished the task he attempted\nunsuccessfully before.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW Trotsky was one of the seven members of\nthe first Politburo, founded in 1917 to manage the Bolshevik Revolution. In\nreality he was the prime force. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/miss-neat-little-goody-pants-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1530058944690#c13949005123173667\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 27, 2018 at 5:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_88MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME-<br />\n<br />\nFOR IAS WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN SUBJECTIVE AND OBJECTIVE EVALUATION OF A CANDIDATE ?<br />\n<br />\nWELL --THE&nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">LINK BELOW IS AN OBJECTIVE TEST</span></b>.. IT CAN BE EVALUATED BY A SIMPLE COMPUTER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/marine-engineering-self-examiner-ships.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU GO FOR A DRIVING TEST IN INDIA--YOU FIRST HAVE TO CLEAR THIS TYPE OF OBJECTIVE EXAM..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\">A HALF WIT CAN PASS AN OBJECTIVE EXAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHEN WHAT IS A SUBJECTIVE EVALUATION?<br />\n<br />\nIT IS BUILDING AN IDEA FROM SCRATCH LIKE AN ESSAY .. THIS ESSAY CAN NEVER BE EVALUATED BY THE COMPUTER ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">A COMPUTER CAN NEVER LAUGH AT A SUBTLE JOKE OR TELL THE MORAL OF A STORY.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">FOR THIS YOU REQUIRE A CONSCIOUS HUMAN BRAIN.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSAY-&nbsp; &nbsp;SOMEONE ASKS ME-- WRITE AN ESSAY ABOUT AN EXPERIENCE AT SEA-- IT MUST BE TRUTHFUL , NOT A FANTASY OR FICTION -- IT MUST PACK PUNCH AND SUBTLE WIT.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/true-sea-story-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHEN I DID JOB INTERVIEWS IT WAS ALWAYS SUBJECTIVE..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nI SWUNG TO THE EXTREME..<br />\n<br />\nI WOULD GIVE A CHIEF ENGINEER A TECHNICAL ESSAY TO READ AT THE HOTEL.. THEN HE HAS TO COME BACK THE NEXT DAY AND ASK ME QUESTIONS .. I DONT ASK HIM QUESTIONS..</div>\n<div>\nHIS QUESTIONS TO ME DECIDE WHAT HE IS WORTH.. A DUFFER OR INEXPERIENCED FELLOW WILL ASK STUPID QUESTIONS..</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nEXAMPLE:<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-lub-oil-analysis-babitt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/08/instructions-for-overflow-prevention-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN A CANDIDATE HAS TO ASK THE EXAMINER QUESTIONS -- THE EXAMINER MUST BE AN EXPERIENCED EXPERT -- OR IT WILL BACK FIRE BADLY .. DONT EVEN DARE TO TRY THIS<br />\n<br />\nWHERE CONSCIOUS HUMAN PASSION IS INVOLVED \u2013THE EVALUATION BECOME SUBJECTIVE.&nbsp; &nbsp; KOTA CRAM AND VOMIT PARTY , ROBOTS AND SUPER COMPUTERS WILL FAIL IN SUBJECTIVE EVALUATIONS AS INNER CONSCIOUS THOUGHTS ARE CALLED FOR..<br />\n<br />\nOUR JUSTICE SYSTEM IS FOR IDIOTS AND CUNTS.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY WE CANNOT HAVE BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL AT SCHOOL LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES \u2013 TO BE GIVEN POWERS OVER LIFE AND DEATH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">GLEANING TRUTH FROM CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE , UNDERSTANDING CONTEXT , RESPECTING CULTURE AND DELIVERING NATURAL JUSTICE ( DHARMA ) IS IN THE REALM OF THE SUBJECTIVE.</span><br />\n<br />\nI KEEP IT AT THE LEVEL OF THE LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR\u2026 FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT THINKERS OR PHILOSOPHERS<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA WHEN STUPID TECHNICAL BOSSES ASK ME \u201c WHY DID YOU DO THAT\u201d\u2014&nbsp; I JUST TELL THEM OFF&nbsp; &nbsp;\u201cI AM THE CAPTAIN , MERA MARRJJI \u2013YOU WONT EVEN UNDERSTAND IF I EXPLAIN IT TO YOU \u201c<br />\n<br />\nMY TECHNICAL ENGINEERING BOSSES KNEW WHAT WAS GOOD FOR THEM..<br />\n<br />\nFOR IF THEY PISSED OFF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL, THEY KNEW HE CAN TAKE OUT ONE TECHICAL CIRCULAR A DAY ( WRITTEN BY HIM ) AND TAKE IT APART , AND MAKE HIM LOOK LIKE A MENTAL RETARD IN THE OFFICE LEAVING HIM NO OPTION BUT TO RESIGN ..<br />\n<br />\nNEVER LOSE RESPECT AT THE OFFICE \u2013THUMB RULE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<b><br /></b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_191M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_19.html?showComment=1529545596803#c6820372111418789953\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 7:16 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_191MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PRANAB MUKHERJEE IS THE WORST PRESIDENT OF INDIA.. HE CAN SHOVE HIS \u201cCONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTSM\u201d\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN ENTIRE PARLIAMENT SESSIONS GOT WASHED OUT ON MANIPULATION OF THE ITALIAN WAITRESS , THIS BONG FELLOW WAS WALKING ON THE PRESIDENTIAL LAWNS SIPPING MACHCHER JHOL...</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">PRANAB MUKHERJEE DID NOT KNOW THE SUBJECTIVE / DISCRETIONARY POWERS OF THE PRESIDENTS CHAIR AFFORDED BY THE CONSTITUTION...</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">SUBJECTIVE POWERS ARE GIVEN TO THE PRESIDENT SO THAT HE CAN SUSTAIN DHARMA ... THIS IS WHY HE IS THE SUPREME COMMANDER OF THE ARMED FORCES...</span></b></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\">Indian President is not a ceremonial head, or RUBBER STAMP \u2013as told my benami media&nbsp;\u2026</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All important decisions regarding the country are taken in the name of Indian President, though most of these will be based on the binding advice given by Council of Ministers(CoM), as per Article 74 of Indian Constitution. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But there are certain exceptions, where he can use his ENORMOUS discretionary powers..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President has discretionary power when he exercises suspensive veto ie. when he returns a bill (not money bill) for reconsideration of the parliament\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">However if the bill is passed again by the Parliament with or without amendments and presented again to the President, it is obligatory for him to give his assent to the bill\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President has a pocket veto power ( to sustain dharma ) where he neither ratifies nor rejects nor returns the bill, but simply keeps the bill pending for an indefinite period\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As the time limit within which the President has to take the decision with respect to a bill presented to him for assent, has not been mentioned in the constitution, in effect the inaction of the President stops the bill from becoming an act\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Under article 78 the President enjoys the right to seek information from the PM regarding the administration of the affairs of the union\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Under the established convention, the President has the right to warn or encourage the Council of Minister (CoM) in the exercise of its power..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Under Article 85, the President can summon each House of Parliament to meet at such time and place as he thinks fit, to ensure that six months shall not intervene between its last sitting in one session and the date appointed for its sitting in the next session\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When no political party or coalition of parties enjoy the majority in Lok Sabha, then the President has discretion in inviting the leader of that party or coalition of parties who in his opinion is able to form a stable government\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GOVERNOR OF A STATE HAS SUCH SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS TOO.. TO SUSTAIN DHARMA. I WILL SPEAK LATER\u2026.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It is for the president to decide if he should dissolve Loksabha or not when CoM loses the majority in Lok Sabha\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Note: The President can dissolve Lok Sabha only on the advice of CoM but the advice is binding only if the government is a majority government\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It is for the president to decide if he should dissolve CoM or not when CoM loses the majority in Lok Sabha\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A caretaker government does not enjoy the confidence of Lok Sabha and hence it is not expected to take major decisions but only to make the day-to-day administrative decisions. It is for the President to decided the day-to-day decisions\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 74 of Indian Constitution says that---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(1) There shall be a Council of Ministers with the Prime Minister at the head to aid and advise the President who shall, in the exercise of his functions, act in accordance with such advice:--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(2)&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Provided that the President may require the Council of Ministers to reconsider such advice, either generally or otherwise, and the President shall act in accordance with the advice tendered after such reconsideration\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(2) The question whether any, and if so what, advice was tendered by Ministers to the President shall not be inquired into in any court.\u201d..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President of India is vested with Legislative, Executive and Judicial powers. But as the advice given by CoM is binding on Indian President, in reality, most of these powers rest with the COM; but decisions are taken in the name of President of India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2---</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_191BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_191b+seedLwhD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_189T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_19.html?showComment=1529545680233#c7387297428168064209\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 7:18 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_189MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">See some examples\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President\u2019s rule \u2013 He can rule the whole nation or individual states at times of emergency. The President can declare State, National and Financial Emergencies. Punjab, Jharkhand, Jammu and Kashmir and many other states have been under President\u2019s Rule\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Commander-in-Chief of Indian Armed forces \u2013 The President is the Commander-in-Chief of the Indian Armed Forces\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President appoints our State governors, Supreme Court and High Court Judges, and the Chief Justice\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President can summon and dissolve parliament sessions..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A \u2018bill\u2019 passed in the parliament can become an \u2018act\u2019 only after the President\u2019s approval\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President of India has the power to reduce the degree of punishment or pardon criminals \u2013 even death sentences can be absolved on appeal\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President is the head of Indian State while Prime Minister is the head of Indian Government\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Ambassadors and High Commissioners representing our country are appointed by the President\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President appoints the Chief Election Commissioner and other Election Commissioners\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President delivers the opening address for the first session of the parliament, as well as the first session of a newly elected government, defining the policies of the government\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IAS or IPS officers (All India Services) by President of India, based on the advice of UPSC\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President of India almost always acts on the aid and advice of the Council of Ministers except under the following circumstances where he acts on his discretion:---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In appointing the Prime Minister from among the contenders when no single party attains majority after elections to the Lok Sabha\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Council of Ministers is voted out and after resigning advises the President to dissolve, the Lok Sabha and hold fresh elections (or resigns and advises so without being voted out). The President is expected to exercise his discretion in such circumstances as much of the Lok Sabha's life may still be intact and it is worthwhile to explore the possibility of forming an alternative Government\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">While exercising a pocket veto\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Disqualifying members of the legislature when the Council's advice is not taken\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Can return the advice of the Council of Ministers once for its reconsideration\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Can return the Bill passed by the Parliament once for its reconsideration\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are certain Bills which can be introduced in the Parliament only on the recommendation of the President such as---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Bill to alter the boundaries of the States or to change the names of the States (Article 3),..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Money Bill as detailed in Article 11.0\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Financial Bill (category one) involving Article 110 but containing other provisions as well\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Financial Bill (category two) which is an Ordinary Bill but seeking to draw from the Consolidated Fund of India can be taken up for \u2018consideration\u2019 that is \u2018reading two\u2019 in the process of passage of a Bill\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Legislation involving Article 31 A\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Any legislation involving items of taxation in which the States are interested or one that seeks to redefine agricultural income etc\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Traditionally, the structure of government has been divided into three components:---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(1) the legislature to make laws;..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(2) the executive to implement laws and..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(3) the judiciary to INTERPRET laws and administer justice. ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">COLLEGIUM JUDGES CANNOT MAKE THEIR OWN LAWS..</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">THEY CANNOT USE PAST JUDGEMENTS ( ZILCH CONTEXT / JUSTICE IS BLIND SYSTEM ) AS A LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION, AS WHAT IS HAPPENING NOW-- POWERED BY THE PATHETIC SOLIS / FALIS/ AND SALVES )</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">################</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RECENTLY THE KARNATAKA GOVERNORs RULING WAS OVER RULED BY THE JUDGES ( TWO WEEKS GIVEN TO BJP TO PROVE MAJORITY )--JUDGES DO NOT HAVE SUCH POWERS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LETTER OF SUPPORT WITH SIGNATURES MEAN NOTHING...... COLLEGIUM LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES ARE NOBODY TO DEMAND THIS WHEN THE GOVERNOR HAS USED HIS DISCRETION AND HIS VESTED POWERS....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JUDGES HAVE POWERS ONLY TO INTERPRET THE CONSTITUTION ....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AGAIN JUDGES CANNOT OVER RULE THE KARNATAKA GOVERNOR ONCE HE HAS EXERCISED HIS DISCRETION AS PER THE CONSTITUTION\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 3--</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_189MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
