text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 7:19 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_190MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 2---</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOVERNOR HAS THE DISCRETION NOT TO ALLOW UNHOLY AND OPPORTUNISTIC POST POLL ALLIANCES TO HIJACK VOTERS FREEWILL AND CHOICE... \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF ANY COLLEGIUM JUDGE PANEL OVER RULES THE GOVERNOR THEY CAN BE DISMISSED\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOVERNOR HAS BEEN AFFORDED VAST DISCRETION POWERS TO PRESERVE DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ) -- HE NEED NOT DO ANY NUMBER CRUNCHING LIKE A NON-CONSCIOUS COMPUTER\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JDS VOTER / MLAs NOW HAVE TO BE SUBSERVIENT TO THE ITALIANS -- THEY DID NOT VOTE FOR THIS TO HAPPEN\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">SUBJECTIVE MUST HOLD THE \"VETO POWER\"..</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">VETO POWER CAN NEVER BE GIVEN TO THE OBJECTIVE\u2026.</span></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DESH BHAKTI AND DHARMA IS A SUBJECTIVE FEELING.. IT CAN CAUSE BLOOD TO BOIL AND CAUSE YOU TO SACRIFICE YOUR LIFE....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ABOVE THE OBJECTIVE CONSTITUTION LIES , THE SUBJECTIVE FEELINGS TO OUR WATAN AND DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE )\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\">To sustain DHARMA you cannot apply number crunching or objective judgment--you have to apply SUBJECTIVE judgments\u2026This is why a Governor or President is an experienced and level headed man .</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE FATHER STAR KID DUO OF DEVE GOUDA AND HD KUMARASWAMY HIJACKED DEMOCRACY AND CRUSHED THE WILL OF THE KARNATAKA PEOPLE TO GRAB POWER..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GOVERNOR WANTED THE JDS MLAs TO BE<b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;GIVEN ENOUGH TIME TO GO BACK TO THEIR CONSTITUENCIES AND ASK THE PEOPLE&nbsp;</span></b>WHO VOTED THEM TO POWER -- WHAT MUST BE DONE TO PRESERVE DHARMA? -- WHAT IS THE RIGHT CONSIENCE BASED DECISION ?...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN THERE IS AN UNHOLY POST POLL ALLIANCE SO THAT A FATHER SON DUO GRABS POWER --THE PEOPLE MUST BE ALLOWED TO TELL THEIR MLA FOR WHOM THEY VOTED, WHAT THEY WANT\u2026&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">DESH DROHI BENAMI MEDIA TRIED TO OBFUSCATE .. THAT THE GOVERNOR GAVE&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>15 DAYS FOR HORSE TRADING</b></span>&nbsp;..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN ALL MLAs ARE IN RESORTS WITH THEIR MOBILE PHONES SNATCHED AWAY BY PARTY GO0NDAS, WHERE IS THE QUESTION OF HORSE TRADING ? ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN OPPORTUNISTIC POST POLL ALLIANCE ARE ALLOWED LIKE WHAT HAPPENED AT KARNATAKA THE FREE WILL AND CHOICE OF THE PEOPLE IS SNUFFED.. THIS IS NOT DEMOCRACY...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AGAIN, JUDGES CANNOT OVER RULE THE KARNATAKA GOVERNOR ONCE HE HAS EXERCISED HIS DISCRETION AS PER THE CONSTITUTION\u2026GOVERNOR HAS THE DISCRETION NOT TO ALLOW UNHOLY AND OPPORTUNISTIC POST POLL ALLIANCES TO HIJACK VOTERS FREEWILL AND CHOICE...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Governor of a State enjoys discretionary powers and as such the office of the Governor depends upon the personality and ability of the person who occupies it. .. The governor is NOT a rubber stamp. ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAJORITY CAN ONLY BE PROVED BY A FLOOR TEST INSIDE THE HOUSE-- BY A SECRET BALLOT TO FOSTER CONSCIENCE VOTE .....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO PARTY WHIP AND VOICE VOTE OR RAISE OF HANDS CAN BE ALLOWED .. ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HERDING OF MLAs IN RESORTS IS DONE BY PARTY GOONDAS , ARMTWISTING THE FRIGHTENED MLAs AGAINST THEIR WISHES , SOMETIMES KIDNAPPING THEIR CHILDREN ( DONE BY MANNARGUDI MAFIA ) ...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Miners TOILED round the clock, day and night, in six-hour shifts.<br />\n<br />\nThe Nazis used batteries produced there to power their U-boats. font-size: large;\">A DEATH SPIRAL ccurs when insurers hike premiums to cover disproportionately high costs.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Those hikes drive away more healthy customers, leaving the insurers with even less revenue and sicker and costlier remaining customers --who are bedded down for the long haul health management till death.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DEEP STATE President JEW Obama began stealing money from Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to pay these insurance companies who threatened to quit quoting loss of profits ( they want HUGE profits )-- the quintessential DEATH SPIRAL..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">the US House of Representatives sued Obama in Federal Court\u2014and where US Federal Judge Rosemary Collyer, of the Federal District Court for the District of Columbia, ruled that the Obama regime was, indeed, violating the US Constitution in paying CSR\u2019s ( cost sharing reductions ) to insurance companies.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE were cock sure that Hilary Clinton would be the next POTUS after Obama.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">So Obama was instructed to disregard the US Federal Court and continue paying these CSR\u2019s in order to save Obamacare..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But as soon as President Trump assumed office he stated -- BALLS -- he would not pay them, and sending the insurance companies into total panic\u2014 in as muc as US insurance giant Aetna declared that they are abandoning Obamacareafter suffering HUGE loses between 2014-2017 ...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Aetna Inc. is a American managed health care company, which sells traditional and consumer directed health care insurance plans and related services, such as medical, pharmaceutical, dental, behavioral health, long-term care, and disability plans. Aetna is a member of the Fortune 500.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Death spiral is a condition of the insurance market in which costs rapidly increase as a result of changes in the covered population. It is the result of adverse selection in insurance policies in which lower risk policy holders choose to change policies or be uninsured.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The \u201cdeath spiral\u201d occurs when not enough healthy people sign up for health insurance, causing rates to skyrocket so that, eventually, no one can afford insurance. The beginning of the death spiral occurred with Obamacare</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Insurance is based on the idea that premiums paid by healthy people subsidize the needs of the unhealthy.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Many people didn\u2019t sign up for insurance through Obamacare because it was too expensive. In a Texas Medical Center-Nielsen survey 91 percent of the uninsured who visited an Obamacare marketplace exchange said they couldn\u2019t afford the coverage.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN MY ELDER SONs COMPANY THEY PAY A THOUSAND USD PER MOTH FOR HIS HEALTH CARE.. ALL OTHER TOP TIER US IT COMPANIES ASK THEIR EMPLOYEES TO PAY THEIR OWN HEALTH INSURANCE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the pre-Obamacare days, insurance companies could exclude coverage for treatment of pre-existing conditions like cancer. Doing so reduced costs to insurers. But that exclusion also encouraged healthy people to buy insurance \u201cjust in case\u201d they had an accident or became chronically ill in the future. The Senate bill does not permit the pre-existing condition exclusion either, eliminating an incentive for healthy people to buy insurance.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_31BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1529594139354#c8330664425806225390\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 8:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_30MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe Senate bill removed the Obamacare \u201cindividual mandate\u201d that penalizes individuals who don\u2019t sign up for insurance. It removed Obamacare requirements that large employers offer insurance to employees. And it removes the provision in the House Obamacare repeal bill that requires individuals to maintain health insurance for a period of time in order to renew it at favorable rates.<br />\n<br />\nThe tweak to the Senate bill was designed to make people think twice about going without insurance. Under the bill, if someone who is uninsured for more than two months tries to purchase insurance, the insurer is required to impose a six-month waiting period before coverage kicks in.<br />\n<br />\nAll of these factors l lead to the death spiral. After all, why would anyone buy expensive insurance now when they can wait to purchase it until they\u2019re sick?<br />\n<br />\nThe original Senate bill, required insurance companies to offer coverage to everyone, including people with pre-existing medical conditions. But there was no requirement that individuals purchase insurance.<br />\n<br />\nCritics said that created a perverse incentive for healthy people to go without insurance, only buying coverage after they got sick. Without enough healthy customers making regular premium payments, insurance companies would be forced to raise prices, driving more customers away \u2014 a situation described as a \"death spiral.\"<br />\n<br />\nThe revised bill attempts to solve that problem by imposing a penalty on those who don't maintain continuous insurance coverage: People who let their coverage lapse for at least 63 days in one year would be locked out of the insurance market for six months the following year.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">DONT EVER THINK THAT JEW HEALTH INSURERS LOVE INDIANS -- AND THEY ARE THERE TO CARE FOR YOU AND REDUCE YOUR SUFFERING<br /><br />THEY EXIST TO BLEED YOU AND MAKE NICE MONEY .. AND MODI LOVES JEWS..</span></b><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayi<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_31b+seedSGLD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_31b+seedSGLD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Department of Defence<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Grievance Description<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Namaskar Kindly acknowledge the below comment taken from Captain Ajit Vadakayils blog https://barandbench.com/passive-euthanasia-judgment-explained/&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\">THE CONDITION FOR JEWISH HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANIES TO COME TO INDIA IS EUTHANASIA --AS THIS IS PARAMOUNT FOR THEM TO MAKE PROFITS...</span></b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">.. MODIs HEALTH CARE IS LIKE OBAMA HEALTH CARE-- SOLE INTENTION IS TO DISH OUT MASSIVE PROFITS TO KOSHER HEALTH COMPANIES ... WHO ARE ALSO POLITICAL DONORS..&nbsp;</span><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">KOSHER HEALTH COMPANIES BRIBE POLITICIANS AND DOCTORS IN ALL WESTERN NATIONS THEY THRIVE .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED MODI KNOWS ABOUT THIS..&nbsp; &nbsp;PEOPLE WHO TAKE GOOD CARE OF THEIR HEALTH ARE FORCED TO PAY FOR DRUG ADDICTS, SEXUAL DEVIANTS AND PROCESSED FOOD CONSUMERS WHO ABUSE THEIR HEALTH..... EUTHANASIA HAS TO BE DECIDED BY THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS... NOT SOME COLLEGIUM JUDGES ... Laws against euthanasia and assisted suicide are in place to prevent abuse and to protect people from unscrupulous doctors and others ( GRAB PROPERTY )... Legalizing euthanasia would send a clear message: it is better to be dead than sick or disabled... The patient is depressed and believes that his situation is worse than it really is.( OR MADE TO FEEL BY SELFISH RELATIVES )... Faced with a doctor who both heals and kills, the patient lives with an uncertainty that adds to vulnerability... Patients who are ill or dependent often feel worthless and a burden to their family and loved ones. .. With legalized assisted suicide, the rate of non-assisted suicide WILL increase... Every patient has the right to refuse treatment or to request that ongoing treatment be stopped... Life in society is based on relationships of mutual trust among all citizens. Everyone must be sure that nobody will kill him... . We are already witnessing worrisome abuse in jurisdictions where euthanasia or assisted suicide is legal... WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW HEALTH INSURANCE TO DECIDE WHO HAS THE RIGHT TO LIVE... RIGHT TO LIVE ALSO INCLUDES RIGHT TO DIE .. TEE HEEEEEEE .. WHERE IS THE FUCKIN' INTELLIGENCE .. RIGHT TO HEAL ALSO INCLUDES RIGHT TO KILL .. The right to life does not create a right to choose death rather than life.It meant there was no right to die at the hands of a third person or with the assistance of a public authority.. The right to life is a moral principle based on the belief that a human being has the right to live and, in particular, should not be killed by ANOTHER human being. .. International law only allows law enforcement officers to deliberately take life (shooting to kill) where absolutely necessary to defend themselves and others against an imminent threat to life. .. The entitlement of a person to make the decision to end their own life through euthanasia is RIGHT TO CHOOSE. Passive euthanasia is a condition where there is withdrawal of medical treatment with the deliberate intention to hasten the death of a terminally-ill patient.. WHEN A MAN IS SICK , AND IS IN PAIN -- HIS MIND IS VULNERABLE.. GREEDY CHILDEN WILL KILL HIM OFF TO GRAB PROPERT.. Capt ajit vadakayil .. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1529600175788#c5867628200482298819\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 10:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_46MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GM MOSQUITOES WAS SUPPOSED TO BE RELEASED IN INDIA BY MODI...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">#############</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">September 27, 2017 at 8:08 AM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/drug-runners-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE DO NOT WANT GM TRANSGENIC MOSQUITOES IN INDIA .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">GOD MADE MOSQUITOES FOR A REASON.&nbsp;</b></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"></b></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><b>WHEN YOU STAY IN SOME NECK OF THE WOODS THE MOSQUITOES THERE BITE YOU. THIS IS LIKE A IMMUNITY VACCINATION PROTECTING YOUR FROM ALLERGIES OF THAT AREA.</b></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n</b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The REAL mission of GM mosquitoes is to depopulate humans-- the GM mosquito which carried the ZICA virus is one of them.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Shredding of the paternal X-chromosome prevents it from being transmitted to the next generation resulting in fully fertile mosquito strains that produce &gt;95 % male offspring.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Shredding the X chromosome of the male will make all of its offspring males.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">That is because female mosquitoes (like female humans) have two X chromosomes, one from the male parent and the other from the female parent, so without the contribution of the X chromosome from the male parent, only male offspring will result.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THERE ARE 3500 STRAINS OF MOSQUITOES IN INDIA. THESE MOSQUITOES ARE SELECTIVE WHILE BREEDING.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">30 lakh genetically engineered adult male mosquitoes would need to be released per week to suppress a wild population of only 20,000 mosquitoes-- impractical on any scale , even if tried by a MAD MAN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Mosquitoes themselves feed on decaying leaves, organic debris, and microbes\u2026 They serve as pollinators as well. Read this line twice.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Around 3,500 known species of mosquitoes occupy every continent and every conceivable habitat. Yet, only around 200 of these species will annoy humans and even fewer will bite. It is part of God\u2019s good design.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Male mosquitoes never bite, and the females need the protein in blood only to produce eggs, so the normal food of adult mosquitoes is actually nectar from plants. They are pollinators.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They fly from flower to flower to feed, and along the way, they carry pollen from one blossom to the other. Mosquitoes also act as pollinators for grasses and flowering plants.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mosquitoes are part of god\u2019s ecosystem. They serve as food for other habitats, spiders, salamanders, frogs, reptiles, and other insects consume mosquitoes.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The larvae themselves eat microscopic organic matter in the water, helping to recycle it .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the absence of their larvae, hundreds of species of fish would have to change their diet to survive. Traits such as feeding behaviour are deeply imprinted, genetically, in fish.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Bongs are still wondering how their precious HILSA fish , all disappeared. ( due to mindless dams and barrages stopping spawning voyages ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Female mosquitoes feed on blood of mammals, birds, reptiles , frogs, etc though most mosquitoes have a preference for a few particular sources.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Some live near humans and bite them, while others choose livestock or animals first. After the female mates, has her first meal of blood and lays her eggs, she begins looking for another drink of blood, to develop another batch of eggs without mating again. If she survives, she may do this several times in one summer.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Few people realize that mosquitoes rely on sugar as their main source of energy. Both male and female mosquitoes feed on plant nectar, fruit juices and liquids that ooze from plants. The sugar is burned as fuel for flight and is replenished on a daily basis. Blood is reserved for female egg production and is imbibed less frequently.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_46MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_46BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_46B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_47B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c239529659649729156\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_47M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1529600222402#c239529659649729156\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 10:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_47MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1\u2014<br />\n<br />\nDragonfly larvae, called nymphs, eat mosquito larvae, and adult dragonflies prey on adult mosquitoes. Releasing dragonflies every summer is a natural form of mosquito control.<br />\n<br />\nSome species, like the Aedes are daytime biters, while others, like Culex, start biting at dusk and continue a few hours into dark.<br />\n<br />\nMost mosquitoes can fly no more than about one to three miles, and often stay within several hundred feet of where they were hatched. The top speed for a mosquito is about 1.4 miles per hour.<br />\n<br />\nFemales can beat their wings up to 500 times per second, and the males pick out the higher frequency of those beats when seeking a mate.<br />\n<br />\nThe average mosquito lifespan is less than two months.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">HULLO -- MALE MOSQUITOES HAVE A LIFE SPAN OF ONLY LESS THAN TEN DAYS . HOW MANY BILLIONS OF SUCH GM MOSQUITOES ARE YOU GONNA RELEASE ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\nFemales can live about six to eight weeks, under ideal conditions. The females lay eggs about every three days during that time. Females of species that hibernate may live up to six months in cold weather<br />\n<br />\nAt temperatures less than 10 C , they shut down for the winter.<br />\n<br />\nThe adult females of some species find holes where they wait for warmer weather, while others lay their eggs in freezing water and die. The eggs keep until the temperatures rise, and they can hatch.<br />\n<br />\nMosquitoes spend their first 10 days in water. Water is necessary for the eggs to hatch into larvae, called wigglers. Wigglers feed on organic matter in stagnant water and breathe oxygen from the surface. They develop into pupae, which do not feed and are partially encased in cocoons. Over several days, the pupae change into adult mosquitoes.<br />\n<br />\nFemales will lay eggs up to three times before they die.<br />\n<br />\nA female mosquito need protein in blood to help her eggs develop. Once she's had her fill of blood, she'll rest a couple of days before laying her eggs.<br />\n<br />\nReleasing male GM Aedes aegypti mosquitoes into the wild with the hopes that they would mate and produce offspring that would die before adulthood -- and therefore prevent the spread of dengue -- is something we do NOT want in India.<br />\n<br />\nAs it is different strains are produced in western labs are released into third world nations.<br />\n<br />\nGM mosquitoes are genetically altered to carry a \u201cgenetic kill switch,\u201d such that when they mate with wild female mosquitoes, their offspring inherits the lethal gene and cannot survive.<br />\n<br />\nTo achieve this objective they inserted protein fragments from the herpes virus, E. coli bacteria, coral, and cabbage into the insects, dubbed as OX513A.<br />\n<br />\nZionist GM mosquito companies have states they only plan to release male mosquitoes, which don\u2019t bite.<br />\n<br />\nOh yeah ?<br />\n<br />\nHow will can they prevent release of females with <b><span style=\"color: red;\">dead on balls accuracy </span></b>?<br />\n<br />\nWhat happens if these females bite humans.<br />\n<br />\nThe human cell will be invaded.in reality, Sorting billions of insects according to sex is IMPOSSIBLE.<br />\n<br />\nThe transposon-borne transgenes in the transgenic mosquito can transfer horizontally to human cells. The piggyBac transposon can induce genome wide insertion mutations disrupting many gene functions.<br />\n<br />\nThese are the same Zionist Jews who made fun of our Gotra system which preserved our Indian Y chromosome.. Now these kosher CHOOTS want to teach us?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/gotra-system-khap-rules-y-chromosome.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/chikungunya-disease-created-in-lab-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_48b+seedUreD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_48b+seedUreD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/mEOjo0imqKE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/mEOjo0imqKE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8322675469260578948\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_59M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Dushyant Dave was right to criticise how Khehar dealt with this instead of an administrative inquiry.<br />\n<br />\nInstead of asking high court judge Karnan to blow the whistle on corrupt Judges CJI JS Khehar sent him to jail for 6 months- for CONTEMPT OF COURT..<br />\n<br />\nThis is the first time that a sitting high court judge has been sent to jail on charges of contempt. The seven-judge bench headed by Chief Justice of India J S Khehar also barred the media from publishing or reporting the orders passed by Karnan.<br />\n<br />\nThe other judges on the bench are Justices Dipak Misra, J Chelameswar, Ranjan Gogoi, M B Lokur, P C Ghose and Kurian Joseph.<br />\n<br />\nAppearing for the Registrar General of the Madras High Court, senior counsel K K Venugopal requested that Karnan be allowed to serve the sentence after he retires, as sending a sitting judge to jail would be a blot on judicial history. But the court said that \u201ccontempt is contempt. It has no colour. Whether you are a common man or a judge, it does not matter.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court\u2019s order came a day after Karnan \u201csentenced\u201d CJI Khehar and seven other Supreme Court judges \u2014 Justices Dipak Misra, J Chelameswar, Ranjan Gogoi, M B Lokur, P C Ghose, Kurian Joseph and R Banumathi \u2014 to five years rigorous imprisonment, after holding them guilty under the SC/ST Atrocities Act.<br />\n<br />\nWhile the first six judges are part of the seven-judge bench which initiated contempt proceedings against Karnan earlier this year, after he sought a probe against 20 \u201ccorrupt judges\u201d, Justice Banumathi was part of a two-judge bench, with CJI Khehar, which passed an order restraining him from performing judicial and administrative work.<br />\n<br />\nIn January 2017, Karnan went public with a list of 20 \u201ccorrupt\u201d sitting and former High Court and Supreme Court judges. max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1655772659830462541\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_175M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1529713383034#c1655772659830462541\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 23, 2018 at 5:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDONALD TRUMP<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nAND LISTEN GOOD</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">TO WEAKEN THE DEEP STATE --RE-INTRODUCE THE GLASS -STEAGALL ACT WHICH WAS REPEALED BY DEEP STATE PRESIDENT BILL CLINTON IN 1999.</span></div>\n<br />\nEighty-five years ago this weekend, on 16 June 1933, Franklin Delano Roosevelt signed the Banking Act of 1933, better known today as the Glass-Steagall Act.<br />\n<br />\nThe Glass-Steagall Act required a separation between depository banking and investment banking (and later, insurance companies).<br />\n<br />\nGlass-Steagall\u2019s key principle was to keep risky assets away from insured deposits<br />\n<br />\nThen the DEEP STATE at Wall Street saw opportunities to make lots of money by betting on stocks, bonds and derivatives (bets on bets) \u2014 and in 1999 persuaded Bill Clinton and a Republican Congress to repeal it.<br />\n<br />\nWhy didn't America simply reinstate Glass-Steagall after the last financial crisis? Because too much money was at stake. Wall Street was intent on keeping the door open to making bets with commercial deposits.<br />\n<br />\nWhy should banks ever be permitted to use people's bank deposits -- insured by the federal government -- to place risky bets on the banks' own behalf?<br />\n<br />\nA Glass-Steagall reintroduction would prevent banks and financial brokerages from covering bad debt investments with the collateral from their financial resources, thus endangering their depositer\u2019s investments.<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, the Ponzi Scheme known as Credit Swap Derivatives would not be able to leverage the credit rating of a bank, or the underwriting from a brokerage.<br />\n<br />\nThe credit default swap market is a $60 trillion-plus paper Ponzi-scheme. The Wall Street syndicate claiming to \"back\" this insurance have nothing more than a few billions of dollars of liquidity apiece.<br />\n<br />\nHere is how this particular Wall Street scam operates. First of all, the banksters pile on massive shorting with respect to the credit default swaps of a particular European debt-market. This drives the prices of credit default swaps sky-high.<br />\n<br />\nMeanwhile, the banksters' accomplices in the mainstream media then perform their best impersonation of Chicken Little: \"the sky is falling on Greece's economy.\" At this point the third partner of this illegitimate tag-team chimes in: the ratings agencies.<br />\n<br />\nBased on nothing more than changes in credit default swap prices and media rhetoric, the ratings agencies downgrade the debt of these Euro markets -- immediately driving interest rates higher.<br />\n<br />\nThis significantly raises the interest payments on these debtor economies, instantly making those economies less solvent. This is then followed by another shorting operation in the credit default swap market, more media rhetoric, and more bogus \"downgrades.\". And thus the perfect vicious-circle of crime is established.<br />\n<br />\nThrough the fraudulent manipulation of Europe's debt markets, Wall Street's economic terrorists have been able to drive Greek interest rates as much as 50 times higher than U.S. interest rates, despite the fact that the U.S. economy is more fundamentally insolvent than that of Greece.<br />\n<br />\nThe Glass\u2013Steagall legislation describes four provisions of the U.S.A Banking Act of 1933 separating commercial and investment banking n 1933, in the wake of the 1929 stock market crash and during a nationwide commercial bank failure and the Great Depression<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/great-american-depression-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nThe Glass-Steagall Act (GSA) separated investment and commercial banking activities. At the time, \"improper banking activity,\" or what was considered overzealous commercial bank involvement in stock market investment, was deemed the main culprit of the financial crash. According to that reasoning, commercial banks took on too much risk with depositors' money.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1529713444092#c2811206989467428599\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 23, 2018 at 5:54 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nCommercial banks were accused of being too speculative in the pre-Depression era, not only because they were investing their assets but also because they were buying new issues for resale to the public.<br />\n<br />\nThus, banks became greedy, taking on huge risks in the hope of even bigger rewards. Banking itself became sloppy and objectives became blurred. Unsound loans were issued to companies in which the bank had invested, and clients would be encouraged to invest in those same stocks.<br />\n<br />\nGlass-Steagall's key principle was to keep risky assets away from insured deposits<br />\n<br />\nIn 2015, the interest on the Credit Swap Derivatives was $505 trillion dollars based on an estimated debt of $1.5 quadrillion dollars.<br />\n<br />\nA credit default swap is a particular type of swap designed to transfer the credit exposure of fixed income products between two or more parties. In a credit default swap, the buyer of the swap makes payments to the swap\u2019s seller up until the maturity date of a contract.<br />\n<br />\nIn return, the seller agrees that, in the event that the debt issuer defaults or experiences another credit event, the seller will pay the buyer the security\u2019s premium as well as all interest payments that would have been paid between that time and the security\u2019s maturity date.<br />\n<br />\nA credit default swap is the most common form of credit derivative and may involve municipal bonds, emerging market bonds, mortgage-backed securities or corporate bonds.<br />\n<br />\nA credit default swap is also often referred to as a credit derivative contract.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Debt repudiation</b></span> is the only way that the American economy will survive ( 21.3 TRILLION USD EBT ) . This is the equivalent of Lincoln\u2019s Greenbacks plan following the Civil War. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TODAY EVEN POTHOLE JOURMALIST TALKS ABOUT\nROUND TRIPPING.. IT TOOK A BLOGGER TO EXPLAIN ROUND TRIPPING .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ndtv-round-tripped-rs-642-crore-via-shell-companies-in-2009-2010-tribunal/articleshow/59719501.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ndtv-round-tripped-rs-642-crore-via-shell-companies-in-2009-2010-tribunal/articleshow/59719501.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE KNOW THE SHELL COMPANIES OF YOUR LANGOT &nbsp;YAAR POLITICAL DONORS TOO !</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ENRON USED THEIR OWN\nAUDITORS TO COVER UP THEIR GIGANTIC FRAUD...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Enron's board members,\nregulators, analysts, auditors, and even politicians looked the other way while\nEnron committed its fraud\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Following the 2001\nscandal in which energy giant Enron was found to have reported $100bn in\nrevenue through institutional and systematic accounting fraud, Arthur\nAndersen's performance and alleged complicity as an auditor came under intense\nscrutiny. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On June 15, 2002,\nAndersen was convicted of obstruction of justice for shredding documents\nrelated to its audit of Enron, resulting in the Enron scandal. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mind you Arthur\nAnderson LLP had 28,000 employees in the US and 85,000 worldwide..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Deliberate FALSE\nauditing made sure that Enron appeared to be much more profitable than it\nactually was. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Naturally, its share price\nzoomed, allowing the managers to benefit from the capital gains that they\nreceived from their employee-stock options and performance-related bonuses. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Criminal auditors over\ninflated so much that it became extremely hard for Enron\u2019s managers to carry on\nwith this creative accounting, until at last it became impossible to keep up\nthe pretence. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ultimately the company\ncould not even be restructured and had to be liquidated. Thousands of Enron\nemployees lost not only their jobs, but also their savings and pensions, which\nwere tied up in company stock. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Remarkably, bribed\nKOSHER US judges found that Enrons criminal auditors could not be held legally\nresponsible for what was clearly criminal negligence and dereliction of duty\nover a prolonged period. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Instead, the only\ncharge that could be brought against it was obstruction of justice, for\nshredding documents relating to its audit of Enron... And even that was\noverturned by the Supreme Court in 2005, on grounds of flaws in the\ninstructions to the jury! ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However, because the\nU.S. Securities and Exchange Commission did not allow it to audit public\ncompanies, the company could not retain viable business and eventually\ncollapsed\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Enron CEO Rebecca Mark\ncame to India regularly in MINI SKIRT and flashed her hairy blonde&nbsp; pussy&nbsp;\nat India Maratha manoos politicians to soften them up and prevent them\nfrom driving a hard bargain.....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
