font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_26.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_26.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_22.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_22.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_24.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_24.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_12.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_12.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_50.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_50.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_27.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_27.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_28.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_28.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_29.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_29.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_33.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_33.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_30.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_30.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_31.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_31.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">February 17, 2018 at\n3:11 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diamond traders have a\nmodus operandi. They file false cases against select customers and agencies to\nsmother them mentally. They have help from judges/ lawyers. All of them operate\ndozens of SHELL companies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROUND TRIPPING in\ndiamonds (or repeated export and import of same polished diamonds) is wherein\ntraders undertake a series of exports and imports of the same goods for the\npurpose of receiving greater bank financing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypothetically, if a\nparcel made five round trips it means that for every $1 million worth of\npolished goods, the exporter got $5 million in financing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROUND TRIPPING is\nDELIBERATELY allowed for big corporate businesses ( who donate to the ruling\nparty ) which bring back their black money through bogus shell companies .\nThese funds are invested in the economy as FDI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Round-tripping ( phudia\nghumao ) of diamond consignments from one market to another is practised among\nthe diamond trading circle in Mumbai. The bogus trade enables a diamond trading\ncompany to artificially inflate balance sheets for raising loans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bank managers get\nbribes in foreign accounts or get paid in Bitocin for services rendered . This\nis why maximum Bitcoin acitivity happens in Surat\u2014the ADDA of crypto Jew\ndiamond traders<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a clear link\nbetween round-tripping and bank financing.This is NO big secret. When you\ndonate to both ruling and opposition parties you can get away with anything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROUND TRIPPING is a\nphenomenon by which Indian individuals and companies avoid tax by sending funds\nabroad and then bringing them back on to home soil via Mauritius-based\ncompanies. Much of the investment into India via Mauritius over the last 15\nyears is believed to have been by CORRUPT Indian residents\u2014all BIG FISH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Signed in 1983, the\nDouble Taxation Avoidance treaty between the two countries made Mauritius,\nwhich taxes capital gains at near-zero rates, an attractive \u201cpost box address\u201d\nfor foreign investors to route investments into India Indians who evaded taxes\nset up shell companies in Mauritius, concealing identities and channeling cash\nor stock market investments through \u201cround tripping\u201d and \u201cparticipatory notes\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Securities and\nExchange Board of India (Sebi) tightened the norms for participatory notes\n(P-notes) in order to check misuse of these instruments in round-tripping and\nmoney laundering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mauritius had become\nthe top source of FDI into the country only due to ROUND TRIPPING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mauritius had been the\nsource of more than 37% of all foreign direct investment inflows into India\nbetween 2000 and 2015.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Few months ago, India\nand Singapore signed a pact for amendment of the Double Taxation Avoidance\nAgreement (DTAA), in a bid to curb illegal hoarding of money and to prevent\nround-tripping of funds, misused for tax evasion. This was done for Mauritius\nand Cyprus earlier<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A special-purpose\nentity (SPE; or, in Europe and India, special-purpose vehicle/SPV, or, in some\ncases in each EU jurisdiction \u2013 FVC, financial vehicle corporation) is a legal\nentity (usually a limited company of some type or, sometimes, a limited partnership)\ncreated to fulfill narrow, specific or temporary objectives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SPEs are typically used\nby companies to isolate the firm from financial risk. They are also commonly\nused to hide debt (inflating profits), hide ownership, and obscure\nrelationships between different entities which are in fact related to each\nother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally a company will\ntransfer assets to the SPE for management or use the SPE to finance a large\nproject thereby achieving a narrow set of goals without putting the entire firm\nat risk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SPEs are also commonly\nused in complex financings to separate different layers of equity infusion.\nCommonly created and registered in tax havens, SPEs allow tax avoidance\nstrategies unavailable in the home district.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Round-tripping is one\nsuch strategy. In addition, they are commonly used to own a single asset and\nassociated permits and contract rights (such as an apartment building or a\npower plant), to allow for easier transfer of that asset.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">India\u2019s diamond export\nfigures are false and manipulative. An export of 40 billion USD worth of\npolished diamonds and the import of $30 billion worth of polished diamonds \u2013 is\nclassic example of round-tripping.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">India is a POLISHED\ndiamond exporter and there is no need for importing POLISHED diamonds. Sab mil\nbhaantke khate hein.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of nipping\nround tripping in the bud \u2013 the Indian govt just imposed a miniscule import\nduty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">How did the practice of\nround-tripping start? It all started as an unexpected CRYPTO JEW GUJARATI arm of\nthe diamond industry\u2019s request to the government to change the way it was\ntaxed. Instead of being taxed on profit, like most other industries, it sought\nto be taxed on turnover, like the diamond trade in Israel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The govt promptly\nscrapped three duties on POLISHED diamond imports<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Round-tripping became\nan economical practice since then, a completely new way to make money from\ndiamonds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The KAHAAANI was that\nthat our enterprising CRYPTO JEW Gujarati diamond processors who had mining\nlicenses in African countries where they mined, processed and wanted to bring\nback polished diamonds to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">See they love\nBharatmata so much\u2014these crypto Jew Gujarati desh bhakts ( SIC ) must be given\nZERO percent 0% duty right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The message from the\nIndian Govt was\u2014HAPPY KOSHER ROUND TRIPPING !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">POLITICAL DONNASSANN\nBHOOLNA MATH !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">India\u2019s gross polished\ndiamond export was at least 15 billion USD MORE than the value of diamonds sold\nby retailers worldwide .. The export figures is clearly inflated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where did the diamonds\ndisappear? Dubai. The UAE, India\u2019s top export destination, kept only 6.8 per\ncent of the BILLONS of polished diamonds it imported from India. Rest of the\nconsignment went back and forth between India and the UAE, four to five times\nbefore they went down the pipeline.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let\u2019s see the nexus\nbetween round-tripping and bank financing. If a parcel made four round trips\nfor the sake of financing, it meant that for every $1 million worth of goods,\nthe exporter got $5 million in financing. A good arrangement only as long as\nyou could pay it back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since this heavy\nfinancing is borrowed without matching collateral ( on pressure from\npoliticians ), the diamond-financing banks in India are jittery. The bank\nmanagers are convenient scapegoats<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DO YOU THINK CRYPTO\nJEW GUJARATI DIAMOND TRADERS HAVE OFFICES IN DUBAI\u2014IN DUBAI PEOPLE BUY\nPEARLS-NEVER DIAMONDS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DO YOU THINK DUBAI\nHAS SUCH A HUGE HAWALA MARKET ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dubai is a safe haven\nfor the Indian traders who indulged in \u2018round tripping\u2019. Dubai does not impose\nany tax on either import or export of diamonds. It merely acted as a \u2018trading\nground\u2019 as consumption of polished goods in Dubai was minimal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Black money is sent to\nDubai through hawala transaction (an illegal banking system). Here money is\ndeposited there in the bank account of a diamond dealer. A parcel of diamonds\nis then sold by that company, that\u2019s paid for with the hawala money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The parcel is then\nre-imported and traded several times. This is done to bring the black money\ninto the system. And once it is done, it is brought back into the country and\ndeployed in the markets in the form of overseas investments, sub-accounts or\nportfolio investments<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crypto Jew Gujarati\ndiamond company has branches all over the world, it doesn\u2019t really mean that\nthey are supplying diamonds in every country. It could just be a \u2018pit stop\u2019 for\na diamond parcel that travels from one branch office to another in different\ncountries ... at times to three or four branch offices in the guise of\n\u2018export\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, in each country the\nvalue of the polished goods is inflated to cover the borrowing rate in the\nprevious country. So, a single consignment of diamonds can generate five times\nits value in loans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 3--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exports and imports of\npolished showed unrealistic figures and at times, imports of polished goods\nwere even more than exports. This was a classic example of \u2018round tripping\u2019 for\na country like India, which is a processor and exporter of polished diamonds -\nall done to misuse bank finance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala round\ntripping happens with GOLD ! Everybdy knows this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT HAPPENED TO OUR\nTHINK TANKS\u2014OF I FORGOT\u2014THEY HAVE SHIT FOR BRAINS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DOES INDIA HAVE A\nLAWYER AS OUR FINANCE MINISTER?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DO WE NEED A KENYAN\nGUJARATI AS OUR RBI GOVERNOR?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRY PUTTING ABOVE\nCOMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF INDIAN MINISTERS WHO PROTECT PM MODI MORE THAN THEY\nPROTECT BHARATMATA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY WILL SPAM YOU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS THE SORRY STATE\nOF INDIA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1529738982998#c1337328885053126272\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 23, 2018 at 12:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_198MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPANJA SAHIB GURDWARA IN PAKISTAN TEEMS WITH HANDSOME ISI AGENTS WEARING TURBAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHEY STAND BEHIND YOUNG UNESCORTED SIKH WOMEN ( TO SEXUALLY AROUSE THEM BY GROPING ) AND USE THEM FOR THEIR ULTERIOR MOTIVED AGENDA.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">DURING FESTIVAL DAYS ( BAISAKHI ) KHALISTANIS COME TO THIS GURUDWARA FROM CANADA / UK TO RADICALIZE SIKHS FROM INDIA.. THEY HAVE PUT POSTERS FOR 2020 SIKH REFERENDUM.. THIS IS JUST A ISI PLOT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nYOU CAN SEE THE PICTURES OF THE GURUDWARA IN THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_17.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />https://www.firstpost.com/india/sikh-woman-on-pilgrimage-to-pakistan-embraces-islam-marries-lahore-based-man-say-reports-4439335.html</span><br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />WARN SIKH PILGRIM WOMEN NOT TO FALL PREY TO HANDSOME ISI AGENTS IN SIKH GARB..THEY HAVE INFORMATION OF SIKH WIDOWS OR LONELY ARMY WIVES WHO ARE EASY PREY ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe Lashkar-e-Tayiba and the Babbar Khalsa International had set up a common office outside Nankana Sahib, a small town in sub divisional head quarter of Shekhupura in west Punjab in Pakistan.---Sikh Muslim Itehad Federation<br />\n<br />\nISI created the Pakistan Sikh Gurudwara Prabandhak Committee. This panel was headed by Lieutenant General Javed of the ISI. The primary role of this committee was to invite Sikh youth from Punjab and then rope them in for their operations.<br />\n<br />\nThe World Muslim Sikh Federation had been formed and it is funded by drug money.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">EVEN TODAY AJIT DOVAL DOES NOT KNOW HOW AAP WON 4 LOK SABHA SEATS IN PUNJAB..</span><br />\n<br />\nISI set up the International Sikh Muslim Friendship Organisation had its offices in Germany, Italy and the United Kingdom. According to dossiers, these organisations conducted several meetings with youths, trying to convey to them that their lives would be better only if Kashmir an Punjab were separated from India.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WE ASK MODI -WARN JUSTIN TRUDEAU-- NOT TO SPONSOR KHALISTANIS.. HIS DEFENCE MINISTERs FATHER WAS A HARDCORE KHALISTANI..</span></div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF<br />\n<br />\nCM CAPT AMARINDER SINGH<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nDGP OF PUNJAB<br />\nMEA<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.sacw.net/DC/CommunalismCollection/ArticlesArchive/anhad21032005.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.sacw.net/DC/CommunalismCollection/ArticlesArchive/anhad21032005.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">EXTRACTS :&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Text of citizens\nstatement re the Indian Prime minister's comments in the Rajya Sabha following\nrefusal of US Visa to Narendra Modi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We express our shock\nand anger at the stand taken by the Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh in the\nRajya Sabha on the issue of refusal of visa to Mr. Narendra Modi by the USA. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Mr. Modi's policies of\nhatred should not be legitimised even by association. Mr. Modi is no ordinary\nelected leader. He has become infamous for his active abetment in the most\nbrutal massacre since India became free, of a segment of the citizens of his\nstate. </span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">His notoriety has\ndeepened in the past 3 years because he remains completely unrepentant for\nthese crimes, including the mass slaughter and rape of hundreds of innocent\nwomen and children, and instead has openly fought elections from a platform of\nhate. </span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">He has deliberately\nsubverted the process of justice, that have attracted unprecedented structure\nfrom the Supreme Court of India.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>We commend the untiring\nefforts of NRIs and human rights activists in the US and in India who mobilized\npublic opinion and pressurized the US administration which led to the <span style=\"color: red;\">denial of\nModi's visa.</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is nothing more\ninsulting to the Indian nation than the pogroms that took place in Gujarat, and\nthe fact that their main architect, Sh Narendra Modi, still continues to enjoy\nthe powers and privileges of the Chief Minister in that state, while the Prime\nMinister of the country rushes to his defence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The statement by Dr.\nManmohan Singh adds insult to the injury suffered by the Genocide victims of\nGujarat, and is an affront to those NRIs and human rights activists in the US\nwhose unflagging pressure on the US administration resulted in the denial of\nMr. Modi's visa. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We, as people who are\ncommitted to secularism and human rights in India, feel betrayed and would like\nto take this opportunity to express our sense of despair that the political\nformation which is in power at the centre lacks any sense of moral\nresponsibility and moral courage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On behalf of the dead\nand living victims of Gujarat genocide and on behalf of the sections of civil\nsociety which have worked for the defeat of the communal forces we demand an\napology from Dr. Manmohan Singh for having humiliated the wronged citizens of\nIndia by issuing a highly insensitive and irresponsible statement defending Mr.\nNarendra Modi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">March 21, 2005<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Released by<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Namaskar Kindly acknowledge the below comment taken from Captain Ajit Vadakayils blog https://barandbench.com/passive-euthanasia-judgment-explained/&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\">THE CONDITION FOR JEWISH HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANIES TO COME TO INDIA IS EUTHANASIA --AS THIS IS PARAMOUNT FOR THEM TO MAKE PROFITS...</span></b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">.. MODIs HEALTH CARE IS LIKE OBAMA HEALTH CARE-- SOLE INTENTION IS TO DISH OUT MASSIVE PROFITS TO KOSHER HEALTH COMPANIES ... WHO ARE ALSO POLITICAL DONORS..&nbsp;</span><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">KOSHER HEALTH COMPANIES BRIBE POLITICIANS AND DOCTORS IN ALL WESTERN NATIONS THEY THRIVE .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED MODI KNOWS ABOUT THIS..&nbsp; &nbsp;PEOPLE WHO TAKE GOOD CARE OF THEIR HEALTH ARE FORCED TO PAY FOR DRUG ADDICTS, SEXUAL DEVIANTS AND PROCESSED FOOD CONSUMERS WHO ABUSE THEIR HEALTH..... EUTHANASIA HAS TO BE DECIDED BY THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS... NOT SOME COLLEGIUM JUDGES ... Laws against euthanasia and assisted suicide are in place to prevent abuse and to protect people from unscrupulous doctors and others ( GRAB PROPERTY )... Legalizing euthanasia would send a clear message: it is better to be dead than sick or disabled... The patient is depressed and believes that his situation is worse than it really is.( OR MADE TO FEEL BY SELFISH RELATIVES )... Faced with a doctor who both heals and kills, the patient lives with an uncertainty that adds to vulnerability... Patients who are ill or dependent often feel worthless and a burden to their family and loved ones. .. With legalized assisted suicide, the rate of non-assisted suicide WILL increase... Every patient has the right to refuse treatment or to request that ongoing treatment be stopped... Life in society is based on relationships of mutual trust among all citizens. Everyone must be sure that nobody will kill him... . We are already witnessing worrisome abuse in jurisdictions where euthanasia or assisted suicide is legal... WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW HEALTH INSURANCE TO DECIDE WHO HAS THE RIGHT TO LIVE... RIGHT TO LIVE ALSO INCLUDES RIGHT TO DIE .. TEE HEEEEEEE .. WHERE IS THE FUCKIN' INTELLIGENCE .. RIGHT TO HEAL ALSO INCLUDES RIGHT TO KILL .. The right to life does not create a right to choose death rather than life.It meant there was no right to die at the hands of a third person or with the assistance of a public authority.. The right to life is a moral principle based on the belief that a human being has the right to live and, in particular, should not be killed by ANOTHER human being. .. International law only allows law enforcement officers to deliberately take life (shooting to kill) where absolutely necessary to defend themselves and others against an imminent threat to life. .. The entitlement of a person to make the decision to end their own life through euthanasia is RIGHT TO CHOOSE. Passive euthanasia is a condition where there is withdrawal of medical treatment with the deliberate intention to hasten the death of a terminally-ill patient.. WHEN A MAN IS SICK , AND IS IN PAIN -- HIS MIND IS VULNERABLE.. GREEDY CHILDEN WILL KILL HIM OFF TO GRAB PROPERT.. Capt ajit vadakayil .. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe amount machines are able to extract from the picked cotton has diminished. . .<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In other words, Bt cotton produces both less cotton lint, and lint of an inferior quality. . .</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\nCotton fiber quality is defined by the physical properties that relate to its spin ability into yarn and contribute to textile performance and quality. . .<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The most important of these properties are those associated with the length, strength and fineness (micronaire) of the fiber. One of the most important aspects of cotton fiber quality is fiber or staple length. </span>&nbsp;.&nbsp;</div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Fiber length is the normal length of a typical portion of the fibers of a cotton sample. </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Longer fibers</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> can be processed at greater efficiencies and produce finer and stronger yarns by allowing fibers to twist around each other more times, while shorter fiber require increased twisting during spinning, causing low-strength and poor-quality yarns. . .</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nFiber fineness is another important component of fiber quality because of its direct impact on processing performance and the quality of end product. . .<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">Fiber strength is important because the inherent breaking strength of individual cotton fiber is considered to be the most important factor in determining the strength of the yarn spun from those fibers. . .&nbsp;</b></div>\n<br />\nJEW DARLING APCO MODI AND HIS PMO WILL SAY ALL ABOVE IS FICTION. . .<br />\n<br />\nThey have just focused on a single single trait \u2013 pest resistance ( SIC )\u2013 compromising on cotton quality. ..<br />\n<br />\nMy hometown Calicut produced the best cotton fabric ( CALICO ) on this planet\u2014today with BT Cotton all this is history. ..<br />\n<br />\nFiber strength is an important parameter in determining yarn spinning value. . .<br />\n<br />\nJEW DARLING MODI will never have the commonsense to understand this \u2013 WHEN YOU RAISE QUANTTY , QUALITY REDUCES ---<br />\n<br />\nHigh fiber strength is impossible to obtain without sacrificing yield. . .<br />\n<br />\nPATHETIC !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_199b+seedDQD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_199b+seedDQD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_199b+seedDQD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; HARVARD CLASSMATE OF THEIF JEW MARK ZUKERBERG WHO FOUNDED FACEBOOK.<br />\n<br />\nTHE IDEA OF FACEBOOK SPROUTED FROM DIVYA NARENDRAs BRAIN<br />\n<br />\nDivya Narenda is portrayed by Max Minghella in The Social Network (2010), a film directed by David Fincher about the founding of Facebook<br />\n<br />\nIn the movie the bastards show him as a WHITE MAN<br />\n<br />\nIn the movie they show the Winklevoss twins who were part of the Divya Narendra team.<br />\n<br />\nIn November 2003, Divya Narendra and the Winklevoss twins approached Mark Zuckerberg about writing code for the idea of Facebook.<br />\n<br />\nDivya Narendra emailed Zuckerberg saying, \u201cWe\u2019re very deep into developing a site which we would like you to be a part of and ... which we know will make some waves on campus.\u201d Within a couple of days, Mark Zuckerberg was talking to the HarvardConnection team<br />\n<br />\nOn the evening of November 25, 2003, the Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses met with Zuckerberg in the dining hall of Harvard's Kirkland House, where they explained to an enthusiastic Zuckerberg, the HarvardConnection website, the plan to expand to other schools after launch, the confidential nature of the project<br />\n<br />\nDuring the meeting, Mark Zuckerberg allegedly entered into an ORAL contract ( NEVER TRUST A WHITE JEW WITH ORAL CONTRACTS ) with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses and became a WORKING partner in HarvardConnection.<br />\n<br />\nHe was given the private server location and password for the unfinished HarvardConnection website and code, with the understanding that he would finish the programming necessary for launch.<br />\n<br />\nMark Zuckerberg allegedly chose to be compensated in the form of sweat equity.( remember Shashi Tharoor and Sunanda Pushkar ? )<br />\n<br />\nOn December 17, 2003, JEW THIEF Mark Zuckerberg met with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses in his dorm room, allegedly confirming his interest and assuring them that the site was almost complete.<br />\n<br />\nOn the whiteboard in his room, Zuckerberg allegedly had scrawled multiple lines of code under the heading \u201cHarvard Connection.\u201d However, this would be the only time they saw any of his work.<br />\n<br />\nOn January 11, 2004, Mark Zuckerberg HIJACKED the ship and registered the domain name thefacebook.com.<br />\n<br />\nJEW THIEF Zuckerberg met again with the HarvardConnection team. However, he allegedly never mentioned registering the domain name thefacebook.com nor a competing social networking website, rather he reported progress on HarvardConnection, told them he would continue to work on it, and would email the group later in the week.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_77BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LIKE HOW MARK\nZUCKERBERG STOLE THE FACEBOOK IDEA FROM INDIAN GENIUS DIVYA NARENDRA AT HARVARD\nUNIVERISTY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HERE IS A SIMPLE CASE\nBELOW-- WHEN A GENIUS IIT INDIAN STUDENT MAINAK SARKAR KILLED HIS JEW PROFESSOR\nWILLIAM KLUG FOR STEALING HIS INTELLECTUAL RIGHTS AND PASSING IT ON TO ANOTHER\nJEW STUDENT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/IIT-Kharagpur-alumnus-kills-US-professor-at-UCLA-over-academic-spat/articleshow/52559222.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/IIT-Kharagpur-alumnus-kills-US-professor-at-UCLA-over-academic-spat/articleshow/52559222.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOST INDIANS ARE\nPASSIVE --THEY SUCCUMB TO THREATS FROM JEW PROFESSORS --AND THEY KEEP QUIET\nHAPPY-- GLAD NOT BE TO DISMISSED FROM THE COLLEGE AND SEND BACK TO INDIA IN\nDISGRACE AS A THIEF OR DUFFER NO GOODER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHAT HAPPENED\nTO KERALA STUDENT ECG SUDARSHAN .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HIS WORK WAS GIVEN AWAY\nTO JEWS WHO WRANGLED NOBEL PRIZE -- ONE OF THEM A PAKISTANI CRYPTO JEW\nAHMEDDIYYA MUSLIM ADBUS SALAM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/dr-ecg-sudarshan-denied-nobel-prize-for.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/dr-ecg-sudarshan-denied-nobel-prize-for.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN PM MODI WENT TO\nISRAEL--STANDING AT THE END OF THE RECEPTION LINE WAS THE HEAD OF AHMEDDIYA\nSECT IN ISRAEL--PERSONALLY INTRODUCED TO MODI BY BENJAMIN NETANYAHU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I TOLD MY WIFE , WE\nWERE WATCHING LIVE -- THEY HAS TO BE AN AHMEDIYYA JEW PRETENDING TO BE A\nMUSLIM. SHE WAS VERY HAPPY WHEN I WAS VINDICATED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN THE CASE OF GENIUS\nDIVYA NARENDRA , HIS SLEEING PARTNERS THE VINKLEVOSS TWINS HAD THE WHEREWITHAL\nTO SUE JEW MARK ZUCKERBERG --AND THEY CATAPULTED THEMSELVES TO FAME --USING A\nHOLLYWOOD MOVIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT IS A SLEEPING\nPARTNER ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT CORNELL ONCE A\nKOREAN UNDERGRADUATE BOY TEAMED UP WITH MY ELDER SON ( MASTERS ) FOR A PROJECT\nIN COMPUTER SCIENCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY DECIDED ON WHAT\nTHEY WOULD DO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE KOREAN BOY THEN\nWROTE THE ENTIRE CODE \"LIKE HOW HE WOULD WRITE A LETTER TO HIS\nFRIEND\"-- THIS WAS WHAT MY SON TOLD ME AND MY WIFE ON SKYPE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT FREQUENT INTERVALS\nHE WOULD CRAVE THE INDULGENCE OF MY SON\u2014IMPLORING \"SIR, AM I RIGHT ?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY SON WAS SO EMBARRASSED\n-- THE KOREAN DID THE WHOLE PROJECT IN ONE FLOWING SHOT -- LITERALLY THANKFUL\nWHEN MY SON SAID-- \" YES , CONTINUE\" TO HIS \" SIR- AM I RIGHT SO\nFAR ? \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN THE CODE WAS\nWRITTEN AND TESTED -- MY ELDER SON TOLD HIM \"SO FAR YOU HAVE DONE\nEVERYTHING -- I WILL WRITE THE FINAL PROJECT REPORT \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO MY SON WROTE THE\nCODE PRESENTATION OVERNIGHT AND SHOWED IT TO THE KOREAN BOY THE NEXT DAY -- HE\nLOOKED ON MY SON AS AN ABSOLUTE HERO -- STARS IN HIS EYES AND CRIED \" WOW\u2014\nI COULD HAVE NEVER DONE THIS , SIR\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY SON WAS A SLEEPING\nPARTNER IN THIS PROJECT.&nbsp; HE WAS HONEST\nTO ADMIT IT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY SON INSISTED AND\nWROTE THE KOREAN BOYs NAME FIRST FOLLOWED BY HIS NAME-- THROUGH COLLEGE RULES\nREQUIRED THE MASTERs STUDENTS NAME FIRST AND THEN THE UNDERGRADUATE STUDENTs\nNAME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN WAS\nA MEDIOCRE BRAIN\u2014HE WAS ABSOLUTE DISGRACE IN MATH\u2014EINSTEIN DID NOT HAVE A\nMATHEMATICAL BRAIN-- HE OUTSOURCED ALL HIS MATH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL HIS AWARD WINNING\nIDEAS OF EINSTEIN IS STOLEN FROM FROM VEDAS AND SECONDARY ONES -- STOLEN FROM\nAN INTELLECTUAL PATENT POOL OF WHICH HE WAS CLEVERLY PLACED AS THE GUARDIAN\nCLERK BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN\nTHE INDIAN MATH GENIUS --LOST HIS DIARY, IN WHICH HE HAD RECORDED ALL HIS\nPRICELESS FINDINGS . THE JEW BASTARDS STOLE IT. AFTER THAT RAMANUJAN USED TO DO\nHIS WORK ON A SLATE , RUB IT OFF AND RETAIN RESULTS INSIDE HIS HEAD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN\nWAS POISONED \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HIS YOUNG WIFE STARTED\nCRYING BITTERLY ( SHE WAS NOT THE CRYING TYPE ) &nbsp;AS SOON AS THE PYRE WAS LIT AND FELL INTO A\nFAINT -- WHEN WELL WISHERS PRESSED HER, SHE REVEALED THE TRUTH ABOUT THE\n\"LOST DIARY\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Delete<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_19.html?showComment=1529427921138#c2937053288473366459\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 19, 2018 at 10:35 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_23MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.huffingtonpost.in/2017/08/07/why-its-dangerous-for-the-centre-to-tamper-with-article-35a-in_a_23068270/</span><br />\n<br />\nWHY IS JEWSIH MEDIA INTERESTED IN INDIAN AFFAIRS?..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A empowers the state legislature to define \u201cpermanent residents\u201d of the state, their special rights and privileges. It was added to the Constitution through a presidential order of 1954..<br />\n<br />\nOver the years, local Kashmiris have been made to believe by Pakistani agents that scrapping of Article 35A would change the demography of the region\u2014nothing is further from the truth.<br />\n<br />\nThe property of Hindu Kashmiris who migrated post the ethnic cleansing was usurped by Kashmiri Muslims or bought for throw away prices -- not residents of Jammu or Ladakh. The Kashmiri Valley is much smaller when compared to Jammu and Ladakh, both in terms of area and population, hence it should not be permitted to hold the rest of the state to ransom.<br />\n<br />\nThe BJP had mentioned removal of the Article in its election manifesto and believes the Article has outlived its utility and the state should be merged with the nation, akin to other states.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370, guarantees special status to the state, restricting the central government\u2019s power to only three subjects - defence, foreign affairs and communication.<br />\n<br />\nThe Delhi agreement between Jawaharlal Nehru and his HALF BROTHER Sheikh Abdullah in 1952 led to several additional provisions of the Constitution being extended to the state. This was done via a presidential order of 1954. Article 35A was inserted then.<br />\n<br />\nThe J&amp;K High Court in October 2015 had ruled that Article 370 is \u201cpermanent, beyond amendment, repeal or abrogation\u201d. In a subsequent appeal, the Supreme Court stated that it is not permanent and Parliament can take a call on scrapping it.<br />\n<br />\nIt is the DEEP STATE within India which keeps Kashmir on the tinderbox.. This DEEP STATE is sustained by JNU commies and Benami media. ..<br />\n<br />\nFarooq Abdullah's mother is JEWESS Begum Akbar Jehan whose father was Rothschild's agent JEW Michael Harry Nedou.. Omar Abdullah\u2019s mother is white JEWESS Molly.<br />\n<br />\nJEWESS Begum Akbat Jehan was married to Lawrence of Arabia as per my Pakistani officers.<br />\n<br />\nJEW Lawrence of Arabia was the kingpin for the worldwide DEEP STATE of Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nRead all 5 parts ---<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-truth-exhumed-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IF INDIA HAS TO NIP OUT PAKISTAN AIDED TERRORISM IN KASHMIR , ARTICLE 370 AND 35A MUST GO..<br /><br />WE DO NOT NEED TO RUN TO ANY COLLEGIUM JUDGE\u2026<br /><br />WE DO NOT CARE FOR THESE UNCONSTITUTIONAL COLLEGIUM JUDGES..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 of the Indian constitution is an article that grants special autonomous status to the state of Jammu and Kashmir.<br />\n<br />\nThe article is drafted in Part XXI of the Constitution: Temporary, Transitional and Special Provisions.<br />\n<br />\nThe State's Constituent Assembly was empowered to recommend the articles of the Indian constitution to be applied to the state or to abrogate the Article 370 altogether.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the state Constituent Assembly dissolved itself without recommending abrogation, the Article 370 was deemed to have become a permanent feature of the Indian Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ELECTIONS TO THE JAMMU AND KASHMIR ASSEMBLY IN 1951 WERE RIGGED.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThey exploited Article 370, and adopted Sections 6, 8 and 9 for incorporation in the Constitution under which the State was to be governed in the future.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 gave the solitary State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir the right to have a separate Constitution and separate flag, but nowhere does it say which category of Indians will enjoy all citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and which sections will not.<br />\n<br />\nPARAMOUNT CLAUSE: \" ETHNIC CLEANSING \" - OF SIX LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS BY KASHMIRI MUSLIMS SUPPORTED BY PAKISTAN, MAKES ARTICLE 370 NULL AND VOID\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_23BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Kashmir through the Constitution (Application to Jammu &amp; Kashmir) Order, May 1954.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 35A enabled the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly to deny citizenship rights to the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan and all other Indians, barring Permanent Residents of the State.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Armed with absolute power, the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly adopted Section 6 which said no persons who had crossed over to the state after May 1944 will be considered eligible for citizenship rights.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">The unconstitutional amendments to Article 368 and Article 35 were mentioned only in Appendix-I and Appendix-II, respectively, so that they could escape public attention in a CRIMINAL MANNER.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nehru in cahoots with his HALF BROTHER Sheikh Abdullah conspired against the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan, and then further hatched a conspiracy against all Indian citizens, in order to pander to communalists in Kashmir, by subverting Articles 16 and 19 of the Indian Constitution which deal with the rights of Indian citizens, including fundamental rights.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 19, for example, says that \u201cAll citizens shall have the right (a) to freedom of speech and expression, (b) to assemble peacefully and without arms, (c) to form associations or unions, (d) to move freely throughout the territory of India, (e) to reside and settle in any part of the territory of India; (f) to acquire, hold and dispose of property; and (g) to practice any profession, or to carry on any occupation, trade or business\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It follows that what is needed is not just the abrogation of Article 370 but also the revocation of Article 35A. This is the only course left to enable the refugees from West Pakistan and other Indians to exercise citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and integrate it fully into India.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Since the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BALLS !</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT IS \" NULL AND VOID \"..</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 35A came into existence by a Presidential Order passed by Dr. Rajandra Prasad ( Rothschild sponsored FAKE Kayastha ) on the advice of Nehru\u2019s cabinet in 1954...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President of India has sole legislative power under article 123 power to make ordinance when either house of the Parliament is not in session.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">- This legislative powers of the President has an EXPIRY SHELL PERIOD OF MERE SIX MONTHS....</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_21M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_19.html?showComment=1529428053983#c1331697578090778892\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 19, 2018 at 10:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution can be amended only by the Parliament as per procedure clearly laid out in Article 368. but Article 35A was never presented before the Parliament of India\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThis effectively means, in this case, the President bypassed the amending procedure as laid out in the Constitution of India in order to add the new Article 35A\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThis also means that Article 368 of the Constitution, in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, also got amended!..<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does not have legislative power, but here in this case he performed the function of Parliament!..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A appears in the Constitution as an appendix\u2026How can an Article, which has been implemented on the ground as if it\u2019s a part of the Constitution, be missing from the text of the Constitution ?<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was an amendment in our Constitution via the back door (Presidential order), without the involvement of India\u2019s Parliament\u2026<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A is an example of the abuse of Article 370. Article 35A is a violation of the basic structure of our Constitution. Article 35A spawned a set of laws that were discriminatory in nature. ..<br />\n<br />\nIt curbs certain basic rights enshrined in the very Preamble of the Constitution. A Kashmiri woman marrying a non-permanent resident or outsider loses all succession rights, while a Kashmiri man does not.<br />\n<br />\nAs a result of the implementation of Article 35A,.lakhs of Indian HINDU citizens have been deprived of \u201c JUSTICE, social, economic and political \u201d and \u201c EQUALITY of status and of opportunity \u201d...<br />\n<br />\nIn the laws under Article 370 read with Article 35A even the President of India may be denied a place or land for official purpose. This is a breach of trust\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDemocratic India cannot allow any section of its population to be treated as second-rate citizens in any part of the country.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 368 is the only way to amend the Constitution,.. Not the President.<br />\n<br />\nThe marginal note of Article 368 states; \u201c Power of the Parliament to amend the Constitution and procedure, therefore \u201d.. Which means it is the Parliament that has the power to amend the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does NOT have the sole UNBRIDLED power to amend the constitution through the bypass of the entire Constitutional mechanism nor does Article 370 give power to the President to insert any Article in any Part of the Constitution....<br />\n<br />\nThe parliamentary route of lawmaking was bypassed when the President incorporated Article 35A into the Constitution. Article 368 (i) of the Constitution empowers only Parliament to amend the Constitution. The President acted outside his jurisdiction.. Article 35A is void because the Nehru government did not place it before Parliament for discussion..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 grants special status to Jammu and Kashmir, while Article 35A empowers the state legislature to define permanent citizens.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 and Article 35A of the Indian Constitution are an \"unnecessary baggage\" of the past and hence these laws be repealed..<br />\n<br />\nRestricting citizens from other States from getting employment or buying property within Jammu and Kashmir is a violation of fundamental rights under Articles 14, 19 and 21 of the Constitution\u2026<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 (along with Article 35A) is an anachronistic decree that has outlived its utility, militates against India\u2019s sovereignty, and discriminates against both Indians and Kashmiris by mutually excluding each other from syncretic growth. It is redundant, and constitutionally discarded into the dustbin of history.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_21MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_21BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_21B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_22B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5225369069031156517\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
