Maharaja Kharak\nSingh, (Elder son of Maharaja Ranjit Singh)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Birth February 20,\n1801, Accession June 27, 1839<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deposed in a coup\nOctober 8, 1839, Poisoned to death November 5, 1840<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Maharaja Naunihal\nSingh, (son of Maharaja Kharak Singh)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Birth February 11,\n1820, Became a Maharaja October 8, 1839 (De-facto ruler)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Death November 6, 1840,\n( Murdered with stone pounded on his head ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Maharaja Sher\nSingh., (Second son of Maharaja Ranjit Singh)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Occupied the throne\nNovember 9, 1840, for 23 days only, Dethroned December 2, 1840<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Maharani Chand Kaur\n., (Widow of Maharaja Kharak Singh)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proclaimed Malika\nMukaddas December 2, 1840 or Queen Empress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capituated January 17,\n1841, Deposed January 18, 1841, Killed June 9, 1842<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Maharaia Sher Singh,\n( son of Ranjit Singh with Mehtab Kaur , Again returned to power)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Birth 1807<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accession January 18,\n1841, Killed September 15, 1843<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Maharaja Duleep\nSingh, (Youngest son of Maharaja Ranjit Singh)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Birth September 6,\n1838, Mounted the throne. September 15, 1843<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">* Deposed March 29,\n1849. * Exiled to England December 21, 1849<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Death (in Paris-France)\nOctober 22, 1893<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hari Singh Nalwa died\nfighting the Pathan forces of crypto JEW Dost Mohammed Khan of Afghanistan. He\nwas bumped off.. He had done his job as a curry leaf..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">February 21, 2018 at\n10:17 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/justin-trudeau-visits-amritsar-tomorrow-given-history-of-city-he-must-tread-wisely/articleshow/62998084.cms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE WILL NOT TOLERATE A\nSINGLE WORD FROM CANADIAN PM JUSTIN TRUDEAU ABOUT THE SIKH REFUGEE SHIP\nKOMAGATA MARU...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">JUST BEFORE THE FIRST\nWORLD WAR, JEW ROTHSCHILD MOVED MANY CRYPTO JEW SIKHS TO CANADA BY SHIP..</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THESE WERE DESCENDANTS\nOF TRAITOR SIKHS WHO SUPPORTED ROTHSCHILD IN 1857 FIRST WAR OF INDEPENDENCE..</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Komagata Maru\narrived on Canada's West Coast on May 23, 1914, anchoring in Vancouver's Coal\nHarbour. Nearly all of the 376 passengers were denied entry and the ship sat in\nthe harbour for two months<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE REASON WAS ALL THE\nSIKHS HAD A HIGHLY CONTAGIOUS EYE INFECTION TRACHOMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chlamydia is one of the\nmost common sexually transmitted infections in the west affecting about 6.1% of\nwomen and 3.2 of men..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LET US STOP THE\nBULLSHIT ( BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA ) THAT THE SHIPs SIKH PASSENGERS WERE\nSTOPPED DUE TO RACISM..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 350 Sikhs\nwere denied entry to Canada and sent back across the Pacific Ocean \u2014 back to\nIndia. It reached Calcutta on 29 September 1914.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the Sikhs died\non the way back --these deaths were due to Chlamydia. The ship had enough of\nfood and water<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sikh passengers (\ncertified as traitors) were not allowed to enter Calcutta; they were rather\nordered to board a Punjab-bound train especially arranged for the purpose. They\nrefused to do so and many of the passengers were killed, a great many escaped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The ship, renamed as\nGuru Nanak Jahaj, by the Sikh who chartered Komagata Maru-- Baba Gurdit Singh<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Baba Gurdit Singh's\ngrandfather Sardar Rattan Singh was a Rothschild agent.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gurdit Singh did NOT\nbelong to Ghadarite party<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Komagata Maru\nvoyage began in Hong Kong on 4 April 1914 and ended nearly six months later on\n29 September at Budge Budge, twenty-seven kilometres downstream from Calcutta..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Malaya Gurdit Singh\nsupplied milk to a Sikh regiment, loyal to Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">SIKHS IN CANADA AND\nENGLAND WERE INVITED BY THE QUEEN FOR SUPPORTING THE CROWN DURING THE 1857\nFIRST WAR OF INDEPENDENCE --THEY DID NOT GO AS REFUGEES</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NO NATAK BAAZI FROM JUSTIN\nBABY ( BIOLOGICAL SON OF CRYPTO JEW FIDEL CASTRO ) -- JUST LAY OFF INDIA, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>YOU\nCUNT</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> &nbsp;!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: x-large;\">Niti ayog again gives that \"only grievance accepted not suggestions\" excuse.</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nName Of Complainant- Vatsal Anand<br />\nDate of Receipt- 15/05/2018<br />\nReceived By Ministry/Department- NITI Aayog<br />\nGrievance Description -<br />\n<br />\nDear Sir,<br />\n<br />\nWe demand action on this horrifying revelation by Captain Ajit Vadakayil on OPV and IPV forms of polio immunization methods and its horrific ramification. The oral vaccine (OPV) being given to Indian babies can multiply and spread to other babies if and when they are unvaccinated. On the other hand, the IPV that is given through injection, though expensive, is a safe way of immunization as there is no chance of the virus replicating in the gut of the immunized child and spreading to other children. Still only OPV was pushed big time in India.<br />\n<br />\nThe Evil Pharma Lobby of Western Countries has bribed our authorities and doctors to hush up all the cases of polio infection caused due to OPV administered to Indian babies. We are appalled and horrified by the callousness of our politicians, bureaucrats, members of medical fraternity and everyone involved in this unimaginably devilish genocidal scam.<br />\n<br />\nFIRST WORLD COUNTRIES LIKE CANADA AND THE US HAVE BANNED OPV AS FAR BACK AS 2000 OR EARLIER BUT WE HAVE CONTINUED IT. WHY<br />\nComment on Capt. Vadakayils blog:<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br />\nORAL POLIO VACCINES ( OPV ) WAS PUSHED ON INDIAN BABIES. USING THEM AS LAB RATS. ORAL POLIO VACCINE ( OPV ) WAS A LIVE VACCINE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WEST NEVER USED ORAL VACCINES ON THEIR CHILDREN..THE INJECTED THE SAFE VACCINE ( IPV ) - INACTIVATED POLIO VACCINE.<br />\n<br />\nBABIES IN THE VILLAGES AND FORESTS WHO WERE NEVER GIVEN ORAL POLIO VACCINES WERE AFFLICTED WITH VAPP ( VACCINE ASSOCIATED PARALYTIC POLIOMYELITIS ).<br />\n<br />\nPOLIO IS ALSO CALLED POLIOMYELITIS.<br />\n<br />\nLAKHS OF BABIES DIED ALL OVER INDIA - BUT THIS WAS HUSHED UP BY BRIBING ALL INVOLVED IN INDIA.. DOCTORS WERE SENT ABROAD FOR SEXUAL JAUNTS.<br />\n<br />\nThese bribed Lutyens DEEP STATE minister, babus and doctors did massive propaganda that OPV is best suited for Indian conditions ( SIC ) due to its low cost, high efficacy and ease of administering.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWHAT THEY DID NOT SAY WAS A WESTERN BABY VACCINATED WITH IPV COULD NOT SPREAD THE DISEASE.<br />\n<br />\nBUT AN INDIAN BABY GIVEN OPV ( BY MOUTH DROPS ) COULD SPREAD DISEASE TO BABIES WHO HAVE NOT BEEN GIVEN THE POLIO DROPS. A KILLER CONDITION CALLED VAPP.<br />\n<br />\nWhen a baby is given OPV, the content is ingested, the viruses replicate in the intestinal tract, providing immunity to subsequent infection.<br />\n<br />\nVaccine-derived poliovirus (VDPV) is a strain of poliovirus that was initially included in oral polio vaccine (OPV) and that has changed over time and behaves more like the naturally occurring virus.<br />\n<br />\nThis means it can be spread more easily to people who are unvaccinated against polio and who come in contact with the stool or respiratory secretions, such as from a sneeze, of an infected person. These viruses may cause illness, including paralysis - especially among the undernourished Indian children.</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_106BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Let me quote Wikipedia\nabout John Dayal who keeps spewing hate ( ALL LIES ) against Hindus and\nHinduism on TV almost daily..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">John Dayal's testimony\nagainst India at U.S. House of Representative<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">QUOTE: John Dayal on\nApril 4, 2014, appeared at a hearing on The plight of religious minorities in\nIndia which was convened by Tom Lantos Human Rights Commission.[30] This\ncommission is a mostly white bipartisan caucus of United States House of\nRepresentatives that was set up with the help of the Council on Foreign\nRelations. In his short testimony he made unsubstantiated remarks about his\nviews of religious tolerance in India. While as a member of National\nIntegration Council(government of India) he as a witness recommended the panel\nof commission to incorporates his concerns in U.S. India relationship and U.S.\npolicy vis-a-vis the United States-India strategic dialogue which is framework\nof engagement of the United States Department of State with India. Further, he\ncited the house resolution 417[31][32] and urged that human rights should be\nthe part of strategic U.S.-India dialogue.[33] Dayal's attempt to advance this\nresolution was strongly criticized by others, such as the United States India\nPolitical Action Committee,[34] the Hindu American Foundation,[35] as well as\nU.S. Congresswoman (D-HI) Tulsi Gabbard. The HAF expressed concerns that the\npanel was 'unbalanced' in favor of anti-Hindu activists. In particular, Gabbard\ncharacterized his testimony as a thinly veiled attempt to covertly influence\nthe upcoming General Elections in India in favor of anti-Indian groups, an action\ndeemed \"inappropriate\" for the US Congress and \"against the\nshared interests\" of both nations.[35] : UNQUOTE </span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">INDIA IS NO LONGER BOTHERED ABOUT INTERNATIONAL\nHUMAN RIGHTS ORGS &nbsp;\u2013WHO ARE BRIBED BY THE\nDEEP STATE TO KEEP INDIA ON THE BOIL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE WEST KNOWS THAT IN 15 YEARS INDIA WILL BE\nTHIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>THE WHITE MAN WILL NEVER AGREE TO BE LORDED\nOVER BY THE BROWN MAN.&nbsp; &nbsp; HE IS TRYING HIS BEST TO IMPLODE INDIA FROM WITHIN..<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">well --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">2 decades ago, i made a surprise inspection\nof the ships lifeboats and found them in poor condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">i had the THIRD MATE with me-- and i told\nhim, that i want the boats painted-- and since he allowed the boats to regress\nso much- he must do the painting himself-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">this officer was from a south china sea\nnation , known for keeping one knife in the pocket and another smaller sharper one\ninside the socks. and NO captain takes liberties with them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">so one day , i was holding a technical class\nabout INERT GAS and CRUDE OIL WASH and all were present except the third mate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">so i send the indian cadet -- i told him that\nhe might be in the life boat painting, he must attend the meet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">the cadet came back and said that the third\nmate heard him out , but resumed his work , in a deep sulk<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">then i send the second mate, mate -with the\nsame result- he just ignored him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">so i went myself-- told him to STOP what he\nis doing and attend the class-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">he then came to my cabin along with me and\nsat there silent for the next 45 minutes-- in a DEEP SULK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">the ship was crossing the pacific.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">the next morning my radio officer told me\nthat the third mate has gone into the AGGRO mode - and was brandishing a huge knife\nfor all to see -- a sort of warning-- which this nationality was famous for.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">things transpired and my chief officer and\nchief engineer advised me-- it is better to get him off the ship at honolulu--\nas he was on a sort of WORK TO RULE.. and having cold war with ALL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">so a day before honolulu i called the radio\nofficer with his sign off accounts sheet , signed it and told him to pay him\noff .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">radio officer ( a parsi ) comes back with a\nRED face and says - he refused to sign his wage sheet -- saying that he wants\nhis monthly allotments of the past 2 months ( already sent to his bank ) in\ncash too. &nbsp;he claimed he had NOT received\nit. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">i verified with my shore office and found\nthat his money was already collected by his wife, and he has made a phone call\nto her already .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">then i asked for the wage sheet --kept it on\nmy office table-- went into my bed room and got my 500 US dollar knife ( cold\nsteel- so sharp that you know you have been cut only when warm blood trickles )\nand kept this knife and pen on either side of the wage sheet like fork and\nknife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">radio officer ran-- he said he will NOT be\nwitness to this--but i could see him looking through the door curtain slit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">i called the third mate-- told him to sign --\nand said i will NOT pay him the money he signed for till 10 seconds before he\ndisembarks at honolulu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">these are my orders-- no choice given--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">if he thinks other wise pick up the knife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">quietly the man signed the sheet --and walked\nout .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">i could see the radio officer running away.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">i called the officer back-- gave him a cold\nbeer -and asked him what transpired-- why things had to come to this stage\n--that i had to sack him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">believe it or not-- the man cried-- he apologized\n-- he said , the cadet whom i sent first was RUDE in his tone when he called\nhim from the boat - <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">YOOOUUU- &nbsp;CAPTAIN WANTS YOU IN HIS CABIN NOW -- he did\nNOT tell him that he whole class was waiting for him..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">and later when second mate and chief mate\ncalled him-- he felt that since he refused the cadet , it would hurt his\nmanhood if he came when higher ranks called him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">i believed him- for the sardar cadet was a\nbit of a tough joe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">then i paid him his money-- and told him,\nthat his next contract on another ship in the same company is assured- &nbsp;capt ajit vadakayil's word ( known to all ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">lesson? -- be FAIR !</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">never punish a man based on one incident.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">everybody is having a tough time-- and trying\ntheir best .</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAMCHANDRA GUHA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUHEL SETH</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHOBHAA DE</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SIDHARTH VARADARAJAN</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ATTORNEY GENERAL</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PRESIDENT OF INDIA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VP OF INDIA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SPEAKER LOK SABHA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SPEAKER RAJYA SABHA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SWAMY</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GURUMURTHY</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARNAB GOSWAMI</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NAVIKA KUMAR</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RSS</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VHP</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AVBP</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MEA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUSHMA SWARAJ</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DGPs OF ALL STATES</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CMs OF ALL STATES ( LEAVE OUT MOMOTO AND KACHRA WAAL )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3960884048106624312\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_188M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_19.html?showComment=1529543202343#c3960884048106624312\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 6:36 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHERE IS A TIP TO PEOPLE SELLING HOMES AND FLATS..<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE ADVERTISE \"FLATS FOR SALE JUST ONE KM OFF LARGE MALL- TWO KM OFF NEAREST METRO RAIL STATION , GRAND VIEW OF LAKE \" ETC..<br />\n<br />\nYOU CAN WRANGLE 20% MORE SALE MONEY IF YOU ADVERTISE \" SOUND SLEEP ASSURED , NO AZAN CACOPHONY FROM MOSQUE SCREAMING OUT OUR GOD ALLAH IS AWWAL \"..<br />\n<br />\nI REMEMBER THERE WAS A FLAT COMPLEX ON SALE IN CALICUT-- BANG ON THE BEACH ROAD..THEY ADVERTISED BY A LARGE BOARD -- \"BEST SEA VIEW , ONLY 300 METRES OFF THE SEA WATER EDGE \"..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN CAME A TSUNAMI\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOVERNIGHT THE BOARD DATA WAS AMENDED TO \" NOT VERY CLOSE TO THE SEA \"\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA ( INCLUDING MUSLIMS ) DEMAND THAT MORNING 0430 AM AZAN MUST BE DONE WITHOUT LOUDSPEAKERS\u2026 WE LOSE REM SLEEP\u2026.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WHEN CHILDREN LOSE REM SLEEP--THEY SCORE VERY POOR GRADES IN EXAMS \u2026. BODY REPAIR HAPPENS ONLY DURING REM SLEEP\u2026.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nUSING LOUDSPEAKERS IN ROTHSCHILD BUILD MOSQUES WAS A PRACTICE STARTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO WAKE UP HIS TANNERY WORKERS FOR WW1\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ROTHSCHILD IMPORTED GERMAN LOUDSPEAKERS \u2026 IMAGINE A JEW BUILDING MOSQUES FOR MUSLIMS NEAR TANNERIES ..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD CONVERTED HINDUS TO SUNNI MUSLIMS ..AND CREATED MADRASSAS WITH FREE FOOD\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID PAKISTAN AND BANDLADESH HAVE MUSLIM MAJORITY BEFORE INDEPENDENCE IN 1947?....<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED TANNERIES AT THE SEA END OF HUGE RIVERS.. ...&nbsp;KANPUR WAS THE WORLDs LARGEST MILITARY CANTONMENT..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">ROTHSCHILD NEEDED TO CARVE OUT THE STATE OF ISRAEL... HE NEED LEATHER BOOTS , BELTS, HORSE SADDLES , GUN HOLSTERS ETC. \u202660% OF OUR COWS WERE DECIMATED FOR THIS \u2026.. GANDHI WAS IN CAHOOTS\u2026..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nGandhi recruited 13 lakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war ..\u2013 out of which 111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed \u2026. Gandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the second World war... Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nARE MUSLIMS THE ONLY ONES WHO CAN DISTURB EVERBODYs SLEEP AT 0430 HRS IN THE MORNING, WITH AZAN ON LOUDSPEAKER -- DEPRIVING ALL OF REM SLEEP ?.....<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST AZAN MUST NOT BE EARLIER THAN CIVIL TWILIGHT START TIME ( CENTRE OF SUN MUST BE LESS THAN SIX DEGREES BELOW HORIZON ) ......<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA WE HEAR MORNING FAJR AZAN 75 MINUTES BEFORE SUNRISE.. THIS IS NOT ALLOWED AS PER KORAN. ....<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST AZAN CANNOT BE MORE THAN 48 MINUTES BEFORE SUNRISE.....<br />\n<br />\nTHE SECOND AZAN ZOHAR ( DUHR ) IS SILENT -- WHEN SUN IS AT HIGHEST POINT AND ITS AZIMUTH IS EITHER NORTH OR SOUTH....<br />\n<br />\nTHE 4TH LOUD AZAN MAGHRIB IS IMMEDIATELY AFTER SUNSET....<br />\n<br />\nTHE 3RD AZAN ASR IS SILENT-- The Asr prayers can be performed till the sun is still bright and enough time of the day is left for a person to cover a distance of six miles.....<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAST AZAN ISHA IS LOUD-- AND MUST BE STARTED ONLY AFTER --REPEAT --AFTER THE EVENING TWILIGHT IS OVER-- WHEN SUN IS MORE THAN 6 DEGREES BELOW HORIZON....<br />\n<br />\nTwilight is produced by sunlight scattering in the upper atmosphere, illuminating the lower atmosphere so that Earth''s surface is neither completely lit nor completely dark. ....<br />\n<br />\nIT IS RIDICULOUS THAT A HINDU BLOGGER HAS TO TELL THIS...<br />\n<br />\nTHE ORIGINAL KORAN WRITTEN AT CHERMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE KODUNGALLUR LIES IN A FOX HOLE IN TIMBUKTOO. ..FRENCH ROTHSCHILD MERCENERIES TRIED TO BURN IT- THEY WERE NOT SUCCESSFUL.....<br />\n<br />\nMUSLIMS WHO CAN READ FROM LEFT TO RIGHT MUST SAVE ISLAM--CORRUPTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD USING HIS POISON INJECTED FATAWA E ALAMGIRI ( ALAMGIRI IS THE NAME OF AURANGAZEB ) FOR HIJACKING POLITICS......<br />\n<br />\nBOTH SHIAS AND SUNNIS WERE WEDGED APART BY JEWS.....<br />\n<br />\nSHIAS AND SUNNIS RESPECT PROPHET MOHAMMAD AND LAW MAKER ABU HANIFA ( BOTH OF MALAYALI BLOOD ) --TWO TOWERS OF ISLAM....<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6820372111418789953\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_191M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_19.html?showComment=1529545596803#c6820372111418789953\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 7:16 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_191MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PRANAB MUKHERJEE IS THE WORST PRESIDENT OF INDIA.. HE CAN SHOVE HIS \u201cCONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTSM\u201d\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN ENTIRE PARLIAMENT SESSIONS GOT WASHED OUT ON MANIPULATION OF THE ITALIAN WAITRESS , THIS BONG FELLOW WAS WALKING ON THE PRESIDENTIAL LAWNS SIPPING MACHCHER JHOL...</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">PRANAB MUKHERJEE DID NOT KNOW THE SUBJECTIVE / DISCRETIONARY POWERS OF THE PRESIDENTS CHAIR AFFORDED BY THE CONSTITUTION...</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">SUBJECTIVE POWERS ARE GIVEN TO THE PRESIDENT SO THAT HE CAN SUSTAIN DHARMA ... THIS IS WHY HE IS THE SUPREME COMMANDER OF THE ARMED FORCES...</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Indian President is not a ceremonial head, or RUBBER STAMP \u2013as told my benami media </span>\u2026</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All important decisions regarding the country are taken in the name of Indian President, though most of these will be based on the binding advice given by Council of Ministers(CoM), as per Article 74 of Indian Constitution. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But there are certain exceptions, where he can use his ENORMOUS discretionary powers..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President has discretionary power when he exercises suspensive veto ie. when he returns a bill (not money bill) for reconsideration of the parliament\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">However if the bill is passed again by the Parliament with or without amendments and presented again to the President, it is obligatory for him to give his assent to the bill\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President has a pocket veto power ( to sustain dharma ) where he neither ratifies nor rejects nor returns the bill, but simply keeps the bill pending for an indefinite period\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As the time limit within which the President has to take the decision with respect to a bill presented to him for assent, has not been mentioned in the constitution, in effect the inaction of the President stops the bill from becoming an act\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Under article 78 the President enjoys the right to seek information from the PM regarding the administration of the affairs of the union\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Under the established convention, the President has the right to warn or encourage the Council of Minister (CoM) in the exercise of its power..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Under Article 85, the President can summon each House of Parliament to meet at such time and place as he thinks fit, to ensure that six months shall not intervene between its last sitting in one session and the date appointed for its sitting in the next session\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When no political party or coalition of parties enjoy the majority in Lok Sabha, then the President has discretion in inviting the leader of that party or coalition of parties who in his opinion is able to form a stable government\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GOVERNOR OF A STATE HAS SUCH SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS TOO.. TO SUSTAIN DHARMA. I WILL SPEAK LATER\u2026.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It is for the president to decide if he should dissolve Loksabha or not when CoM loses the majority in Lok Sabha\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Note: The President can dissolve Lok Sabha only on the advice of CoM but the advice is binding only if the government is a majority government\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It is for the president to decide if he should dissolve CoM or not when CoM loses the majority in Lok Sabha\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A caretaker government does not enjoy the confidence of Lok Sabha and hence it is not expected to take major decisions but only to make the day-to-day administrative decisions. It is for the President to decided the day-to-day decisions\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 74 of Indian Constitution says that---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(1) There shall be a Council of Ministers with the Prime Minister at the head to aid and advise the President who shall, in the exercise of his functions, act in accordance with such advice:--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(2)&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Provided that the President may require the Council of Ministers to reconsider such advice, either generally or otherwise, and the President shall act in accordance with the advice tendered after such reconsideration\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(2) The question whether any, and if so what, advice was tendered by Ministers to the President shall not be inquired into in any court.\u201d..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President of India is vested with Legislative, Executive and Judicial powers. But as the advice given by CoM is binding on Indian President, in reality, most of these powers rest with the COM; but decisions are taken in the name of President of India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2---</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_191BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_191b+seedLwhD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_189T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_191b+seedLwhD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_189TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_189TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_189TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_191b+seedLwhD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_189TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_191b+seedLwhD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_189B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7387297428168064209\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_189M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_19.html?showComment=1529545680233#c7387297428168064209\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 7:18 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_189MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">See some examples\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President\u2019s rule \u2013 He can rule the whole nation or individual states at times of emergency. The President can declare State, National and Financial Emergencies. Punjab, Jharkhand, Jammu and Kashmir and many other states have been under President\u2019s Rule\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Commander-in-Chief of Indian Armed forces \u2013 The President is the Commander-in-Chief of the Indian Armed Forces\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President appoints our State governors, Supreme Court and High Court Judges, and the Chief Justice\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President can summon and dissolve parliament sessions..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A \u2018bill\u2019 passed in the parliament can become an \u2018act\u2019 only after the President\u2019s approval\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President of India has the power to reduce the degree of punishment or pardon criminals \u2013 even death sentences can be absolved on appeal\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President is the head of Indian State while Prime Minister is the head of Indian Government\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Ambassadors and High Commissioners representing our country are appointed by the President\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President appoints the Chief Election Commissioner and other Election Commissioners\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President delivers the opening address for the first session of the parliament, as well as the first session of a newly elected government, defining the policies of the government\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IAS or IPS officers (All India Services) by President of India, based on the advice of UPSC\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President of India almost always acts on the aid and advice of the Council of Ministers except under the following circumstances where he acts on his discretion:---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In appointing the Prime Minister from among the contenders when no single party attains majority after elections to the Lok Sabha\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Council of Ministers is voted out and after resigning advises the President to dissolve, the Lok Sabha and hold fresh elections (or resigns and advises so without being voted out). The President is expected to exercise his discretion in such circumstances as much of the Lok Sabha's life may still be intact and it is worthwhile to explore the possibility of forming an alternative Government\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">While exercising a pocket veto\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Disqualifying members of the legislature when the Council's advice is not taken\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Can return the advice of the Council of Ministers once for its reconsideration\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Can return the Bill passed by the Parliament once for its reconsideration\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are certain Bills which can be introduced in the Parliament only on the recommendation of the President such as---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Bill to alter the boundaries of the States or to change the names of the States (Article 3),..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Money Bill as detailed in Article 11.0\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Financial Bill (category one) involving Article 110 but containing other provisions as well\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Financial Bill (category two) which is an Ordinary Bill but seeking to draw from the Consolidated Fund of India can be taken up for \u2018consideration\u2019 that is \u2018reading two\u2019 in the process of passage of a Bill\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Legislation involving Article 31 A\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Any legislation involving items of taxation in which the States are interested or one that seeks to redefine agricultural income etc\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Traditionally, the structure of government has been divided into three components:---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(1) the legislature to make laws;..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(2) the executive to implement laws and..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">(3) the judiciary to INTERPRET laws and administer justice. ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">COLLEGIUM JUDGES CANNOT MAKE THEIR OWN LAWS..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">THEY CANNOT USE PAST JUDGEMENTS ( ZILCH CONTEXT / JUSTICE IS BLIND SYSTEM ) AS A LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION, AS WHAT IS HAPPENING NOW-- POWERED BY THE PATHETIC SOLIS / FALIS/ AND SALVES )</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">################</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RECENTLY THE KARNATAKA GOVERNORs RULING WAS OVER RULED BY THE JUDGES ( TWO WEEKS GIVEN TO BJP TO PROVE MAJORITY )--JUDGES DO NOT HAVE SUCH POWERS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LETTER OF SUPPORT WITH SIGNATURES MEAN NOTHING...... COLLEGIUM LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES ARE NOBODY TO DEMAND THIS WHEN THE GOVERNOR HAS USED HIS DISCRETION AND HIS VESTED POWERS....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JUDGES HAVE POWERS ONLY TO INTERPRET THE CONSTITUTION ....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AGAIN JUDGES CANNOT OVER RULE THE KARNATAKA GOVERNOR ONCE HE HAS EXERCISED HIS DISCRETION AS PER THE CONSTITUTION\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 3--</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_189MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_189BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_189B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 21, 2018 at 7:19 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_190MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 2---</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOVERNOR HAS THE DISCRETION NOT TO ALLOW UNHOLY AND OPPORTUNISTIC POST POLL ALLIANCES TO HIJACK VOTERS FREEWILL AND CHOICE... \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF ANY COLLEGIUM JUDGE PANEL OVER RULES THE GOVERNOR THEY CAN BE DISMISSED\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOVERNOR HAS BEEN AFFORDED VAST DISCRETION POWERS TO PRESERVE DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ) -- HE NEED NOT DO ANY NUMBER CRUNCHING LIKE A NON-CONSCIOUS COMPUTER\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JDS VOTER / MLAs NOW HAVE TO BE SUBSERVIENT TO THE ITALIANS -- THEY DID NOT VOTE FOR THIS TO HAPPEN\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">SUBJECTIVE MUST HOLD THE \"VETO POWER\"..</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">VETO POWER CAN NEVER BE GIVEN TO THE OBJECTIVE\u2026.</span></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DESH BHAKTI AND DHARMA IS A SUBJECTIVE FEELING.. IT CAN CAUSE BLOOD TO BOIL AND CAUSE YOU TO SACRIFICE YOUR LIFE....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ABOVE THE OBJECTIVE CONSTITUTION LIES , THE SUBJECTIVE FEELINGS TO OUR WATAN AND DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE )\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">To sustain DHARMA you cannot apply number crunching or objective judgment--you have to apply SUBJECTIVE judgments\u2026This is why a Governor or President is an experienced and level headed man .</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE FATHER STAR KID DUO OF DEVE GOUDA AND HD KUMARASWAMY HIJACKED DEMOCRACY AND CRUSHED THE WILL OF THE KARNATAKA PEOPLE TO GRAB POWER..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GOVERNOR WANTED THE JDS MLAs TO BE<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> GIVEN ENOUGH TIME TO GO BACK TO THEIR CONSTITUENCIES AND ASK THE PEOPLE </span></b>WHO VOTED THEM TO POWER -- WHAT MUST BE DONE TO PRESERVE DHARMA? -- WHAT IS THE RIGHT CONSIENCE BASED DECISION ?...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN THERE IS AN UNHOLY POST POLL ALLIANCE SO THAT A FATHER SON DUO GRABS POWER --THE PEOPLE MUST BE ALLOWED TO TELL THEIR MLA FOR WHOM THEY VOTED, WHAT THEY WANT\u2026&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\">DESH DROHI BENAMI MEDIA TRIED TO OBFUSCATE .. THAT THE GOVERNOR GAVE <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>15 DAYS FOR HORSE TRADING</b></span> ..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN ALL MLAs ARE IN RESORTS WITH THEIR MOBILE PHONES SNATCHED AWAY BY PARTY GO0NDAS, WHERE IS THE QUESTION OF HORSE TRADING ? ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN OPPORTUNISTIC POST POLL ALLIANCE ARE ALLOWED LIKE WHAT HAPPENED AT KARNATAKA THE FREE WILL AND CHOICE OF THE PEOPLE IS SNUFFED.. THIS IS NOT DEMOCRACY...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AGAIN, JUDGES CANNOT OVER RULE THE KARNATAKA GOVERNOR ONCE HE HAS EXERCISED HIS DISCRETION AS PER THE CONSTITUTION\u2026GOVERNOR HAS THE DISCRETION NOT TO ALLOW UNHOLY AND OPPORTUNISTIC POST POLL ALLIANCES TO HIJACK VOTERS FREEWILL AND CHOICE...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Governor of a State enjoys discretionary powers and as such the office of the Governor depends upon the personality and ability of the person who occupies it. .. The governor is NOT a rubber stamp. ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; He is a\nconvicted felon who has served a prison sentence in federal prison. He was\narrested by the Federal Bureau of Investigation on 19 July 2011, for concealing\nthe transfer of USD&nbsp; 4 million from\nPakistan's Inter-Services Intelligence (ISI) to fund his lobbying efforts and\ninfluence the US government on the Kashmir conflict, in violation of the\nForeign Agents Registration Act<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Capt Amarinder Singh's sister Heminder Kaur is married to Natwar\nSingh..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><a href=\"https://www.indiatoday.in/india/story/natwar-singh-cia-upa-sonia-gandhi-manmohan-singh-congress-202848-2014-08-04\">https://www.indiatoday.in/india/story/natwar-singh-cia-upa-sonia-gandhi-manmohan-singh-congress-202848-2014-08-04</a><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Central Intelligence\nAgency (CIA) may be said to be the core of the \u2018deep state\u2019 in the US, which is\ntoday a large body of 17 intelligence agencies collectively known as USIS or\nthe US Intelligence Community <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whistle blower, Edward\nSnowden had revealed in 2013 that virtually the entire US population is under\nsurveillance by the intelligence community in the US.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President Trump, during\nhis campaign, had accused the CIA and the media in circulating \u2018fake news\u2019news\nagainst him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\n\u2018intelligence-industrial complex\u2019 today is a huge network of agencies and\nprivate contractors. Over 1200 state organizations and nearly 2000 private\ncompanies, according to an estimate by Washington Post in 2010, work on diverse\naspects of counter-terrorism, intelligence, homeland security and others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Birendra Nath Mullick\nDirector of the Indian Intelligence Bureau (IB) was of colonial vintage and he\nremained head of the agency for the longest period from 1950 to 1964 under\nPrime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru (1947-64),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had close links with the CIA.. The\npost-Mullik policy regime in India\u2019s Intelligence Bureau (IB) has largely\nfollowed his guidelines without change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE FIRST CHIEF OF PMO\nWAS A CIA AGENT NAMED MO MATHAI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c176224271904133461\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_20M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
