ONLY CAPTAIN CAN USE CAPITAL..<br />\n<br />\nHERBERTS CUKURS IS A LATVIAN HERO..<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS NOT ANTI-SEMITIC..<br />\n<br />\nBUT HE KNEW SECRETS LIKE HITLER WAS A JEW.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CUKURS DID NOT KILL ANY JEW..<br /><br />WHEN HE WENT TO BRAZIL AFTER THE WAR HE TOOK HIS JEWISH GIRL FRIEND WITH HIM.</span></b><br />\nHe received a political refugee travel document from the Brazilian consulate in Marseilles. He was not running way...he wanted a fresh life..<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />KUKURS WAS NEVER CHARGED WITH ANYTHING -- NOR WAS HE BROUGHT TO TRIAL..</span></b><br />\nIn the 1930s, Cukurs gained fame in Latvia as an aviation pioneer, with solo flights to Gambia and Japan. But during World War II, he served as a deputy to the leader of the Arajs Commando, an auxiliary police unit formed after German forces captured Latvia.<br />\nIt is a lie that this unit played a central role in the near annihilation of Latvia's Jewish community\u2014that it killed 80,000 Jews, or more than 90% of the prewar Jewish population. So many Latvian officers have sailed under my command . I have relieved Latvian ship Captains..<br />\n<br />\n53years ago, kosher news headlines announced that the body of Herberts Cukurs \u2013 the \"Butcher of Riga\" who was involved in the murder of 30,000 Latvian Jews in the Holocaust and escaped trial by fleeing to Brazil \u2013 had been found inside a crate in Montevideo, the capital of Uruguay.<br />\n<br />\nAttached to the corpse was a note listing the Nazi collaborator's crimes, signed by an organization calling itself \"We Can Never Forget\".<br />\n<br />\nCukur's body was discovered after a mysterious report issued to a German news agency in Bonn, anonymously claiming that Cukurs had been killed. The report was immediately forwarded to Uruguayan police. The report directed police to a Montevideo apartment, where they found a large blood-stained crate containing the corpse inside a bedroom. Five bullet casings were found next to the body.<br />\n<br />\nCukurs had booked a hotel room, from which he was taken and killed on the same day.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">CUKURS KNEW THAT JEWS KILLED JEWS --AND THAT HITLER AND NAZIS WERE JEWS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDEAD MEN TELL NO TALES<br />\n<br />\nEVEN GANDHI KNEW TOO MUCH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI ASK LATVIANS -- KNOW YOUR HEROES..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_216b+seedDYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_216b+seedDYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_216b+seedDYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_216b+seedDYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NGOs in India are tools\nfor the foreign policy interests of western governments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the reign of the\nItalian waitress Cordaid&nbsp; (The Catholic\nOrganisation for Relief and Development Aid)&nbsp;\nwas allowed to run wild in India . For this they take\nrecourse to greasing their palm or taking the help of lobbyists who, acting on\nbehalf of corporates, influence the policy decisions of the governments, even\ntrying to influence the appointment of ministers to the ministries which are of\nparticular interests to them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Revelations by Neera\nRadia tapes are clear pointers to this direction. India has just become free\nafter 800 years of slavery. Self-serving\nfriendships and family ties between businessmen and the government influence\nthe economy and society to the extent that it corrupts public-serving economic\nand political ideals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They convert our MPs\nand Ministers into desh-drohis and Judases with few pieces of silver. If wealth\ncant buy them \u2013 it will be muscle,&nbsp;\nblackmail using honey traps or even assassination. Once you take a\nbribe, from these Trojan horses there is no way out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crony capitalism is the\ninevitable result of any capitalist system. Since big businesses make big money\nand money leads to political power, business will inevitably use their power to\ninfluence governments. The recent Occupy Wall Street movement was all about\ncommon man wanting an end to the influence of the super wealthy in the\npolitical process, which is manifestation of crony capitalism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wal-Mart Stores, has\n\u201cconceded\u201d that they have spent nearly USD 1.5 million on lobbying in the last\nquarter ended June 30, 2012 on various issues, including matters \"related\nto FDI in India.\" . How much they have not conceded? Your guess is as good\nas mine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery is the first\nstep towards subversion of the system. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The diplomatic cables\nleaked by Wikileaks, shed light on how Jewess Hillary Clinton, who has served\non the board of Jewish Walmart, which is an Arkansas headquartered company (\nDEEP STATE operative Bill Clinton is a former governor of Arkansas), had been\nvery interested in knowing what was the position of Commerce Minister Anand\nSharma on Multi-brand retail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The power, mining,\nenvironment , airline, oil and gas sectors have also been hotbeds of intense\nTrojan Horse&nbsp; lobbying in India.&nbsp;&nbsp; If you steal a slice of bread for your\nhungry child you are a criminal -- this is the sad state of India now..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, in the army ,\nthese shady&nbsp; multinationals are\n\u201clobbying\u201d retired Generals and&nbsp; retired\nDefence ministry Indian bureaucrats to do the dirty \u201cmiddle man \u201c job of\npassing on the bribes as carrier pigeons . They use the connections and\nrelations of these retired officials , with former junior colleagues to clinch\nthe issue. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ex-bureaucrats are now\nplaying a major role for their corporate bosses in crucial infrastructure sectors\nlike telecom, power, roads and ports where large-scale deregulation has taken\nplace. This type of thing must have a severe jail sentence , including seizing\nof all private assets of these Judases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Investigative\njournalism\" no longer exists\u2014and if it does exist it is slanted to favor\nsomebody who has \u201clobbied\u201d .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Truth can\nonly be found on the Internet, and you must look hard to find it.&nbsp; We Indian know these&nbsp; double faced , desh drohi, media anchors and\njournalists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several retired IAS\nofficers from sensitive ministries , opened up consultancy services for\nmultinationals and they are now rolling in money. They have foreign kickback\naccounts and are doing foreign trips.&nbsp;\nNarendra Modi must make laws to prevent all this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cIt\u2019s a complicated\nsystem, almost like a parallel government with its own rules, structures.\nPeople are fixed, punished, rewarded,\u201d admits a lobbyist shadow warrior. \u201cBut\nthat\u2019s how it is.\u201d&nbsp; Lobbyists are no\nlonger in the shadows, they have become public figures, dining and wining and\nrubbing shoulders with the powers-that-be.&nbsp;\nThey get invites to Western embassy Christmas cocktails and dinners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protecting investment\nclimate has become a ploy for dishing out selective and holy cow treatment to\nrich corporates that might be detrimental to India's national interest and\nsecurity.&nbsp; Can you imagine\u2014 even Mother\nTeresa lobbied vigorously for UCC chairman Anderson .&nbsp; Dow has paid for UC liabilities in the US\u2014but\nnot in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;India will overtake USA as world\u2019s No 1\nsuperpower in 15 years.&nbsp; We are a RICH\nnation with a critical and strategic landmass , populated with intelligent\npeople , where ALL companies want to invest money.&nbsp; We have to deal with foreign corporations\nfrom a point of strength.&nbsp; There is NO\nneed to attract investment by scuttling the nation.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of course, business and\nentrepreneurship is good for India and the government should help the business\ncommunity-- but NOT at the expense of going back to slavery by becoming a\nbanana republic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The multi-nationals can\ncome to India to do business. We Indians will NOT allow them to\n\"lobby\"&nbsp; ( buy our minsters)\nand rule our country by remote control , and siphon off our nation's wealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government's priority\nin policy should be the countrys' and&nbsp;\ncitizens\u2019 interest. text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/LyNMslwSL7o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/LyNMslwSL7o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1811211913988705997\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_79M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_16.html?showComment=1529229419616#c1811211913988705997\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 17, 2018 at 3:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_79MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nARVIND KEJRIWAL THINKS THAT BEING CM OF DELHI IS LIKE BEING CM OF UP...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THE CM OF DELHI IS A WEE POST ...</b></span><br />\n<br />\nLt Governor of a union territory is a delegate of the president. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe Lieutenant Governor of Delhi is the constitutional head of the National Capital Territory of Delhi. The post was first established in September 1966, when The Delhi Administration Act, 1966 came into effect\u2026<br />\n<br />\nA union territory(UT) by definition is centrally administered. Some UTs have legislative assembly and some do not. Delhi is a UT with a legislative assembly\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE CAPITAL OF INDIA NEED SPECIAL ATTENTION FOR SECURITY .. THIS HAS TO LIE WITH THE CENTRE ..&nbsp; &nbsp;LEST WE WILL GO THE MOMOTO BANNERJEE WAY IN BENGAL...<br />\n<br />\nThe UT\u2019s name is National Capital Territory. NCT. The constitutional provisions that are relevant for New Delhi are 239 A and 239 AA. 239A is applicable to all UTs. 239AA is specific for NCT. ..<br />\n<br />\nAll UTs are administered through various directive from CENTRAL home ministry\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSpecifically for New Delhi, Lt Governor has additional powers (land,law and order,etc) considering the status of New Delhi. ..<br />\n<br />\nAll decisions made by the legislative assemble require Lt Governor\u2019s approval-- this MUST remain.. We know how kachra fuckin' waal got Khalistani suport for his 4 lok sabha seats in Punjab\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WE ASK CAPT AMARINDER SINGH TO BEEF UP HIS SECURITY TO A MULTI LAYERED ONE ...</span></b><br />\nWhere there is a difference of opinion between assembly and the Lt Governor, the matter is referred to the president\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe assembly can make laws on other issues apart from land,law and order,etc but they need Lt Gov approval. ..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THE LT GOVERNOR IS VESTED WITH VAST SUBJECTIVE POWERS \u2026</b></span>.</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html</span><br />\nLt Governor is the judicial representative of the union territory. That means, if you file a law suit against Delhi, the defendant for the UT is Lt Governor..<br />\n<br />\nLG of Delhi is also guided by the Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi Act, 1991, and the Transaction of Business of the Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi Rules, 1993\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAt the same time, Section 18 of the Act, which deals with \u201cExtent of legislative power\u201d of the Assembly, says that MLAs \u201cmay make laws for the whole or any part of the Union Territory with respect to any of the matters enumerated in the State List or the Concurrent List\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nAnd Section 44 of the Act, which deals with the Council of Ministers and its working, says the Council of Ministers headed by a Chief Minister will \u201caid and advise the Administrator in the exercise of his functions in relation to matters with respect to which the Legislative Assembly of the Union Territory has power to make laws\u201d. ..<br />\n<br />\nBut there is a catch. The same clause also allows the LG to \u201cact in his DISCRETION\u201d in the matter of lawmaking, even though the Council of Ministers has the task of aiding and advising him\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN-- LT GOVERNOR HAS VAST POWERS OF SUBJECTIVE DISCRETION.. HE HAS MORE MOWERS THAN GOVERNORS OF STATES.. THIS SHALL REMAIN SO..<br />\n<br />\nThe Delhi lieutenant governor does not have to act on the aid and advice of the council of ministers of the state government..<br />\n<br />\nUnder Article 163, the governor has to act on the aid and advice of the council of minister except in the case where he has to exercise his <b><span style=\"color: red;\">subjective DISCRETION\u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLand, police and public orders fall in the domain of the Centre and the Delhi Assembly cannot make laws with regard to these subject.&nbsp; &nbsp;We have hundreds of foreign embassies and these must be protected by CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE --not state controlled PANDU HAWALDARS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_79BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_16.html?showComment=1529248949250#c8614357987879652241\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 17, 2018 at 8:52 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_90MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.organiser.org//Encyc/2018/6/17/Anti-India-Rant-in-Dubai.html<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO IMPUND THE PASSPORTS OF THESE DESH DROHIS<br />\n<br />\nOn 31 January 2017, E Ahamed suffered a cardiac arrest during the President\u2019s address to the joint sitting of Parliament.<br />\n<br />\nE Ahamed fell unconscious in Parliament\u2019s Central Hall during President Pranab Mukherjee\u2019s address.<br />\n<br />\nHe was in ICU in RML Hospital at Capital. On 1 February 2017, the hospital officially announced his death at 2.15 am ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ITALIAN WAITRESS AND HER HALF BREED SON KEPT VIGIL<br />\n<br />\nONLY E AHAMED KNEW WHERE THE PARTYs FUNDS WERE STASHED.. THOSE FUNDS WENT POOOOOFFF ALONG WITH HIM...<br />\n<br />\nBOTH MOTHER AND SON TRIED STRONG ARM TACTICS- TO SEE E AHAMED BEFORE HE DIED.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WERE NOT ALLOWED BY THE DOCTORS.<br />\n<br />\nE AHAMED WAS A MUSLIM COMMIE-- FROM BRENNAN COLLEGE KANNUR-- A COMMIE DEN LIKE JNU WHICH HAS PRODUCED DESH DROHIS WHO HAVE NO LOVE FOR THE WATAN...<br />\n<br />\nTHE COMMIE STUDENTS UNION LEADERS WERE SPONSORED BY COMMIE UNIVERSITIES LIKE COLUMBIA..<br />\n<br />\nKERALA CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN STUDIED THERE AND WAS A COMMIE STUDENT UNION LEADER.<br />\n<br />\nBRENNAN COLLEGE WAS SPONSORED BY ROTHSCHILDs BASE MISSION.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH MY PARENTS WORKED AT COMMONWEALTH TRUST LTD, CALICUT WHOSE NAME WAS ORIGINALLY BASEL MISSION RUN BY CRYPTO JEW JESUITS..<br />\n<br />\nBASEL MISSIONS PRODUCED HANDLOOM TEXTILES AND ROOF TILES ( ONLY FOR EXPORT TO EUROPE ).. IN CALICUT WE KNOW OF JESUIT JEW MISSIONARY GEORG PLEBST.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE FREEMASON CLUB IN CALICUT WAS RUN BY BASEL MISSIONS CRYPTO JEWS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/freemason-lodge-of-calicut-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nONCE MY PARENTS VISITED MY SHIP BUILT IN ENGLAND AT COCHIN PORT , 3 DECADES AGO... MY MOTEHR SAW THE CABIN CURTAINS AND CLAIMED THAT THIS DESIGN WENT THROUGH HER DESK AND WAS DESIGNED BY ARTIST SREEDHARAM HER COLLEAGUE..<br />\n<br />\nI THOUGHT--LET IT BE-- LET HER BE IN HER ELEMENTS<br />\n<br />\nLATER I TOOK THE ASTER KEY AND OPENED THE LINEN LOCKER.. SHE WAS RIGHT.. THE LUXURY LINEN HAD THE \"COMTRUST --HARD TO BEAT \" TAG STITCHED ON. IT SHOWED A INDIAN DHOBI BEATING THE LINEN ON A ROCK..<br />\n<br />\nGerman Jew Rothschilds ship MALABAR anchored off Calicut in Oct 1834 and landed three Jesuit Jews -Samuel Hebich, John Lehner, and Christopher Greiner ..<br />\n<br />\nThey learnt Calicut handloom weaving.. In Calicut we had a textile factory and a roofing tile factory. My parents worked at the HQ next to Manachira pool of Calicut.<br />\n<br />\nBoth my sons studied at Hilltop school a huge bungalow on top of a hill overlooking the tile factory at Puthiyara Calicut , where a junior white skinned managerof Commonwealth Trust Ltd was in charge.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>Rothschild stated making Khakhi uniform cotton material in preparation for WW1 several years in advance.. mass production using the flying shuttle.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_90MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_90MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWhere a broad-cloth loom previously required a weaver on each side, it could now be worked by a single operator. Until this point the textile industry had required four spinners to service one weaver.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khiEAEqdkZY<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7O98vJ8VEF4</span><br />\nThe Khakhi dye was invented by John Haller. Haller extracted the sap of the bark of the semecarpus tree and gave his new colour the Kannada name \u2018khaki\u2019, which means \u2018dusty\u2019, because it looks like the ubiquitous brownish yellow dust of the Indians dirt roads.<br />\n<br />\nThe same sap was used for millenniums to create saffron robes for our sages\u2014which also used the rind of the cashew-nut tree and the extract of the heart wood of the catechu tree (Acacia catechu)\u2014which was an Ayurvedic medicine ( today used in Pan Masala ).<br />\n<br />\nIn 1938 a Christian missionary Rev. Weigle printed a bible in Malayalam and converted many locals to Christianity by giving sops. Calico fine cotton cloth which found great demand in China ( Admiral Zheng He ) was produced in Commonwealth Calicut.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/chinese-admiral-zheng-he-in-calicut.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_90BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 1966, Roy Herbert Thomson, 1st Baron Thomson of Fleet bought The Times newspaper from members of the Astor family-- the agents of Rothschild ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Aroon Purie was awarded his B.Sc in Economics from Rothschild controlled London School of Economics in 1965 .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">We know the finances of Vidya Vilas Purie, Aroon Purie's father, when he launched the fortnightly magazine India Today in 1975, with his daughter Madhu Trehan as its editor and Aroon Purie as its publisher</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TRANSITION OF HINSUSTAN TIMES IS SIMPLE - - ROTHSCHILD -- LORD ASTOR- THOMSON \u2013 VIDYA VILAS PURIE FAMILY--&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Through its subscribers, readers, viewers and listeners, the group reaches out to over 50 million individuals.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Attributing the change in politics partly to AAP leader and former Delhi CM Arvind Kerjiwal, Aroon Purie said, \"The growth of AAP shows there is scope for change in our politics.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; SO THAT DEEP STATE JEWS CAN MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR --AS USUAL<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DONALD TRUMP KICKED OUT\nJEW OBAMAs CSR IN OCT 2017.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The move came after\nTrump maintained the CSR payments for the first eight months of his presidency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cost-sharing reduction\npayments (CSR\u2019s) that the Obama regime used to pay kosher &nbsp;insurance companies to subsidize their quickly\nfailing nationalized health plan\u2014and that President Obama had to pay for by\nstealing billons-of-dollars from his nations mortgage loan providers Fannie Mae\nand Freddie Mac whose investors he defrauded. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the failure by\nRepublicans to repeal and replace Obamacare, The CSR payments were long\ndisputed, with the Republican-controlled House of Representatives suing the\nObama administration saying that the payments were illegal since they were\nbeing appropriated by the executive branch instead of Congress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A federal court ruled\nin favor of the House, but the Obama administration appealed the ruling,\nallowing the CSR payments to continue. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cost sharing\nreductions (CSR) subsidy is the smaller of two subsidies paid under the Patient\nProtection and Affordable Care Act (ACA) as part of the healthcare system in\nthe United States.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subsidies were paid from 2013 to 2017 to insurance\ncompanies on behalf of eligible enrollees in the ACA ( affordable care act ) to\nreduce co-payments and deductibles. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President Trump's\nargument that the CSR payments were a \"bailout\" for greedy kosher insurance\ncompanies who want a tilted playing field in their favour and therefore should\nbe stopped,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ObamaCare requires\ninsurers to provide assistance on copays and deductibles to consumers with\ncertain exchange plans who earn less than 250% of the poverty level. Insurers\nlose money with this deal, obviously \u2014 but the CSR payments effectively reimbursed\nthem for those losses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 2017,\nCongress repealed ObamaCare\u2019s individual mandate penalty \u2014 which fined\nAmericans for not purchasing insurance <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Democrats say that,\nwithout a penalty, healthy people would drop out of the exchanges. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In USA people who take\ncare of their health pay for people who lead a decadent life style.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in February, the\nTrump administration proposed a rule to undo DEEP STATE operative JEW President\nObama\u2019s limitations on short-term health plans, which are much cheaper than\nexchange plans because they\u2019re not subject to the same costly regulations.\nPrior to 2016, Americans could purchase short-term coverage for just shy of a\nyear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his last year in\noffice, President Obama cut the period to just 90 days.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He deliberately made\nshort-term plans less attractive to force people into the exchanges. President\nTrump merely rolled back the clock to the status quo during most of the Obama\nadministration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHAT HAPPENS WHEN DEEP STATE INVADES THE HEALTH MINISTRY AND ARE IN </span><span style=\"color: red;\">CAHOOTS </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">WITH KOSHER HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANIES ?</span></b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THIS !</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; WHO ARE ALSO POLITICAL DONORS.. </span><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">KOSHER HEALTH COMPANIES BRIBE\nPOLITICIANS AND DOCTORS IN ALL WESTERN NATIONS THEY THRIVE .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue;\">ROTHSCHILDs APCO\nBRANDED MODI KNOWS ABOUT THIS..&nbsp; &nbsp;PEOPLE WHO TAKE GOOD CARE OF THEIR HEALTH ARE\nFORCED TO PAY FOR DRUG ADDICTS, SEXUAL DEVIANTS AND PROCESSED FOOD CONSUMERS\nWHO ABUSE THEIR HEALTH..... EUTHANASIA HAS TO BE DECIDED BY THE ELECTED LAW\nMAKERS... NOT SOME COLLEGIUM JUDGES ... Laws against euthanasia and assisted\nsuicide are in place to prevent abuse and to protect people from unscrupulous\ndoctors and others ( GRAB PROPERTY )... Legalizing euthanasia would send a\nclear message: it is better to be dead than sick or disabled... The patient is\ndepressed and believes that his situation is worse than it really is.( OR MADE\nTO FEEL BY SELFISH RELATIVES )... Faced with a doctor who both heals and kills,\nthe patient lives with an uncertainty that adds to vulnerability... Patients\nwho are ill or dependent often feel worthless and a burden to their family and\nloved ones. .. With legalized assisted suicide, the rate of non-assisted\nsuicide WILL increase... Every patient has the right to refuse treatment or to\nrequest that ongoing treatment be stopped... Life in society is based on\nrelationships of mutual trust among all citizens. Everyone must be sure that\nnobody will kill him... . We are already witnessing worrisome abuse in\njurisdictions where euthanasia or assisted suicide is legal... WE THE PEOPLE\nWILL NOT ALLOW HEALTH INSURANCE TO DECIDE WHO HAS THE RIGHT TO LIVE... RIGHT TO\nLIVE ALSO INCLUDES RIGHT TO DIE .. TEE HEEEEEEE .. WHERE IS THE FUCKIN' INTELLIGENCE .. RIGHT TO HEAL ALSO INCLUDES RIGHT TO KILL .. The right to life\ndoes not create a right to choose death rather than life.It meant there was no\nright to die at the hands of a third person or with the assistance of a public\nauthority.. The right to life is a moral principle based on the belief that a\nhuman being has the right to live and, in particular, should not be killed by\nANOTHER human being. .. International law only allows law enforcement officers\nto deliberately take life (shooting to kill) where absolutely necessary to\ndefend themselves and others against an imminent threat to life. .. The\nentitlement of a person to make the decision to end their own life through\neuthanasia is RIGHT TO CHOOSE. Passive euthanasia is a condition where there is\nwithdrawal of medical treatment with the deliberate intention to hasten the\ndeath of a terminally-ill patient.. WHEN A MAN IS SICK , AND IS IN PAIN -- HIS\nMIND IS VULNERABLE.. GREEDY CHILDEN WILL KILL HIM OFF TO GRAB PROPERT.. Capt\najit vadakayil .. , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">North Korea's human rights record has been considered the worst in the world and has been globally condemned, with KOSHER DEEP STATE groups such as the United Nations, Amnesty International, Human Rights Watch, and the European Union all critical of the country's record. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The General Assembly of the United Nations has since 2003 annually adopted a resolution condemning the country's human rights record. The latest resolution of December 19, 2011, passed by a vote of 123\u201316 with 51 abstentions, urged the government in Pyongyang to end its \"systematic, widespread and grave violations of human rights\", which included public executions and arbitrary detentions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">North Korea rejected the resolution, saying it was politically motivated and based upon untrue fabrications-- and Capt Ajit Vadakayil agrees with North Korea.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">PEOPLE WHO KNOW ME WILL VOUCH --THAT CAPT AJIT VADAKAYILs OPINION HAS MORE WEIGHT THAN THE ENTIRE MAIN STREAM MEDIA OF THIS PLANET... Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_13.html?showComment=1528895795928#c1345855554571010929\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 13, 2018 at 6:46 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_9MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tether, one of the most-traded cryptocurrencies, shows a pattern of being spent on Bitcoin at pivotal moments, helping to drive the world\u2019s first digital asset to a record price in December.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Bitfinex lost banking relationships yet continued to operate.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Bitcoin\u2019s had a meteoric rise to a record high of almost $20,000 last 16th December 2017, before it crashed and fell to $6,441 today ( 13th June 2018) which was the level on 31st Oct 2017.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tethers are created by the parent company Tether Ltd., often in large chunks such as 200 million. Almost all new coins then move to Bitfinex.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When Bitcoin prices drop soon after the issuance, Tethers at Bitfinex and other exchanges buy Bitcoin \u201cin a coordinated way that drives the price\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If there\u2019s fraud or manipulation in a market it can leave tracks in the data.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When Bitcoin\u2019s price fell, purchases with Tether tended to increase, helping to reverse the decline. But during times when Bitcoin rose, the reverse did not occur.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Tether and Bitfinex share a KOSHER management team, including JEW Jan Ludovicus Van der Velde. They have been busy threatening bloggers.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Bitfinex CEO JL van der Velde said in an emailed statement: \"Bitfinex nor Tether is, or has ever, engaged in any sort of market or price manipulation. Tether issuances cannot be used to prop up the price of Bitcoin or any other coin/token on Bitfinex.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/blockchain-bitcoin-must-be-kicked-out.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tether is a cryptocurrency that\u2019s meant to be backed one-for-one by the US dollar. The idea is to have the price stability of the dollar combined with the operational ability of a cryptocurrency.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In theory, Tether holders can sell one USDT back to Tether Limited for $1. Tether Limited doesn\u2019t hold sufficient currency reserves to back all the Tethers in circulation.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If Tether becomes untethered from the dollar then it will also cause problems for exchanges that use it as a proxy for client funds. This could potentially create liquidity issues and, in a worst-case scenario, force them to seek extra capital.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tether tokens are issued by Tether Limited, a company based in the British Virgin Islands.. Tether\u2019s website says it is incorporated in Hong Kong, with offices in the US.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The company has many of the same management team as Bitfinex, the Hong Kong-based cryptocurrency exchange that is one of the biggest in the world. Jan Ludovicus van der Velde is CEO of both Bitfinex and Tether, and Philip Potter is chief strategy officer for both businesses</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6253605592365209544\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_27M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. FROM JERUSALEM AND\nBATUMI SPICES WERE LOADED AGAIN ON SHIPS DESTINED FOR EUROPE..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">BOTH SALALAH AND GWADAR\nWERE PRIVATE PORTS OF THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR ( OWNED BY CALICUT KING )<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">DHOFAR IS THE ANCIENT\nKINGDOM-- SOUTH PART OF OMAN AND NORTH PART OF YEMEN.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Race is a genetic\ndistinction, and refers to people with shared ancestry and shared genetic\ntraits. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">HERE IS A BOMBSHELL<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">IF SOUTH POLE IS\n\"SEMITE\" -- NORTH POLE IS \"ARYAN\"..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">\"ARYANS\" ARE\nKERALA NAMBOODIRIS --THE ELDER BROTHER , WHO KNOWS VEDAS BY ORAL ROUTE, WHO ARE\nEXPERTS IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">\"SEMITES\" ARE\nYOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS -- LEFT HANDED ONES-- THE ONES WHO ARE\nHOMOSEXUALS AND EX-COMMUNICATED..THE ONES WHO CANNOT OWN LAND OR EVEN MARRY..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">IT TAKES A CAPT AJIT\nVADAKAYIL TO EXPLODE THIS NAKED TRUTH ON THE HEADS OF ISRAELI JEWS AND THEIR\nHISTORIANS..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">NAMBOODIRIS ARE\nSANSKRIT KNOWING THIYYAS OF KERALA--THE ORIGINAL RULING CLASS.. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; &nbsp; GWADAR WAS PART OF THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR.&nbsp; THIS IS AN ANCIENT OVERLAND SPICE ROUTE&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VoyWLwF7_6U/WyL6Cul0XzI/AAAAAAABcOQ/IJUct0bxp78ENoRmbB7Y17ySA6gIc54OwCLcBGAs/s1600/17061ES6_001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Nni0Wdwo29Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Nni0Wdwo29Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1931 when the\nBritish moved India\u2019s capital from Kolkata to New Delhi, the city\u2019s central\nadministrative area, with its wide avenues, extensive parks and imposing\ncolonial homes was reserved for the empire\u2019s bureaucrats. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This area came to be\nknown as Lutyens\u2019 Delhi after its designer Edwin Lutyens. Many of these\nadministrators were little men \u2013 colonialists who descended on India with utter\ncontempt for the people they were going to rule over, not serve. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their only\nqualification was white skin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the post below I\ntalk about the uncrowned king of Calicut who lost his job and went back to\nbeing a CHAPRASSI back home in England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; JEW Rothschild rules the waves . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild used English soldiers only for\nshow.. When it came to the toughest battles he used HESSIANS and Indians <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/britannia-did-not-rule-waves-and-this.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/britannia-did-not-rule-waves-and-this.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indians who died in\nbattle during WW1 and WW2 were counted as white British dead.&nbsp; Till this blogsite exposed this foul lie\nnobody knew. Today Wikipedia accepts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi recruited 13\nlakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which\n111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi recruited&nbsp; 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in\nthe second World war.&nbsp;&nbsp; Out of this\n243000 ( 2.43 lakh)&nbsp; soldiers were\nkilled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian soldiers\nexperienced the cowardice of the white soldier during WW1 and WW2 . Not one\nwhite soldier had the guts to engage in trench hand to hand bloody battles with\nswords .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the British\nhastily retreated in 1947, their rapacious administrators were replaced by a\nclass of Indians derisively described as Macaulayites \u2013 Indians only in name\nbut who were otherwise disconnected from Indian culture and thought. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Indians had\ninherited all the biases that the British rulers harboured towards Indians.\nThey were the product of Thomas Macaulay\u2019s English Education Act of 1835 whose\nsole purpose was to create a class of people who would assist the British in\nadministering India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contrast, nothing\nchanged in India after the hasty British retreat. The armed forces had mutinied\nand the final coup de grace was delivered by Malabar Special Regiment \u2013an elite\npolice brigade of 800 tough Kalari fighters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was a smooth\ntransition from colonial looters to Congress carpetbaggers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The JUDAS Indian bureaucracy,\nwhich facilitated British loot, now joined the Indian political class in\nlooting nominally free Indians. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lot of these Lutyens babus\nwere DEEP STATE funded from abroad..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When the Congress introduced socialism style\npermits for operating industries, the middlemen moved in. And its a win win for both the parties<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Delhi Golf Club, on\nthe eastern side of LBZ, and the Delhi Gymkhana Club, a social club that opened\nin 1913, both have 30-year waiting list<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On August 2014 it was\nreported that the club has been using unauthorized bore wells and violating\nenvironmental rules <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Originally called the\n'Imperial Delhi Gymkhana Club', it was founded on July 3, 1913, at Coronation\nGrounds, Delh. When new imperial capital of India, New Delhi was built, the\nclub was allotted 27.3 acres of land in 1928 on perpetual lease.The word imperial\nwas dropped when India gained independence in 1947.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The club is located in\nthe heart of Lutyens' Delhi on Safdarjung Road, occupying 27.3 acres of land as\nper the site plan made on the drawing board by Sir Edwin Lutyens as part of his\ngrand design for Imperial Celebrations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You don\u2019t need to be on\nthe inside track of politics or have exhaustive knowledge of the working of the\nnews media to connect the dots. Just follow the money \u2013 it\u2019s as simple as that.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; When prices are falling, the tether creators can convert their tether into bitcoin in a way that pushes bitcoin up and then sell some bitcoin back into dollars to replenish tether reserves as bitcoin price rises.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">If cryptocurrency prices crash, tether creators essentially have a put option to default on redeeming tether, or to potentially experience a \u2018hack\u2019 where tether or related dollars disappear.</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS SCAM IS FLOURISHING ONLY BECAUSE THE KOSHER DEEP STATE PROTECTS THE ROTTEN SYSTEM--WHERE JEWS CAN MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR...</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTether is being printed out of thin air, without corresponding dollar deposits. IN GRATITUDE DR JOSEF MENGELE WAS NOT DECLARED A WAR CRIMINAL AT ALL\u2026</span></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOBODY HEARD OF MENGELE BABY TILL THE TRAIL OF ANOTHER JEW ADOLF EICHMANN ( JUNE 1960 ) \u2014WHOSE SON WAS TALKING TOO MUCH TO HIS GIR FRIEND ABOUT HIS FATHERS EXPLOITS..&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN ISRAEL HEARD ABOUT THIS THEY EXECUTED EICHMANN TO SERVE AS A WARNING\u2014NEVER TELL THAT HITLER WAS A JEW..</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW Otto Adolf Eichmann was a German Nazi SS-Obersturmbannf\u00fchrer (lieutenant colonel) and one of the major organizers of the Holocaust- a right hand man of JEW Hitler. He was tasked by SS of rounding up anal sex receiving Jews.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 1960, he was captured in Argentina by the Mossad, Israel's intelligence service. He was found guilty of war crimes in a FAKE trial in Israel, and was hanged in 1962.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE TALKED TOO MUCH. DEAD MEN TELL NO TALES..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT WAS A WARNING TO OTHER NAZI JEWS TO SHUT THEIR TRAPS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW Lothar Hermann was instrumental in exposing Eichmann's identity..His daughter Sylvia began dating a man named Klaus Eichmann in 1956 who boasted about his father's Nazi exploits, and revealing about JEWS EXTERMINATING JEWS ON ORDERS OF JEW HITLER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Eichmann was ignominiously snatched on an earth road on May 11 1960 as he returned from work, and taken to a secret hiding place outside Buenos Aires\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For 10 days he was kept blindfolded and handcuffed to a bed while Mossad decided how to get him out of Argentina..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Finally, on May 21, Eichmann was disguised in the uniform of an El Al flight attendant and was bundled on to a plane to Tel Aviv. On May 23 the Israeli prime minister, David Ben Gurian, announced his capture to the world: \"Eichmann is already in this country under arrest and will shortly be brought to trial.\"&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Hermann's part in JEW Eichmann's capture remained a closely guarded secret until 1971 when the Mossad director Isser Harel revealed it to the Israeli press.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A nickname for Mengele, \u201cAngel of Extermination,\u201d is recorded in the FAKE diary of a young JEWESS girl named Anne Frank.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ANNE BABYs FAKE DIARY WAS WRITTEN IN </span><span style=\"color: red;\">BALL PEN</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> \u2013 WHICH DID NOT EXIST THOSE DAYS.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Israel always knew the home of Dr Josef Mengele. His home door and compound gate name plate declared it.. He was feeling safe as his name never popped up till his death..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The German ambassador in Buenos Aires is quoted in the Mossad file on JEW Dr Josef Mengele as saying he received orders to treat Mengele as an ordinary citizen since there was no arrest warrant for him..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">More than two years after Mengele\u2019s death, ( drowned at a Sao Paulo beach ) the great Nazi-hunter Simon Wiesenthal claimed that he was \u201cclosing in on Mengele.\u201d In 1968, the Mossad had received fresh confirmation that Mengele was living on the farm near Sao Paulo..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; You cannot get ex-communicated for NOT toeing the line\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe diversity, the range, and the lofty metaphysical aspirations of Vedanta are mind boggling\u2026<br />\n<br />\nLoaded truth is delivered or revealed from a divine source and enters the world through a single agent: for example, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity, and Muhammad in Islam\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThese truths are then recorded in scriptures that serve as a source of knowledge of divine wisdom: the Hebrew Bible, the New Testament of the Christian Bible, and the Koran. In the Hindu tradition, by utter contrast, there is no single revelation\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu spirituality tradition , unlike other religions -- has always concerned itself with the \u201chuman\u201d situation rather than the \u201cour religion \u201c situation..<br />\n<br />\nUnder the doctrine of karma, the ability to make choices remains with the individual-and NOT what is being told as gospel in a holy book \u2026<br />\n<br />\nAsk the Jews\u2014they will say India is the only place where they never got persecuted over thousands of years\u2014they always ran here for refuge\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe reason ?..<br />\n<br />\nThis country had denizens steeped in spirituality \u2014 NOT religious bigots.
