This is why Hindus never attempted to convert anybody..<br />\n<br />\nA person's interest and inclinations in doing things and accomplishing goals depend upon his beliefs and faith. Faith does not means only religious faith. It includes your entire belief system, upon which depend your worldview and your conception of things. ..<br />\n<br />\nSince our mental faculties are not equipped to discern truth entirely, we have to depend upon our beliefs to fill up the gaps in our understanding and to make sense of the world. ..<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDHA is NOT blind faith / dogma like in single holybook single messiah religions ..The great Maharishis of the Hindu tradition never demanded that their students should blindly believe or \"swallow\" anything\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_7MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_7B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c818204337524173484\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_11.html?showComment=1528693603113#c818204337524173484\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 11, 2018 at 10:36 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nIn fact, they didn't want their students to believe; they wanted their students to understand.( NIDDHIDYASANA ) ..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">A Gurukul teacher wants students to understand, to know, unlike a evangelist preacher who wants listeners to believe\u2026</span></div>\n<br />\nA physics professor doesn't want his students to believe in atoms; he wants them to understand. In the same way, Hindu teachers and spiritual texts do not command you to believe; they lead you to understand\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNo learning in a Gurukul is complete without chewing the cud along in a group with the Guru\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBlind devotion and belief takes a back seat in Sanatana Dharma ..<br />\n<br />\nEverything is thrashed out in grace , harmony and transparency..<br />\n<br />\nNididhyasana necessarily gives the clearest vision of the Self.. Nididhyasana refers to realization and consequent conviction of the truths, non-duality and a state where there is a fusion of thought and action, knowing and being.. ..<br />\n<br />\nNididhyasana, is the willingness to do what the heartfelt desire requires of you. \u201cIt will call you into action, into the world. You must be willing to respond.\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nOne of the famous shlokas of the Vivekachudamani written by Adi Shankaracharya 4000 YEARS AGO, defines SHRADDHA as follows\u2026<br />\n<br />\n\"shAstrasya guruvAkyasya satyabuddhyavadhAraNam |<br />\nsA shraddhA kathitA sadbhir-yayA vastUpalabhyate ||\"<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\"Holding with conviction the words of shastra and guru to be true is called SHRADDHA by the Holy. By her (shraddha) is attained reality.\"..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe goal, as understood by the ancient rishis, is not to merely believe in God, but to know God directly. Shraddha is the first step in one's search for God\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIn the fourth chapter of the Bhagavad Gita, Sri Krishna says, \"shraddhavan labhate jnanam, one with shraddha gains knowledge. Thus shraddha is like a stepping stone; with the help of a teacher, believe in God eventually leads to direct knowledge\u2026<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is indispensable, because without it, knowledge of the brahman will forever be beyond ones grasp\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDHA helps us accept what we cannot understand at present\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ALL RELIGIONS PROPAGATED BHAKTI.. SANATANA DHARMA ASKED FOR SHRADDHA\u2026<br /><br />THIS IS WHY I SAY \"THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT \" WITH ALL THOSE FAKE AND BACKDATED DASAS NEVER HAPPENED\u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSHRADDHA means firm confidence in the words of the Guru and the scriptures. When such faith is placed upon a wrong rascal guru ( who preaches anal sex ) it can lead to disastrous consequences. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha means unwavering faith. Rituals of worship without SHRADDHA are lifeless and the effort done in that direction also goes waste\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIt is SHRADDHA that transforms lifeless stones into living symbols of Divinity capable of showing supernatural powers..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha varya smriti samadhi praj\u00f3apurvakam itare\u00ccam.-(YogaDarshan-1/20)..<br />\n<br />\nStrength, memory and Samadhi may be achieved (by even ordinary people) with the aid of SHRADDHA and wisdom\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe faith of a voiceless newborn remains only on his mother. When this mother becomes old and helpless, her faith remains in her child she had once fed with breast milk..<br />\n<br />\nIt is faith that creates the bonds of love among the members of family and inspires them to cooperate and sacrifice their interests for others. The lack of SHRADDHA alone is responsible for the disintegration of families\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA , THERE WERE ONLY 4 MUTTS HEADED BY KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ---FROM 2000 BC ..<br /><br />IN 1947 WHEN THE WHITE INVADER LEFT INDIA, WE HAD MORE THAN A THOUSAND FAKE MUTTS ..<br /><br />THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS HAD CRYPTO JEW PONTIFFS WITH PALE EYES\u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_8MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_8BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_8B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_9B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3979954259877197149\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_11.html?showComment=1528693684464#c3979954259877197149\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 11, 2018 at 10:38 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_9MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3--<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THESE FAKE MUTTS REMOVED SHRADDHA AND INSERTED BHAKTI .</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU GO TO AGAMA TEMPLES YOU CAN SEE MEANINGLESS AND ENDLESS RITUALS ..<br />\n<br />\nAT SCHOOL I HAVE HEARD THE TERM \u201d LISTEN WITH SHRADDHA \u201c HUNDREDS OF TIMES\u2014 SHRADDHICHU KELKU ( IN MALAYALAM )..<br />\n<br />\nShree Krishna assures Arjun that even those who merely hear the sacred dialogue with great SHRADDHA will gradually become purified..<br />\n<br />\nThe shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br />\n<br />\nThis is not blind faith\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIt is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith. No spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..<br />\n<br />\nFrom shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. Ancient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is a Sanskrit Malayalam word -- an unshakable conviction in our journey. Shraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, -- it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness..<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">We build our \u201cshraddha\u201d by pushing through fear and trusting implicitly in our inner voice and conscience . Shraddha is the divine medicine. ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">This blogsite is creating a silent world revolution by awakening the inner voice..</span></div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_10b+seedB3KwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_10b+seedB3KwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3524353454672485012\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_13M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Minister,<br />\n<br />\nDear Sir,<br />\n<br />\nWe demand action on this horrifying revelation by Captain Ajit Vadakayil on OPV and IPV forms of polio immunization methods and its horrific ramification. The oral vaccine (OPV) being given to Indian babies can multiply and spread to other babies if and when they are unvaccinated. On the other hand, the IPV that is given through injection, though expensive, is a safe way of immunization as there is no chance of the virus replicating in the gut of the immunized child and spreading to other children. Still only OPV was pushed big time in India.<br />\n<br />\nThe Evil Pharma Lobby of Western Countries has bribed our authorities and doctors to hush up all the cases of polio infection caused due to OPV administered to Indian babies. We are appalled and horrified by the callousness of our politicians, bureaucrats, members of medical fraternity and everyone involved in this unimaginably devilish genocidal scam.<br />\n<br />\nFIRST WORLD COUNTRIES LIKE CANADA AND THE US HAVE BANNED OPV AS FAR BACK AS 2000 OR EARLIER BUT WE HAVE CONTINUED IT. WHY<br />\nComment on Capt. Vadakayils blog:<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br />\nORAL POLIO VACCINES ( OPV ) WAS PUSHED ON INDIAN BABIES. USING THEM AS LAB RATS. ORAL POLIO VACCINE ( OPV ) WAS A LIVE VACCINE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WEST NEVER USED ORAL VACCINES ON THEIR CHILDREN..THE INJECTED THE SAFE VACCINE ( IPV ) - INACTIVATED POLIO VACCINE.<br />\n<br />\nBABIES IN THE VILLAGES AND FORESTS WHO WERE NEVER GIVEN ORAL POLIO VACCINES WERE AFFLICTED WITH VAPP ( VACCINE ASSOCIATED PARALYTIC POLIOMYELITIS ).<br />\n<br />\nPOLIO IS ALSO CALLED POLIOMYELITIS.<br />\n<br />\nLAKHS OF BABIES DIED ALL OVER INDIA - BUT THIS WAS HUSHED UP BY BRIBING ALL INVOLVED IN INDIA.. A KILLER CONDITION CALLED VAPP.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_29MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_29BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_29B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_30B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7149282844130290221\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_30M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_11.html?showComment=1528709228031#c7149282844130290221\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 11, 2018 at 2:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_30MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nWhen a baby is given OPV, the content is ingested, the viruses replicate in the intestinal tract, providing immunity to subsequent infection.<br />\n<br />\nVaccine-derived poliovirus (VDPV) is a strain of poliovirus that was initially included in oral polio vaccine (OPV) and that has changed over time and behaves more like the naturally occurring virus.<br />\n<br />\nThis means it can be spread more easily to people who are unvaccinated against polio and who come in contact with the stool or respiratory secretions, such as from a sneeze, of an infected person. These viruses may cause illness, including paralysis - especially among the undernourished Indian children.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2005, a VDPV was found in the stool of a white child in Minnesota who was not vaccinated and had a weakened immune system. Nobody in USA had been given OPV and this left everybody baffled.<br />\n<br />\nIt was found that an Indian baby given OPV was in the vicinity - and pretty soon they found more than a dozen white children afflicted.<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE MAJOR KOSHER FOUNDATIONS DOING GOOD SAMARITAN SOCIAL ENGINEERING IN INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY HAVE DESCENDED ON INDIA UNSOLICITED TO SAVE INDIA. BUT THEY QUIETLY BRIBE MINISTERS, DEEP STATE LUTYENS BABUS TO HAVE AN UNHINDERED RUN.<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WILL ENSURE WHOEVER DERELICTED THEIR DUTY, KILLING LAKHS OF BABIES ( HUSHED UP BY BRIBING PARENTS WHO LOST THEIR CHILDREN - AND CONVINCING THEM THEIR BABY DIED OF OTHER CAUSES ) ARE BROUGHT TO BOOK AND TRIED FOR MANSLAUGHTER.<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE SHALL HUNT THESE DESH DROHIS AND PROFILE THEM.<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK PM MODI TO SPEND MORE TIME IN INDIA THAN ABROAD --HUGGING WHITE JEWS.<br />\n--<br />\n<br />\nThanks and Regards,<br />\nVatsal Anand</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_30MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_30BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; TO PREVENT DEEP STATE JEWS CENSORING TRUTHS..<br />\n<br />\nRemember-- The MasterCard payment system stopped serving clients of seven Russian banks without warning after Washington imposed its first set of sanctions on Moscow in 2014 over the Crimea annexation by Putin..<br />\n<br />\nIn response, the Russian government ordered the creation of a national payment system. With the support of the country's banking system, the Mir charge card was introduced in 2015..<br />\n<br />\nRussia's banking sector had now been provided with all the necessary conditions for operating lenders and payment systems in case of disconnection from SWIFT. .. 92 % of ATMs in Russia were ready to accept the Mir payment system, a domestic version of Visa and MasterCard\u2026<br />\n<br />\nUSA COULD DOTHE SAME TO INDIA OVER IRANIAN OIL/ RUSSIAN MISSILE COVER SYSTEM TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nSWIFT IS NOW KOSHER DEEP STATES WEAPON FOR MASS DECEPTION..<br />\n<br />\nSWIFT was famously the object of a hacking attack - since FALSELY blamed on shadowy North Korean agents - that saw 81 million USD of reserves from the central bank of Bangladesh stolen from the New York Fed and transferred to Manila, where it was later traced to Macau and then vanished. &nbsp;Even\nthe U.S. Environmental Protection Agency has strong ties to oil companies,\ndespite the fact that they\u2019re supposedly the government agency that protects\nthe environment ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shadow government\ncan manipulate, or in some cases, create legislation through either close ties\nto politicians or even organizations like the American Legislative Exchange\nCouncil (ALEC).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">American Legislative\nExchange Council (ALEC) is a nonprofit organization of conservative state\nlegislators and private sector representatives who draft and share model\nstate-level legislation for distribution among state governments in the United\nStates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALEC allows\ncorporations to hand over legislation that the \u201cofficial lawmakers\u201d can then\ntake credit for and formally propose. ALEC has been responsible for numerous\nimmoral bills including those that aim to lower minimum wage, suppress voter\nrights, pro-gun laws, ag-gag (animal cruelty) bills, and more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">ALEC is a DEEP STATE\norganization that gave kosher corporate interests outsized influence.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although\nGoverning Magazine reported in 2003 that ALEC meetings traditionally had been\nopen to the public, news organizations have reported since then, that many\nmeetings are held in private.. Task force meetings and bill-drafting sessions\nare held behind closed doors.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k0PlOb6NPHk/Wx8FeTZXPVI/AAAAAAABcJE/zmEWwrgxZ-4Zys3lg2bsJ1rblHPL9r4SQCLcBGAs/s1600/nALEC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"532\" data-original-width=\"723\" height=\"470\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k0PlOb6NPHk/Wx8FeTZXPVI/AAAAAAABcJE/zmEWwrgxZ-4Zys3lg2bsJ1rblHPL9r4SQCLcBGAs/s640/nALEC.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALEC does not disclose\nits membership list nor the origins of its model bills In April 2012, Common\nCause filed a complaint with the Internal Revenue Service objecting to ALEC's\ntax status as a nonprofit organization and alleged that lobbying accounted for\nmore than 60% of its expenditures. CMD\nfound that 98% of ALEC\u2019s funding comes from private sources other than state\nlegislators.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_11.html?showComment=1528808809311#c6446617714421430149\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 12, 2018 at 6:36 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_134MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS SO SPECIAL ABOUT KUKRI KNIFE.<br />\n<br />\nWELL IT IS PREFECTLY BALANCED.<br />\n<br />\nThe kukri is effective as a chopping weapon, due to its weight, and slashing weapon, because the curved shape creates a \"wedge\" effect which causes the blade to cut effectively and deeper.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike a straight-edged sword, the center of mass combined with the angle of the blade allow the kukri to slice as it chops.<br />\n<br />\nBecause the blade bends towards the opponent, the user need not angle the wrist while executing a chopping motion<br />\n<br />\nThe edge slides across the target's surface while the center of mass maintains momentum as the blade moves through the target's cross-section.<br />\n<br />\nThis gives the kukri a penetrative force disproportional to its length. The design enables the user to inflict deep wounds and to <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">penetrate bone and shear it.</span></b><br />\nThe kukri is versatile. It can function as a smaller knife by using the narrower part of the blade, closest to the handle. The heavier and wider end of the blade, towards the tip, functions as an axe or a small shovel.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">ONCE A GORKHA UNSHEATHES HIS KUKRI, THE STEEL MUST TASTE BLOOD</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\nIF HE IS UNABLE TO PROVIDE IT, HE SPILLS HIS OWN BLOOD ON THE BLADE. THIS TRADITION IS TO PREVENT BRAVADO WITH THE WEAPON... UNLEASH IT ONLY TO KILL ..<br />\n<br />\nGORKHAS RAN AFTER ARGENTINIANS WITH UNLEASHED KUKRI , SCREAMING\u2014 THE ARGENTINIANS RAN FOR THEIR LIVES. ONE ARGENTINIAN SOLDIER AT FALKLAND TOLD ME THIS .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bX36LDq-gQs</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE CURVED CONCAVE EDGE ( TOWARDS HANDLE ) IS MADE OF SOFTER STEEL ( QUENCHING STYLE ) WHICH CAN BE MADE RAZOR SHARP \u2014 EVEN FOR SHAVING..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />THE CONVEX EDGE TOWARDS THE TIP IS HARD AND CANNOT BE SHARPENED WITH A HAND FILE\u2014IT WILL NOT BITE AND WILL SLIP OFF.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ocyRDz2AeH4</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
